source: Greetings, Chieftain Reebaud! I will start with the colonization of the island straight away.
target: Free, Mienheer Reebaud! Ick fang stracks mit de Besiedeln vun de Hallig an.

source: With respect, Chieftain, please be not so hasty! The enemies are very strong, and I’m still not convinced we can defeat them. I’d prefer not to send any soldiers into a battle they will likely lose. I’d prefer to wait a bit longer until we can certainly beat the enemy without losing soldiers.
target: Mit Respekt, Mienheer, wees bidde nich so haastig! De Feinde sünd unbannig machtig, un ick gloov noch nich, dat wi se manntjen könen. Ick will nich geern Soldaten in eene Slacht schicken, de se wahrschienelk verlesen. Ick will lever een bietje wachten, bit wi de Feind wiss sünner Starvfallen manntjen könen.

source: Three weeks later, I returned to Fremil to speak with our king. He was furious at the Barbarians, yet forbade any attack on these tribes. He believed that our army was too weak to survive in a war against the Barbarians.
target: Dree Weken naher was ick torügg in Freemilt, um mit de König to spreken. He was güünsk över de Willen Lüü, versee mir aver, deese Völker antogriepen. He meende, uns' Soldateree is to swack, deese Willen Lüü im Krieg to manntjen.

source: Sire, I fear we are not safe in this foreign land. Who knows what terrible creatures live beyond this forest, in that mighty desert? What if these creatures enter the woods and await the time to attack us?
target: Mienheer, mi is bang, dat wi in deesem frömden Land nich seker sünd. Well weet, wat för grieselke Deerten achtern de Wald in de gewaltige Wüüst leven? Wat wenn deese Beesten de Wald betreden un uns angriepen willen?

source: There are still a few Barbarians hiding on our island, but I am sure that we will find them soon. Every Barbarian who doesn’t attack us will be put in a boat with the other peaceful ones, and sent back to their country.
target: 't gifft noch een paar Wille Lüü, de sük up uns' Insel versteken, aver wiss finnen wi se bold. All Willen, de uns nich angriepen, setten wi in een Schipp mit de annern freedsamen un schicken se in hör Land torügg.

source: The message was addressed to me, begging me to come back to Fremil. It says that the Empire is at war with the Barbarians. They were attacked from the north by the tribe that I was forbidden to attack. It is clear to me what I must do…
target: 't was eene Naricht för mi, de mi daarum anging, dat ick na Freemilt torügg koom. Dat Latienske Riek is im Krieg mit de Willen Lüü. Se sünd vun Noorden angrepen worden, vun de Volk, wat ick nich angriepen dürde. Ick weet, wat ick doon mutt …

source: I am really afraid, because we are completely unprepared should the Barbarians decide to attack us.
target: Ick bün würrelk bange, wiel wi överhoopt nich vörbereidt sünd, wenn de Willen Lüü uns angriepen wullen.

source: Chieftain Reebaud! Our scouts report that the enemy is advancing fast. I fear we are not strong enough yet to defend ourselves if he attacks first. You must devise something to hold him off.
target: Mienheer Reebaud! Uns' Bespejers mellen, dat de Feind fix nahder kummt. Ick bün bang, dat wi noch nich machtig genoog sünd, um uns to verdedigen, wenn he toeerst angriept. Laat di wat infallen, wo wi hüm ofhollen könen.

source: I’d like to say we should attack him right now, but I fear we aren’t strong enough yet to hold our own against him in battle. We should hurry our soldier training while pretending to be gathering his so-called gift. That would buy us some time.
target: Am Leevsten will ick seggen, dat wi hüm gliek stracks angriepen, aver ick bün bange, dat wi noch nich stark genoog sünd, um hüm in eener Slacht to begegen. Wi sallen uns' Soldaten fixer utbilden as wi so doon, as of wi siene sobenöömte Gaav sammeln. Dat gifft uns wat Tied.

source: Hi, it’s me again! This time, I have sent you a message. Messages are sent to you by Widelands to inform you about important events: empty mines, attacks on your tribe, won or lost military buildings, resources found…
target: Moin, ick bün 't weer! Nu hebb ick di eene Naricht schickt. Widelands schickt di Narichten, um di vun Vörfallen vun Belang weten to laten: Wenn een Bargwark leeg is, dien Volk angrepen word, Soldateree-Boen innohmen oder verloren worden, Mineraale funnen worden …

source: When you are expanding into no man’s land, you can make your buildings prefer rookies. When you are planning to attack, send heroes into that region. Conquered buildings always prefer heroes.
target: Wenn du nejes Land innimmst, kannst du diene Boen Snöttbaarten vörtrecken laten. Wenn du angriepen willt, treck Helden vör. Innohmen Boen trecken immer Helden vör.

source: To attack a building, click on its doors, choose the number of soldiers that you wish to send and click on the ‘Attack’ button.
target: Um een Huus antogriepen, klick siene Döör an, köör de Tahl vun Soldaten, wat de schicken willt, ut, un klick dann de »Angriepen«-Knoop an.

source: For everything you do on the high seas, you need a port at the shore. Ports are like headquarters: they can store wares, workers and soldiers. The soldiers inside will automatically come out when an enemy attacks the port.
target: För all wat mit de hoge See to doon hett bruukst du eene Muu an de Waterkant. Muden sünd as Raadhusen: Se könen Waren, Arbeiders un Soldaten unnerbrengen. De Soldaten kummen vun sülvst rut, wenn Feinde de Muu angriepen.

source: Your workers and soldiers will find shelter here. Also stores your wares and tools.
target: Brengt diene Lüü un Soldaten unner un verwahrt diene Waren un anner Kraam.

source: Your workers and soldiers will find shelter here. Also stores your wares and tools.
target: Brengt diene Lüü un Soldaten unner un verwahrt diene Waren un anner Kraam.

source: These advanced shields are used by the best soldiers of the Atlanteans. They are produced in the armor smithy and used in the labyrinth – together with food – to train soldiers from defense level 1 to level 2.
target: De besten Atlantisken Soldaten bruken deese goden Schilden. Se worden in de Panzersmee produzeert un in Dwaalwegen – tosammen mit Spiesen – bruukt, um Soldaten vun Verteidigung-Stand 1 up Stand 2 uttobilden.

source: Maximum number of autosave files:
target: Hoogste Tahl vun Dateien vun automatiskem Sekern:

source: Like all Frisians, we build our houses mainly with bricks. We improve them by adding some logs and granite. The roofs are thatched with reed, naturally. Nothing is better suited to keep the rain out.
target: As all Fresen bauen wi uns' Husen in 't Geheel ut Backstenen. Wi verbetern se mit Boomstammen un Flint. De Dacken sünd natürelk Reitdacken. Nix is beter, um de Regen buten to hollen.

source: Our brickmakers have been complaining about a shortage of clay for a while now. No clay means no bricks can be produced, so this shortage is slowing us down a lot. It would be better to build one or two more clay pits, and wells to supply them with water.
target: Ick hebb markt, dat wi siet eeniger Tied keen Lehm mehr hebben. Sünner Lehm könen wi keene Backstenen produzeren; um dat maakst uns deese Unnerversörgung allto vööl langsamer. Wi sallen noch een oder twee Lehmkuhlen bauen, un Wellen, um se mit Water to versörgen.

source: To produce bricks, you need granite; to produce granite, you need a quarry or rock mine; to build those, you need bricks. Take care not to get deadlocked!
target: Um Backstenen to produzeren, bruukst du Flint; um Flint to produzeren, bruukst du een Flintslagerhuus oder een Stenen-Bargwark; um de to bauen, bruukst du Backstenen. Pass up, dat du nich tum Stillstand kummst!

source: Burns bricks using granite and clay, and coal as fuel. Bricks are the most important building material.
target: Brannt Backstenen ut Flint un Lehm. Köhle hollt dat Füür heet. Backstenen sünd dat wichtigste Baumaterial.

source: Digs up mud from the ground and uses water to turn it into clay. Clay is used to make bricks, reinforce the charcoal kiln and to build ships.
target: Grafft Klei ut de Grund un maakt mit Water Lehm daarut. Lehm word bruukt, um Backstenen to brannen, de Holtköhl-Branneree to verbetern un um Schippen to bauen.

source: Clay is made out of water and mud to be turned into bricks, used in ship construction and to improve the charcoal kiln.
target: Lehm word ut Water un Klei maakt. Man bruukt Lehm tum Brannen vun Backstenen, um Schippen to bauen un de Holtköhl-Brannereen to verbetern.

source: Burns bricks out of clay and granite.
target: Brannt Backstenen ut Lehm un Flint.

source: Our brickmakers have been complaining about a shortage of clay for a while now. No clay means no bricks can be produced, so this shortage is slowing us down a lot. It would be better to build one or two more clay pits, and wells to supply them with water.
target: Ick hebb markt, dat wi siet eeniger Tied keen Lehm mehr hebben. Sünner Lehm könen wi keene Backstenen produzeren; um dat maakst uns deese Unnerversörgung allto vööl langsamer. Wi sallen noch een oder twee Lehmkuhlen bauen, un Wellen, um se mit Water to versörgen.

source: A meal is made out of pitta bread, strong beer and fish/meat in a big inn. This substantial food is exactly what workers in a deeper mine need.
target: Een Mahl word in eenem Weertshuus ut Pitta-Brood, Deftigen Beer un Fiss oder Fleesk maakt. Dat is wat de Arbeiders in eenem Bannig deepen Bargwark bruken.

source: Sire, I’ve got good news for you: As I walked to the east, I found a larger mountain. I am not absolutely sure – a geologist should check if I am right – but I believe we could mine marble from some places on the mountain.
target: Mienheer, ick hebb gode Narichten för Ji: As ick na Oosten gahn bün, hebb ick eenen groten Barg funnen. Ick glööv – aver da sall een Schattsöker nakieken – dat wi vun eenigen Steden im Barg Marmel ofboen könen.

source: It would be especially helpful to find more marble, either within fields of rock or in the mountains to mine it.
target: 't is besünners good, wenn wi mehr Marmel finnen, of as Felden vun Stenen oder tum Ofboen in Bargen.

source: Our wood and reed supplies are ensured. Now, we must take care of our brick supply. Bricks are burned in a brick kiln out of granite and clay, so we first need to produce those. On the mainland, we used to cut granite out of rocks, but I don’t see any here. Perhaps these hills contain enough stones to mine some granite.
target: Uns' Versörgung mit Holt un Reit is seker. Nu mutten wi uns um Backstenen kümmern. Backstenen worden in eener Backsteenbranneree ut Flint un Lehm brannt, also mutten wi eerst maal deese produzeren. Up de Fastland hebben wi Flint ut Stenen slagen, aver ick seh hier keene. Villicht is in deesen Höchten genoog Steen, um wat Flint oftoboen.

source: We must start by building all the basic buildings. I see no mountains nearby where we might mine coal. We’d better build a charcoal kiln to burn logs into charcoal. We improve the kilns with clay so they don’t consume so much wood. Our neighbors used to envy us for this clever technique, which they couldn’t copy.
target: Wi mutten daarmit begünnen, all de eenfachen Husen to bauen. Ick seh keene Bargen in de Naberskupp, waar wi Köhle ofboen könen. Wi sallen beter eene Holtköhl-Branneree bauen, um Köhle ut Boomstammen to maken. Wi verbetern de Brannereen mit Lehm, daarmit se nich so vööl Holt bruken. Uns' Nabers hebben uns för deese kloke Technik beniedt, wat se nich namaken kunnen.

source: There is one more thing I’d like to teach you now: Expanding your territory. The place that we started with around our headquarters is barely enough for a basic building infrastructure, and we do not have access to mountains, which we need to mine minerals and coal. So, we have to expand our territory.
target: Een Ding will ick di noch verklaren: Dien Gewest vergrotern. De Rüümte um uns' Raadhuus, waar wi mit anfangen hebben, is jüüst genoog, um eene slichte Wirtschaft to bauen, un wi hebben keene Bargen, wat wi bruuken, um Köhle un Mineraalen oftoboen. Also mutten wi uns' Gewest vergrotern.

source: should mine resource %s, which does not exist in world; tribe is not compatible with world
target: sall de Mineraal %s ofboen, wat 't in deese Welt nich gifft; dat Volk verdraggt sük nich mit de Welt

source: Brews beer out of barley and water. It also brews mead, which is beer refined with honey. Mead is consumed by miners in deep mines and by experienced soldiers.
target: Broot Beer ut Garste un Water. Broot ok Hönnigbeer, also Beer, dat mit Hönnig verbetert is. Soldaten bi'm Öven drinken Hönnigbeer.

source: Brews beer out of barley and water. It also brews mead, which is beer refined with honey. Mead is consumed by miners in deep mines and by experienced soldiers.
target: Broot Beer ut Garste un Water. Broot ok Hönnigbeer, also Beer, dat mit Hönnig verbetert is. Soldaten bi'm Öven drinken Hönnigbeer.

source: Salve Lutius. While talking to all our brave builders, they told me that they have to use all our remaining gold for building the port. So, we won’t have any gold left after our port is build.
target: Salve Lutius. As ick mit uns' dappern Baulüü redt hebb, hebben se mi vertellt, dat se all dat Gold, wat wi över hetten, bruukt hebben, um de Muu to bauen. Wi hebben also keen Gold mehr över, wenn de Muu beschickt is.

source: While we wait, I’ll quickly show you another useful feature. All construction sites look the same, and some buildings look alike. It is sometimes hard to tell them apart. Widelands offers a feature to show label texts over the buildings. They are called the ‘census’ and you can toggle them via the ‘c’ key or via the button on the ‘Watch’ tab of any field.
target: Indes wi wachten wies ick di noch eene nüttelke Instellung. All Bausteden kieken gliek un eenige Husen haast so ut. Mitunner kann man se kuum utnanner hollen. Widelands maakt 't mögelk, Namen över Husen to wiesen. Du kannst de »Namen vun Husen«-Instellung mit de Taste »C« oder de Knoop in de »Beluren«-Listenwessler vun elkeen Feld an- un utknipsen.

source: The lime kiln’s output will only go to construction sites that need it. Those are predominantly houses that work with fire, and some military sites.
target: Waren vun eener Kalkbranneree gahen blot to Bausteden, de Mörtel bruken. Dat sünd vör all Husen, de mit Füür abreiden, un een paar Soldateree-Boen.

source: Works at construction sites to raise new buildings.
target: Warkt up Bausteden, um neje Husen to beschicken.

source: Works at construction sites to raise new buildings.
target: Warkt up Bausteden, um neje Husen to beschicken.

source: Works at construction sites to raise new buildings.
target: Warkt up Bausteden, um neje Husen to beschicken.

source: Works at construction sites to raise new buildings.
target: Warkt up Bausteden, um neje Husen to beschicken.

source: New port construction site is gone
target: Neje Rüümte för Muden is verswunnen

source: Defeat Erwyn. He commands the strongest opposing military force left on this island.
target: Manntje Erwin. He hett de starkste Soldateree up deese Insel.

source: It is amazing how far one can see from the highest tower of the castle. We can watch the whole island. So now I wonder why Lanissa did not see us and thus did not prepare. Be that as it may, some things will never come to the light of day. The only important issue at the moment are the opposing troops still left. We have discovered enemy positions held by Erwyn to the north and east of the castle. He is known to be a strong warlord and surely commands the strongest warriors. In the south, we caught sight of some food infrastructures guarded by Jomo – a younger warlord – and we should take care of those infrastructures so we can cut off our enemies’ food supply.
target: 't is nich to glöven, wo wied man vun de höchsten Toorn im Slött sehn kann. Wi könen de ganze Insel sehn. Wunnerlik, dat Laniss' uns nich sehn un sük för uns rüst hett. Aver egaal, mennig Dingen blieven man unbegriepelk. Wichtig is blot, dat de övrigen Soldatereen noch daar sünd. Wi hebben im Noorden un Oosten vum Slött Stellungen vun Feinden unner Erwin funnen. He is een gewaltiger Kummandant un hett wiss de starksten Soldaten. Im Süden hebben wi de Spiesen-Wirtschaft vun Jomo – een junger Kummandant – funnen, um de wi uns kümmern mutten, um de Spiesen-Versörgung vun uns' Feinden to unnerbreken.

source: Unknown user has left the game (%s)
target: Een of anner hett dat Speel verlaten (%s)

source: Scouts like Scotty the scout scouting unscouted areas in a scouty fashion.
target: Förskt frömde Geweste ut.

source: Scouts like Scotty the scout scouting unscouted areas in a scouty fashion.
target: Förskt frömde Geweste ut.

source: Scouts like Scotty the scout scouting unscouted areas in a scouty fashion.
target: Förskt frömde Geweste ut.

source: I think a stock of 50 sheaves of wheat would be enough for starters. Perhaps we will have to adjust the target quantity for wheat to achieve this.
target: Ick gloov, 50 Strußen Weit sünd eerst maal genoog. Villicht mutten wi de End-Tahl för Weit fastsetten, daarmit dat gaht.

source: Most buildings will only produce something when the stock level in your warehouses falls below the target quantity, so you should indicate the reserve you want to stockpile.
target: De meesten Husen produzeren blot dann wat, wenn diene Kraamhusen minner Waren hebben, as de End-Tahl fastleggt. Du kannst so also fastsetten, wo völe Waren du överhollen willt.

source: The stock menu window gives you an overview over the wares you currently have.
target: Dat Bestand-Fenster wiest di, wat för Waren du upstünds hest.

source: The stock menu window has four tabs. The first (and currently selected) one shows you all your current wares, including those on roads, at flags and inside buildings waiting for processing.
target: Dat Bestand-Fenster hett veer Listenwesslers. De eerste (de jüüst utköört is) wiest all Waren de du hest, ok de, de up Straten un Fahnen sünd oder in Husen wachten, bit se bruukt worden.

source: Switch to the third tab in the stock menu window
target: Köör de darden Listenwessler im Bestand-Fenster ut

source: Have a look at the first two tabs in the stock menu window. They show all the wares and workers you have.
target: Kiek di de twee eersten Listenwesslers im Bestand-Fenster an. Se wiesen all de Waren un Arbeiders, de du hest.

source: You have closed the stock menu window, but I have not yet finished with my explanation. Would you please reopen it and choose the third tab?
target: Du hest dat Bestand-Fenster dichtmaakt, aver ick hebb noch nich alls vertellt. Maakst du 't bidde weer up un köörst de darden Listenwessler ut?

source: You closed the stock menu window before I finished telling you everything about it. If you already know everything, please feel free to leave this tutorial at any time.
target: Du hest dat Bestand-Fenster dichtmaakt ehr ick di alls daaröver vertellt hebb. Wenn du 't all al weetst, kannst du deese Inföhren alltied verlaten.

source: I’ve shown you our stock menu window, where you could see which wares are at the warehouses. You remember?
target: Ick hebb di al de Bestand-Fenster wiest, waar du sehn kannst, wat för Waren in Kraamhusen sünd. Weetst du noch?

source: I know no single master miner who’ll ever work without a nice pint of beer!
target: Ick weet nich eenen eenzigen Besten Bargwarkskeerl, de jemaals sünner eenen goden Pott Beer arbeiden gaht!

source: I see you have already built a quarry and two lumberjack’s huts. That is a good beginning if we want to stay here longer.
target: Ick seh, dat du al een Flintslagerhuus un twee Boomhauer-Husen baut hest. Dat is een goder Anfang, wenn wi hier langer blieven wullen.

source: The lumberjack working at this lumberjack’s hut can’t find any trees in his work area. You should consider dismantling or destroying the building or building a ranger’s hut.
target: De Boomhauer dat warkt bi deese Boomhaueree hett keene Bomen tum Osslaan. Überlegg di, of du dat Huus plattrieten oder ofbrannen willt, oder bau een Boomplanteree.

source: I got the message that our first lumberjack has started his work today. Perhaps it would be a good idea to wait until he has cleared enough space for constructing two more lumberjack’s houses, so that we can harvest the logs faster.
target: Ick bün jüüst wiesworden, dat uns' Boomhauer nu arbeidt. Wi sallen nu wachten, bit he genoog Rüümte freeimaakt hett, dat wi noch twee annere Boomhauereen bauen könen, daarmit wi de Bomen fixer arnten könen.

source: I got the message that our first lumberjack has started his work today. Perhaps it would be a good idea to wait until he has cleared enough space for constructing two more lumberjack’s houses, so that we can harvest the logs faster.
target: Ick bün jüüst wiesworden, dat uns' Boomhauer nu arbeidt. Wi sallen nu wachten, bit he genoog Rüümte freeimaakt hett, dat wi noch twee annere Boomhauereen bauen könen, daarmit wi de Bomen fixer arnten könen.

source: Mead is produced by mead breweries and used in drinking halls for producing meals. Soldiers drink mead during advanced training.
target: Hönnigbeer word vun Brauhusen produzeert un vun Soldaten bi'm Öven drunken.

source: They learn to attack with three different swords: The long sword, broadsword and double-edged sword. The latter two contain gold, and all of them iron. The advanced soldiers are taught to use two swords at once: They keep their first double-edged sword, and are given various other swords to wield in their other hand. This makes six steps of attack training.
target: Se lehren de Angriff mit dree verschedenen Sweerten: Dat Lange, Brede un Tweesneidige Sweert. De lesten twee enthollen Gold, un alle Iesen. De beteren Soldaten bruken twee Sweerten up eenmaal: Se behollen hör eerstes Tweesneidigs Sweert, un kriegen verschedene annere Sweerten, de se mit hör anner Hand föhren könen. Dat sünd all tosamen sess Stappen vun Angriffs-Öven.

source: Enhance the coal mine or the iron mine to a deep mine, and enhance the tavern to an inn.
target: Bau dat Köhle-Bargwark oder dat Iesen-Bargwark to eenem Deepen Bargwark ut un bau de Kneipe to eenem Kroog ut.

source: A normal mine can only dig up about one third of all the resources that lie beneath it; then it must be enhanced to a deep mine in order to keep it working properly. To enhance a building, choose it and then click the appropriate button in the appearing window.
target: Een normaales Bargwark kann blot een Dardel vun all Mineraale daarunner ofboen; dann mutt 't to eenem Deepen Bargwark utbaut worden, daarmit 't wieder arbeiden kann. Um een Huus uttobauen, klick 't an un klick dann de »Utbauen«-Knoop im Huus-Fenster an.

source: Such buildings usually have greater demands than the basic kind of that building – for instance, deep mines need snacks instead of rations. You will have to enhance your tavern to an inn in order to produce snacks out of pitta bread AND a second kind of food (meat or fish) AND beer.
target: Utbaute Husen bruuken meestens mehr Waren as dat normaale Huus – to 'n Bispööl, Deepe Bargwarken bruuken Spiesen un nich Happen. Du mutt diene Kneipe to eenem Kroog utbauen, um Spiesen ut Pitta-Brood UN eener annern Aard vun Eten (Fleesk oder Fiss) UN Beer to produzeren.

source: You may of course enhance all mines to deep mines instantly given you have the workers – bigger mines work a bit faster, smaller mines need cheaper food. It’s up to you which strategy you prefer.
target: Natürelk kannst du all Bargwarken stracks utbauen, wenn du de nödigen Arbeiders hest – deepe Bargwarken arbeiden en bietje gauer, lütte Bargwarken bruuken billigers Eten. Du maakst of, wat di lever is.

source: Bakes honey bread out of barley, water and honey to feed miners in deep mines and soldiers in advanced training.
target: Backt Hönnigbrood ut Garste, Water un Hönnig för de Bargwarkskeerls in Deepen Bargwarken un Soldaten bi'm Öven.

source: Brews beer out of barley and water. It also brews mead, which is beer refined with honey. Mead is consumed by miners in deep mines and by experienced soldiers.
target: Broot Beer ut Garste un Water. Broot ok Hönnigbeer, also Beer, dat mit Hönnig verbetert is. Soldaten bi'm Öven drinken Hönnigbeer.

source: A bigger morsel than the ration to provide miners in deep mines. It is produced in an inn or a big inn out of fish/meat, pitta bread and beer.
target: Wat beters as een Happ, um Bargwarkskeerls in Deepen Bargwarken to versörgen. 't word in eenem Kroog oder Weertshuus ut Fiss/Fleesk, Pitta-Brood un Beer produzeert.

source: If the food supply is steady, the deep gold mine can produce two pieces of gold ore in %s on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all %s twee Goldkluten.

source: If the food supply is steady, the deep iron mine can produce two pieces of iron ore in %s on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert dat Deepe Iesen-Bargwark dör de Bank all %s twee Delen Iesenkluut.

source: If the food supply is steady, the deep coal mine can produce four pieces of coal in %s on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all %s veer Köhlen.

source: If the food supply is steady, the deep rock mine can produce three blocks of granite in %s on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all %s dree Blocken Flint.

source: A meal is made out of pitta bread, strong beer and fish/meat in a big inn. This substantial food is exactly what workers in a deeper mine need.
target: Een Mahl word in eenem Weertshuus ut Pitta-Brood, Deftigen Beer un Fiss oder Fleesk maakt. Dat is wat de Arbeiders in eenem Bannig deepen Bargwark bruken.

source: Build a fortress on the peninsula (near where the Barbarian headquarters stood before). Finally, this will avoid new settlements of other tribes in that region.
target: Bau eene Schanz up de Uthamm (waar vördeem dat Wille Raadhuus stunn). Dann laten sük keene annern Völker in deese Gegend daal.

source: Iron ore, gold ore and coal are mined in the respective mines. The crystal mine will dig for quartz and diamonds – all of them are precious materials and very rarely found. It will produce a lot of granite while searching for them.
target: Iesenkluut, Goldkluut un Köhle worden in de daarna benöögten Bargwarken ofboot. Dat Edelflint-Bargwark söcht na Blinkerflint un Edelstenen – dat sünd dürable Baumaterialien, de leep selten funnen worden. 't produzeert een Bült Flint, as 't daarna söcht.

source: Although ports act as warehouses, you should not build more than necessary: they cost quartz, diamonds and gold, which makes them quite expensive.
target: Muden sünd ok Kraamhusen, aver du sallst nich mehr bauen, as du bruukst: se sünd bannig düür un kösten Blinkerflint, Edelstenen un Gold.

source: These wonderful diamonds are used to build some exclusive buildings. They are mined in a crystal mine.
target: Deese wunnermojen Edelstenen worden för eenige besünners gode Husen bruukt. Se worden in eenem Edelflint-Bargwark ofboot.

source: This is an endless game without rules.
target: Dat is een Speel sünner Enn un Örders.

source: This is an endless game without rules. Fog of war is disabled.
target: Dat is een Speel sünner Enn, Upgaven un Kriegsnevel.

source: Just click on any house symbol next to the rocks, select the small buildings tab in the window that opens up, then click on the quarry symbol.
target: Klick eenfach een of anner Huus-Teken tegen de Stenen an, köör de Listenwessler för de lütten Husen ut un klick dann de Flintslagerhuus-Teken an.

source: The statistics menu is accessed via the second button at the bottom. It provides several windows that give you information about the game.
target: Dat Tahlen-Menü kannst du mit de tweden Knoop am unnern Rand opmaken. 't hett eenige Knopen, de di Informationen över dat Speel geven.

source: On Windows, you can find the file called COPYING.txt in the installation folder, and the Widelands Start menu entry provides a link to this file.
target: Up Linux finnst du de Datei mit de Naam »COPYING.txt« in de List, waar Widelands sekert is, un de Startmenü hett een Verwies up de Datei.

source: Replays are a very useful tool to find bugs in the game logic, so they can be useful as attachments to bug reports. The replay files are saved in the %s directory on Linux and Mac OS X. On Windows, they are in the ‘replays’ subdirectory of your Widelands installation.
target: Uptekens sünd bannig nüttelk, um Fehlers in de Logik vum Speel to finnen, daarum sünd se as Anhang för Fehler-Berichten good. De Upteken-Dateien worden unner Linux un Mac OS X in de List »%s« sekert. Unner Windows sünd se in de List »replays« unner de List, waar Widelands sekert is.

source: The fisher working out of this fisher’s hut can’t find any fish in his work area.
target: De Fisker dat warkt bi deese Fiskeree hett keene Fiske tum Fangen.

source: Out of Fish Ponds
target: Hebb keene Polen mehr

source: Releases animals into the wild to steady the meat production.
target: Lett Deerten in de Wildernis löss, daarmit de Jäger immer wat to jagen hett.

source: Build at least three lumberjack’s houses and two quarries to renew your building material supply chain.
target: Bau tominnst dree Boomhauereen un twee Flintslagerhusen, um de Versörgung mit Baumaterialien weer torechttomaken.

source: Connect your quarry construction site to your headquarters with a road. You would have been put directly into road building mode after ordering a new site. But now, you aren’t.
target: Verbinn de Baustee för dat Baustee över eene Straat mit dienem Raadhuus. Nadeem du eene neue Baustee beschickt hest, büst du egentlik klaar tum Stratenbauen. Nu büst du 't aver nich.

source: Now we know what’s going on. Let’s wait for the quarries to finish.
target: Nu weten wi, wat passeert. Laat uns wachten bit beide Flintslagerhusen kumpleet sünd.

source: Well done! Let’s see how messages work in a real game, shall we? For this, I’ll take all rocks away from the poor stonemasons in the quarries. They will then send a message each that they can’t find any in their work areas the next time they try to do some work.
target: Hunnert! Laat uns nu sehn, för wat Narichten in eenem echten Speel good sünd, inverstahn? Ick graps nu all Stenen vun de bedurelk Flintslagers in de Flintslagerhusen of. Beide schicken dann eene Naricht, dat se in hör Naberskuppen keene Stenen mehr finnen könen, wenn se weer arbeiden willen.

source: You received some messages. See how the button at the bottom of the screen has changed appearance? You can destroy the quarries now as they are no longer of any use and just blocking space. To do so, there are two possibilities:
target: Du hest een paar Narichten kregen. Hest du spitzkregen, wo sük de Knoop an de unnern Rand vum Bildschirm verännert hett? Du kannst de Flintslagerhusen nu ofrieten, denn se sünd nu unnütz un Stah-in-de-Wegen. 't gifft twee Aarden, dat to doon:

source: Since our quarries are useless now, you can destroy them and reuse the space later on.
target: Uns' Flintslagerhusen sünd nu unnütz, du kannst se ofrieten un de Rüümte naher weer bruuken.

source: The Atlanteans produce granite blocks in quarries and crystal mines.
target: De Atlantinger produzeren Blocken vun Flint in Flintslagerhusen un Edelflint-Bargwarken.

source: The Barbarians produce granite blocks in quarries and granite mines.
target: De Willen Lüü produzeren Blocken vun Flint in Flintslagerhusen un Flint-Bargwarken.

source: The Frisians produce granite blocks in quarries and rock mines. They can be refined in a brick kiln.
target: De Fresen produzeren Blocken vun Flint in Flintslagerhusen un Stenen-Bargwarken. Se könen in eener Backsteenbranneree verbetert worden.

source: The Empire produces granite blocks in quarries and marble mines.
target: Dat Latienske Riek produzeert Blocken vun Flint in Flintslagerhusen un Marmel-Bargwarken.

source: Replace the two forester’s houses by new ones to increase productivity.
target: Wessel de twee Förster-Husen dör neje ut, um de Wöörde to verhogen.

source: Build at least one woodcutter’s house and two forester’s houses to start producing logs, and a reed farm to start growing reed.
target: Bau tominnst eene Boomslageree un twee Förster-Husen, um Boomstammen to produzeren, un eene Reitbuurderee, um Reit antobauen.

source: The player with the color of the flag. If more than one client selected the same color, these share control over the player (‘shared kingdom mode’).
target: De Speler mit de Farv vun de Fahn. Wenn mehr as een Speler desülvige Farv utköört, deelen se de Kuntroll över deesen Speler (Speelaard »Riek in Stücken«).

source: The latter three can only be set by the hosting client by left-clicking the ‘type’ button of a player. Hosting players can also set the initialization of each player (the set of buildings, wares and workers the player starts with) and the tribe and team for computer players.
target: De lesten dree könen blot vun de Weert fastleggt worden, indeem he de »Aard«-Knoop vun eenem Speler mit de linken Muustaste anklickt. De Weert kann ok de Instellungen för elkeen Speler (de Husen, Waren un Arbeiders wat de Speler mit anfangt) un de Volk un Klottje för künstelke Spelers.

source: The double trident is one of the best tridents produced by the Atlantean weapon smithy. It is used in a dungeon – together with food – to train soldiers from attack level 2 to level 3.
target: De Dubbelte Dreespitz is eener vun de besten Dreespitzen, de de Atlantiske Wapensmee produzert. 't word in Gefahrelken Gangen – tosammen mit Spiesen – bruukt, um Soldaten vun Angriff-Stand 2 up Stand 3 uttobilden.

source: This is the most dangerous weapon of the Atlantean military. Only the best of the best soldiers may use it. It is produced in the weapon smithy and used in the dungeon – together with food – to train soldiers from attack level 3 to level 4.
target: Dat is de gefahrelkste Wapen, de de Atlantiske Soldateree hett. Blot de besten Soldaten bruken 't. 't word in de Wapensmee produzeert un in Gefahrelken Gangen – tosammen mit Spiesen – bruukt, um Soldaten vun Angriff-Stand 3 up Stand 4 uttobilden.

source: The long trident is the first trident in the training of soldiers. It is produced in the weapon smithy and used in the dungeon – together with food – to train soldiers from attack level 0 to level 1.
target: De Lange Dreespitz is de eerste Wapen, de Soldaten bi'm Öven kriegen. 't word in de Wapensmee produzeert un in Gefahrelken Gangen – tosammen mit Spiesen – bruukt, um Soldaten vun Angriff-Stand 0 up Stand 1 uttobilden.

source: This is the medium trident. It is produced in the weapon smithy and used by advanced soldiers in the dungeon – together with food – to train from attack level 1 to level 2.
target: Dat is de middelste Dreespitz. 't word in de Wapensmee produzeert un in Gefahrelken Gangen – tosammen mit Spiesen – bruukt, um Soldaten vun Angriff-Stand 1 up Stand 2 uttobilden.

source: After losing an important battle against the barbarians which lead to the loss of a big part of the Empire’s territory, Lutius leaves Fremil to start a new life. But his destiny takes his ship into a heavy storm, which nearly destroys it. Only with a lot of luck he manages to beach his damaged ship on an unknown desert strand and save his people. For now.
target: Nadeem he eene wichtige Slacht tegen de Willen Lüü un eenen groten Part vun de Land vun de Latiensken Riek verloren hett, verlett Lutjus Freemilt un begünnt een nejes Leven. Aver sien Schipp word vun de Slag in eenen Kohstörm föhrt un haast verneelt. Nix as Glück vergünnt hüm, mit de ramponeerten Schipp up eenen frömden Strand uptolopen un siene Lüü to redden. Vöreerst.

source: These advanced shields are used by the best soldiers of the Atlanteans. They are produced in the armor smithy and used in the labyrinth – together with food – to train soldiers from defense level 1 to level 2.
target: De besten Atlantisken Soldaten bruken deese goden Schilden. Se worden in de Panzersmee produzeert un in Dwaalwegen – tosammen mit Spiesen – bruukt, um Soldaten vun Verteidigung-Stand 1 up Stand 2 uttobilden.

source: If the food supply is steady, the gold mine can produce one piece of gold ore in %s on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all %s Goldkluut.

source: A golden helmet protects soldiers. It is produced in the large armor smithy and used to train soldiers from health level 1 to level 2.
target: Een Goldener Helm schütt Soldaten. 't word in de Groten Wapensmee produzeert un bruukt, um Soldaten vun Gesundheid-Stand 1 up Stand 2 uttobilden.

source: Here in the northern part, you only have a goldmine and a warehouse. While the miners are supplied well with food, there is no way to transport the gold ore to our smelting works in the southern part.
target: Hier im Noorden hest du nix as een Gold-Bargwark un een Kraamhuus. De Bargwarkskeerls kriggen Spiesen satt, aver wi könen de Goldkluten nich to de Smeltwarken im Süden transporteren.

source: If the food supply is steady, the deep gold mine can produce two pieces of gold ore in %s on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all %s twee Goldkluten.

source: A golden helmet protects soldiers. It is produced in the large armor smithy and used to train soldiers from health level 1 to level 2.
target: Een Goldener Helm schütt Soldaten. 't word in de Groten Wapensmee produzeert un bruukt, um Soldaten vun Gesundheid-Stand 1 up Stand 2 uttobilden.

source: Your high wooden tower discovered an aggressor.
target: Dien Grote Holten Toorn hett Feinde to sehn kregen.

source: Your high wooden tower is under attack.
target: Feinde griepen dienen Groten Holten Toorn an.

source: Build a training camp, some barracks and an arena or colosseum to train your soldiers.
target: Bau een Övens-Lager, eene Kasern un eenen Ring oder Groten Ring, um Soldaten uttobilden.

source: Your high tower discovered an aggressor.
target: Dien Grote Toorn hett Feinde to sehn kregen.

source: Your high tower is under attack.
target: Feinde griepen dienen Groten Toorn an.

source: Geologists, builders, blacksmiths and helmsmiths all need a hammer. Make sure you’ve always got some in reserve! They are one of the basic tools produced at the metal workshop (but cease to be produced by the building if it is enhanced to an ax workshop and war mill).
target: Schattsökers, Baukeerls, Wapensmidds un Panzersmidds bruken all eenen Klöpper. Pass up, dat du alltied welke över hest! Se worden as elkeen Warktüüg in de Metalldreihbank produzeert (aver nich mehr, wenn dat Huus to eener Extensmede oder Oorlogs-Smee utbaut word).

source: Let’s hope that Lanissa – the warlord holding sway over that castle – has not discovered our movements yet. Perhaps we have a chance of conquering that mighty building without a bigger fight! However, it is essential that we capture it. It will be the key to our reign over this island!
target: Hopentlik hett uns Laniss' – de Kummandantin, de dat Slött kuntrolleert – noch nich funnen. Villicht könen wi deesen gewaltigen Boo sünner grote Slachten innehmen! Wi mutten 't driest innehmen. 't is de Slötel tum Seggen över deese Insel!

source: Great! Erwyn gave up when he saw his last buildings burning down. That’s one less strong warlord on this island!
target: Hunnert! Erwin hett upgeven as he siene lesten Husen ofbrannen sach. Dat is een machtiger Kummandant minner up de Insel!

source: Great! Jomo gave up when he saw his last buildings burning down. That’s one less warlord on this island!
target: Hunnert! Jomo hett upgeven as he siene lesten Husen ofbrannen sach. Dat is een Kummandant minner up de Insel!

source: In this scenario, the higher production buildings including mining will be introduced.
target: Deese Rutfödderung stellt de hogern Husen un Bargwarks vör.

source: This tutorial explains the handling of military and training site buildings and will introduce fighting.
target: Deese Inföhren verklaart Soldateree- un Övens-Boen un Slachten.

source: In this tutorial, you will learn how to navigate in Widelands and how to build buildings and roads.
target: In deese Inföhren lehrst du, wo dat Torechtfinnen in Widelands gaht un wo man Husen un Straten baut.

source: Large plots are rare on those small islands. Prioritize construction of large buildings on them. Sometimes you will need big military buildings to expand all the way to the next island. The AI will perform poorly.
target: Up deesen lütten Insels gifft 't kuum Rüümte för grote Husen. Daar sallst du daarher grote Husen bauen. Mitunner bruukst du grote Soldateree-Boen, um de anner Insel to faten to kriegen. Künstelk Spelers könen hier nich good spölen.

source: Ensure the supply of building wares
target: De Versörgung mit Baumaterialien sekern

source: Supply Building Wares
target: Baumaterialien-Versörgung

source: Supply basic building material for your economy:
target: Versörg diene Wirtschaft mit de wichtigsten Baumaterialien:

source: Food is very important for mines and military training areas. Establish a well working food environment by building at least one farm, one blackroot farm and a mill. The two kinds of flour together with water from a well will be baked into bread in a bakery, so build a bakery and a well, too.
target: Spiesen sünd leep wichtig för Bargwarken un Övens-Boen för Soldaten. Bau eene gode Versörgung mit Spiesen up, indeem du tominnst eene Buurderee, eene Swartwuddel-Buurderee un eene Möhlen baust. De twee Aarden vun Mehl worden mit Water ut eener Well in eener Backeree to Brood backen, bau also ok eene Backeree un eene Well.

source: The weavers produce spidercloth and tabards in the weaving mill. Spidercloth is needed for the construction of some buildings and clothing, while tabards are the uniforms of soldiers. The weaving mill needs gold thread and spider silk as raw material. Spider silk is produced by the spider farm, while gold thread is produced by the gold spinning mill out of gold.
target: De Spinners produzeren Spinnenstoff un Kluften in de Spinnweelmöhlen. Spinnenstoff word bruukt, um eenige Husen to bauen un Kleer to maken; Soldaten dragen Kluften. De Spinnweelmöhlen bruukt Goldwulle un Spinnensied as ruge Materialien. Spinnensied word vun de Spinnentüchteree produzeert, un Goldwulle vun de Goldspinneree ut Gold maakt.

source: Build a shipyard close to the lake to start building ships
target: Bau eene Warft dicht bi de Meer, um Schippen to bauen

source: Build military buildings (like sentries or barriers) to expand your territory.
target: Bau Soldateree-Boen (to 'n Bispööl Wachters-Kamers un Uppassen), um dien Gewest to vergrotern.

source: Start building mines on the mountain
target: Bau Bargwarken up de Barg

source: Other ways to produce food – different kinds of food – are fishers and farms. The wheat of the farms has to be processed with water in a bakery before it becomes edible. You can obtain water by building a well on a spot where your geologists have found a water source.
target: Annere Wege, Spiesen – annere Aarden vun Spiesen – to produzeren, sünd Fiskers un Buurdereen. De Weit vun Buurdereen mutt mit Water in eener Backeree verarbeidt worden, ehr man 't eten kann. Du kriggst Water, indeem du eene Well an eener Stee baust, waar een Schattsöker Water funnen hett.

source: Enhance buildings and build a micro brewery
target: Bau Husen ut un bau eene Lütte Broeree

source: Bigger and better buildings – including all military ones – require better building materials. They cannot be built out of simple logs – the logs have to be refined to blackwood by a wood hardener first. Always remember to build a wood hardener before you run out of blackwood, as without it you cannot expand.
target: Grote un betere Husen – un alle Soldateree-Boen – bruuken betere Baumaterialien. Se könen nich blot mit Boomstammen baut worden – de Boomstammen mutten eerst vun eener Holtharderee to Haartholt verbetert worden. Bau immer tiedig eene Holtharderee, denn wenn du keen Haartholt mehr hest, kannst du dien Gewest nich mehr vergrotern.

source: Better buildings may also require other improved materials besides blackwood. One of these is grout, which is produced out of granite, water and coal by a lime-burner.
target: Grotere Husen bruuken noch annere gode Materialien as Haartholt. Eens daarvun is Mörtel, wat vun eenem Kalkbranner ut Flint, Water un Köhle produzeert word.

source: You can obtain water by building a well upon a water source, which your geologists can discover when you send them to any flag that is not on a mountain.
target: Du kannst Water vun eener Well kriegen, de up eener Quell baut word; Schattsökers finnen Quellen, wenn du se to elkeen Fahn schickst, de nich up eenem Barg staht.

source: Coal can be obtained by building a charcoal kiln or a coal mine. Burning charcoal out of logs is slow. You should only build a charcoal kiln when no coal is available.
target: Köhle kriggst du, indeem du eene Holtköhl-Branneree oder een Köhle-Bargwark baust. Holtköhl ut Boomstammen to brannen is langsaam; daarum sallst du Holtköhl-Brannereen blot dann bauen, wenn 't keene Köhle in Bargen gifft.

source: Boldreth seems more and more torn as the days go by. The spirits of my fellows sink as the cold season approaches, and we are still living in no more than huts and barracks. I never intended to stay out here in the wilderness for so long – but I never thought my brothers would engage in this senseless battle for so long either.
target: As de Dagen vörbigahn, kummt mi Boldreth mehr un mehr rumrieten vör. Miene Kameraden verlesen hör Mood as de kolle Tied nahder kummt, un wi leven immer noch in nix as Kaaten un Brattsen. Ick harr nooit vörhatt, so lang in de Wildernis to blieven – aver ick hett ok nooit docht, dat se sük so lang mit deesem unnützen Krieg befaten.

source: Start collecting basic building materials, and fortify the camp.
target: Fang an, eenfache Baumaterialien to sammeln, un seker dat Lager.

source: But unfortunately the logs are useless for repairing our ship – we need to turn them into planks, which are needed by every ship and every bigger building too. So we should build a sawmill – as soon as we have enough space for this.
target: Leider sünd Boomstammen unnütz, um dat Schipp to repareren – wi mutten Planken daarut maken, de wi för 't Schipp un all grotern Husen bruuken. Also sallen wi eene Saagmöhlen bauen – sobald wi daar genoog Rüümte för hebben.

source: The repair of our ship will take a few weeks, anyway, and the resources we harvest now might be the base of strong and big buildings in another land.
target: Uns' Schipp to repareren düürt sowieso eenige Weken, un wat wi nu arnten, kann de Grundlage för grote, machtige Husen in eenem annern Land sien.

source: Build stronger military buildings, such as an outpost, a barrier or a tower, on the eastern frontier.
target: Bau starke Soldateree-Boen, to 'n Bispööl eene Butenstee, een Uppass oder eenen Toorn, an de oostelke Grenz.

source: Attack and completely destroy the Barbarian buildings as soon as you have enough soldiers.
target: Griep de Willen Husen an un verneel se kumpleet, sobald du genoog Soldaten hest.

source: But until that day, many years may pass! For now, we must concentrate on the present, and build a few lumberjack’s houses and a sawmill to produce some basic building materials.
target: Aver dat sall noch mennig Jahren of sien! Eerst maal mutten wi uns um de Gegenwart kümmern un een paar Boomhauereen un eene Saagmöhlen bauen, um wichtige Baumaterialien to produzeren.

source: Again, I felt like I was in paradise when I noticed that some marble-like stones were among the rocks. It seems that we will soon be able to build strong, luxurious buildings, like those we were accustomed to in Fremil.
target: Ick hebb mi weer as im Paradies föhlt, as ick sehn hebb, dat eenige vun de Stenen as Marmel utkieken. Wi könen wull bold machtige, moje Husen bauen, as wi se in Freemilt hetten.

source: Good news! Today our wood economy was completed. Now we can be sure that we will have enough wood for our future building projects.
target: Hunnert! Uns' Holt-Wirtschaft is nu kumpleet. Nu weten wi, dat wi för neje Bauvörhebbens genoog Holt hebben.

source: Anyway, we must build stronger military buildings as soon as possible.
target: Wi mutten so fix as mögelk machtigere Soldateree-Boen bauen.

source: That’s good. The first big military building is complete and the mining infrastructure is getting better and better. Now we should think about preparing ourselves for battle.
target: Hunnert. De eerste grote Soldateree-Boo is beschickt, un de Bargwarks-Wirtschaft word immer beter. Nu könen wi uns för de Slacht torechtmaken.

source: Produce cloth for building our first ship
target: Produzeer Stoff för uns' eerstes Schipp

source: As we don’t know how many resources we can get, we should be very restrictive in spending them. Even for military buildings, we should be very careful.
target: Wi weten nich, wo völe Materialien wi kriegen könen, also sallen wi blot nich to vööle verklüngeln. Ok för Soldateree-Boen mutten wi leep good uppassen.

source: But although this is a good step forward, I can’t see much space for buildings. The whole island is littered with rocks. How can we ever build a new ship or even have some basic infrastructure to make our lives more comfortable?
target: Dat is wull een goder Stapp vöran, aver ick seh heel minn Rüümte för Husen. De hele Insel is vull mit Stenen. Wo könen wi jemaals een nejes Schipp bauen oder blot eene eenfache Wirtschaft hebben, um uns' Levens liedsamer to maken?

source: This is a great step forward in constructing advanced buildings. And we can think of using some planks to build new ships.
target: Dat is een verdüllt goder Stapp vöran, um grotere Husen to bauen. Un wi könen daaröver nadenken, een paar Planken för neje Schippen to bruken.

source: Now we truly can look forward to building some ships. So, we should build a shipyard as well.
target: Nu könen wi würrelk bold anfangen, eenige Schippen to bauen. Wi sallen daarum ok eene Warft bauen.

source: So, we need more cloth to finally be able to build ships. But there is no space on the island for building a whole economy to produce cloth. Therefore, we need to build the necessary wares step by step.
target: WI bruken also mehr Stoff, um ennelk Schippen bauen to könen. Aver 't gifft nich genoog Rüümte up de Insel, um eene kumpleete Wirtschaft, um Stoff to produzeren, uptobauen. Daarum mutten wi de nödigen Waren Stapp för Stapp sammeln.

source: Now that we have all resources ready for building a ship, we should explore the surrounding islands.
target: Nu dat wi alle Materialien paraat hebben, um een Schipp to bauen, sallen wi de Inseln umto utförsken.

source: Salve Lutius. While talking to all our brave builders, they told me that they have to use all our remaining gold for building the port. So, we won’t have any gold left after our port is build.
target: Salve Lutius. As ick mit uns' dappern Baulüü redt hebb, hebben se mi vertellt, dat se all dat Gold, wat wi över hetten, bruukt hebben, um de Muu to bauen. Wi hebben also keen Gold mehr över, wenn de Muu beschickt is.

source: If there are difficulties with building all the buildings needed, we should think about all we have learned so far. We can cut down all the rocks. We should perhaps optimize our roads to free up some building sites, or even dismantle some military buildings to obtain more space for our economy.
target: Wenn 't nich gaht, all de nödigen Husen to bauen, mutten wi över dat nadenken, wat wi bit nu lehrt hebben. Wi könen all de Stenen ofslagen. Wi könen villicht uns' Stratennett verbetern, um wat Rüümte för Husen freei to maken, oder ok een paar Soldateree-Boen plattrieten, um mehr Rüümte för uns' Wirtschaft to kriegen.

source: I’m just kidding. Of course we should spare as much gold as we can for building an arena and other buildings to train our soldiers.
target: Blot Spaaß. Natürelk mutten wi so vööl Gold as wi könen upheven, um eenen Ring uns annere Boen, um uns' Soldaten uttobilden, to bauen.

source: Lutius. I really appreciate that you and Saledus are so concerned about our security. But I think we could use the little space on this island better than by building a lot of military buildings.
target: Lutjus. Ick acht dat würrelk, dat du un Saledus so besörgt um uns' Sekerheid sünd. Aver ick gloov, wi können dat bietje Rüümte up deeser Insel beter bruken, as Bülten vun Soldateree-Boen to bauen.

source: I strongly recommend dismantling most of them to be able to build industrial buildings. I don’t think there is much danger on this island, but if you want to be cautious, you can keep some sentries or blockhouses near the coastline.
target: Du sallst würrelk de meesten daarvun plattrieten, um daar Husen för uns' Wirtschaft to bauen. Ick gloov nich, dat 't up deeser Insel völe Gefahren gifft, aver wenn du vörsichtig wesen willt, kannst du een paar Wachters-Kamers oder Wachters-Kamerkes an de Küst stahn laten.

source: But be careful not to waste any bigger building spots.
target: Aver pass up, dat du de groten Rüümte nich verklüngelst.

source: We need some cloth as well for producing armor in our armor smithy. We need it to build some of the training buildings for our soldiers. And most important and most imminent of all, we need it to send out expeditions.
target: Wi bruken ok wat Stoff, um Wapenrocken ins uns' Panzersmee to produzeren. Wi bruken 't för eenige vun de Övens-Boen för uns' Soldaten. Un dat wichtigste un drockste is, wi bruken 't, um Söken uttorüsten.

source: Sire, we have all buildings available for training our soldiers, but we should increase our efforts to train them to the highest level and to train more of them.
target: Mienheer, wie hebben all Husen paraat, de wi bruken, um uns' Soldaten uttobilden, aver wi mutten uns' Anstrengens verhogen, um mehr vun hör un uttobilden un up de hoogsten Stand.

source: Dismantle all unproductive small buildings to get some resources for new buildings.
target: Riet all unnützen lütten Husen platt, um Materialien för neje Husen to kriegen.

source: Remember to check the messages and the building statistics for unproductive buildings.
target: Vergeet nich, in de Narichten un Tahlen över Husen natokieken, um unnütze Husen to finnen.

source: Build at least three lumberjack’s houses and two quarries to renew your building material supply chain.
target: Bau tominnst dree Boomhauereen un twee Flintslagerhusen, um de Versörgung mit Baumaterialien weer torechttomaken.

source: Amalea restricts the building possibilities…
target: Amalee' minnerseert de kansen tum Bauen …

source: Gather building materials
target: Sammel Baumaterialien

source: Stockpile Building Materials
target: Pottje Baumaterialien

source: This is as good a place as any to start building our new home. First of all, we must ensure a stable supply of basic building materials.
target: Deese Stee is so good as elkeen annere, um uns neje Heimaad to gründen. Toeerst mutten wi uns um eene gode Versörgung mit allen Baumaterialien kümmern.

source: You did well. Our entire building material production is working now. Let’s wait until we have gathered some more materials. We could expand our territory some more, to see what else can be found on this island.
target: Hunnert. Wi könen nu all de nödigen Baumaterialien produzeren. Laat uns wachten, bit wi eenige Materialien sammelt hebben. Wi könen nu uns' Gewest vergrotern, um to sehn, wat 't noch up deese Hallig gifft.

source: I noticed we have been short of reed for a while now. Our buildings seem to need quite a lot of it. We should build another reed farm or two. Reed is also used for making fishing nets and other tools; therefore, resolving this shortage should be a priority.
target: Ick hebb markt, dat wi siet eeniger Tied keen Reit mehr hebben. Uns' Husen bruken daar wull Bülten vun. Wi sallen noch een oder twee Reitbuurderee bauen. Wi bruken Reit ok, um Fiskernette un anners Warktüüg to produzeren; um dat mutten wi deese Unnerversörgung so fix as mögelk behelpen.

source: I noticed we are running out of bricks. This slows down construction of our buildings a lot, since we need so many bricks. We should really start to construct another brick kiln, and assign it the highest priority for bricks in the construction site window so as to resolve the shortage as soon as possible.
target: Ick hebb markt, dat wi keene Backstenen mehr hebben. Dat maakt dat Beschicken vun uns' Husen mennig langsamer, um dat, dat wi so völe Backstenen bruken. Wi sallen absolut noch eene Backsteenbranneree bauen un im Baustee-Fenster de hoogste Wichtigkeid för Backstenen instellen, um de Unnerversörgung so fix as mögelk to behelpen.

source: I advise to build all those buildings within a short distance of each other, and to construct two warehouses nearby: One should be set to store only weapons, armor, ores, metal and coal; the other to store building materials.
target: Ick raad an, dat all deese Husen dicht binanner baut worden, un twee Kraamhusen in de Naberskupp: För eens sall fastleggt worden, dat 't nix as Wapen, Panzers, Kluten, Metallen un Köhle verwahrt; de anner sall Baumaterialien upbewahren.

source: We should also build other related buildings nearby, such as a furnace, and some wells and farms to supply the reindeer farm. This design will make our military economy more efficient, because it reduces the waiting time for wares in the processing buildings.
target: Wi sallen ok annere verwandte Husen in de Naberskupp bauen, wull eene Smelteree, un een paar Wellen un Buurdereen, um de Sneeihirsktüchteree to versörgen. As dat plaant is, is uns' Soldateree-Wirtschaft profitelker, wiel de Tied, waar de Husen up Waren tum Verarbeiden wachten mutten, so körter is.

source: The scouts informed me that the enemy can’t build towers. We could build a fortress, which is the building that will push the border as far east as possible in one go. The enemy will only be able to see it if they build a fortress right at the border.
target: De Bespejers hebben mi seggt, dat de Feind keene Toorns bauen kann. Wi könen eene Schanz bauen; dat is de Boo, wat de Grenz so wied na Oosten schufft as dat mitmaal gaht. De Feind kann se blot dann sehn, wenn he eene Schanz dicht bi de Grenz baut.

source: My scouts no longer report any signs of living creatures nearby. We will start building our new home here.
target: Miene Bespejers hebben keene levigen Beesten mehr in de Naberskupp funnen. Wi fangen hier an, uns' neje Heimaad to bauen.

source: We must start by building all the basic buildings. I see no mountains nearby where we might mine coal. We’d better build a charcoal kiln to burn logs into charcoal. We improve the kilns with clay so they don’t consume so much wood. Our neighbors used to envy us for this clever technique, which they couldn’t copy.
target: Wi mutten daarmit begünnen, all de eenfachen Husen to bauen. Ick seh keene Bargen in de Naberskupp, waar wi Köhle ofboen könen. Wi sallen beter eene Holtköhl-Branneree bauen, um Köhle ut Boomstammen to maken. Wi verbetern de Brannereen mit Lehm, daarmit se nich so vööl Holt bruken. Uns' Nabers hebben uns för deese kloke Technik beniedt, wat se nich namaken kunnen.

source: The scouts reported that the lands to the north are rugged hills, beautiful to behold but not suited for buildings. Let’s find out what we can discover in the south.
target: De Bespejers mellen, dat dat Land im Noorden ruge Höchten sünd, mooi tum Ankieken, aver för Husen nich to bruken. Laat uns rutfinnen, wat wi im Süden finnen könen.

source: However, we can already start focusing on recruiting and training soldiers. We can now afford to use metal for weapons, helmets and garments. I propose building armor smithies, a barracks, a training arena and a tailor’s shop now.
target: Aver wi könen al begünnen, uns um dat Anhüren un Utbilden vun Soldaten to kümmern. Wi könen uns nu günnen, Metall för Wapen, Helms un Kluften to bruken. Ick slaa vör, nu Wapensmeden, eene Kasern, eene Övens-Ring un eene Sniederee to bauen.

source: It is easier to understand what type of buildings can be built on which field when the symbols for the building spaces are enabled.
target: 't is lichter to verstahn, up welken Felden wat för Husen baut worden könen, wenn de Tekens för de Rüümten tum Bauen wesen worden.

source: The minimap shows the complete map in miniature. You can directly jump to any field by left-clicking on it. You can also toggle buildings, roads, flags and player indicators on and off inside the minimap.
target: De Lütte Kaart wiest de kumplete Kaart in Lütt. Du kannst stracks to eenem Feld springen, indeem du mit de linke Muustaste daarup klickst. Du kannst ok Wieser för Husen, Straten, Fahnen un Spelers in de Lütt Kaart an- un utknipsen.

source: If you place something on a field, the surrounding fields might have less space for holding buildings, so choose your fields wisely.
target: Wenn du up eenem Feld wat baust, hebben de Felden umto minner Rüümte för Husen, also överlegg di good, waar du wat baust.

source: the road building symbol.
target: dat Stratenbau-Teken utköörst.

source: If you decide you do not want to build a road at this time, you can cancel road building by clicking on the starting flag of the road and selecting
target: Wenn du jüüst doch keene Straat bauen willt, kannst du dat Stratenbauen ofbreken, indeem du up de Anfangs-Fahn klickst un

source: Excellent! To enter road building mode for any flag, left-click on a flag and select
target: Hunnert! Du kannst mit de Straten-Bauen vun elkeen Fahn anfangen, indeem du eene Fahn mit de linken Muustaste anklickst un

source: If you decide that you do not want to build a road at this time, you can cancel road building by clicking on the starting flag of the road and selecting
target: Wenn du jüüst doch keene Straat bauen willt, kannst du dat Stratenbauen ofbreken, indeem du up de Anfangs-Fahn klickst un

source: Now, about this road. I’ll enter the road building mode and then make it longer by one field at a time by left-clicking multiple times on neighboring fields for perfect control over the route the road takes, like so:
target: Ennelk de Straat. Ick maak mi klaar tum Stratenbauen un maak de Straat langer um een Feld up eenmaal, indeem ick mennigmaal mit de linke Muustaste up een benaberts Feld klick. So kann ick de Verloop vun de Straat akkeraat fastleggen. Also so:

source: While we wait, I’ll quickly show you another useful feature. All construction sites look the same, and some buildings look alike. It is sometimes hard to tell them apart. Widelands offers a feature to show label texts over the buildings. They are called the ‘census’ and you can toggle them via the ‘c’ key or via the button on the ‘Watch’ tab of any field.
target: Indes wi wachten wies ick di noch eene nüttelke Instellung. All Bausteden kieken gliek un eenige Husen haast so ut. Mitunner kann man se kuum utnanner hollen. Widelands maakt 't mögelk, Namen över Husen to wiesen. Du kannst de »Namen vun Husen«-Instellung mit de Taste »C« oder de Knoop in de »Beluren«-Listenwessler vun elkeen Feld an- un utknipsen.

source: Similar to this are the building statistics, which are also toggled via a button on the ‘Watch’ tab of any field. The hotkey for it is ‘s’. This will display information about the productivity of buildings or the progress of construction sites.
target: Verwandt daarmit sünd de Tahlen över Husen, de du ok mit eenem Knoop in de »Beluren«-Listenwessler vun elkeen Feld an- un utknipsen kannst. De Handigtaste is »S«. Dat wiest Informationen över de Wöörde vun Husen un wo vööl vun eener Baustee al beschickt is.

source: Hi, it’s me again! This time, I have sent you a message. Messages are sent to you by Widelands to inform you about important events: empty mines, attacks on your tribe, won or lost military buildings, resources found…
target: Moin, ick bün 't weer! Nu hebb ick di eene Naricht schickt. Widelands schickt di Narichten, um di vun Vörfallen vun Belang weten to laten: Wenn een Bargwark leeg is, dien Volk angrepen word, Soldateree-Boen innohmen oder verloren worden, Mineraale funnen worden …

source: Expanding is as simple as building a military building at the edge of your territory. The Barbarians have a selection of different military buildings: sentries, barriers, towers, fortresses and citadels. The bigger the building, the more expensive it is to build, but the more land it will conquer around itself and the more soldiers can be stationed there. The buildings also vary in their vision range: buildings with a tower see farther than others.
target: Vergrotern is ganz licht: Du baust een Soldateree-Boo dicht bi de Grenz vun dien Gewest. De Willen Lüü hebben verschedene Soldateree-Boen: Wachters-Kamers, Uppassen, Toorns, Schanzen un Kastelen. So groter de Boo is, so dürer is 't, aver 't nimmt mehr Land in un kann mehr Soldaten upnehmen. De Boen hebben unglieke Utsichtswiedten: Boen mit Toorns sehn wieder as anners.

source: As soon as a military building is manned, it will extend your land. I will tell your more about military buildings in another tutorial.
target: Sobold een Soldateree-Boo besett is, vergrotert 't dien Gewest. In eener annern Inföhren vertell ick di mehr över Soldateree-Boen.

source: Let’s try it out now: build a military building on your border.
target: Versöök 't nu: Bau een Soldateree-Boo nah bi de Grenz.

source: The sentry is the only military site that fits on a small building plot. If your lumberjack has cleared enough space, you can also build another military building.
target: De Wachters-Kamer is de eenzigst Soldateree-Boo, wat up Rüümte för lütte Husen passt. Wenn dien Boomhauer genoog Rüümte freeimaakt hett, kannst du ok een annern Soldateree-Boo bauen.

source: In Widelands, it is necessary to build many buildings, which take up a lot of space. To expand your territory, you have to build military buildings next to your border. Every tribe has several military buildings.
target: In Widelands mutt du völe Husen bauen, de mennig Rüümte bruuken. Um dien Gewest to vergrotern mutt du immer Soldateree-Boen dicht bi de Grenz bauen. All Völker hebben eenige Soldateree-Boen.

source: The Barbarians have four different military buildings you can build: the sentry (small), the barrier and the tower (both medium) and the fortress (big). Just choose the one you like most.
target: De Willen Lüü hebben veer Soldateree-Boen, wat du bauen kannst: De Wachters-Kamer (lütt), de Uppass un de Toorn (beide middelmatig) un de Schanz (grot). Köör dat ut, wat du am meesten magst.

source: Remember that big buildings (green icon) cannot be built on small (red) or medium (yellow) building plots, but buildings can be built on a building plot that provides more space than they need. You should always keep that in mind when you search for a suitable place.
target: Vergeet nich, dat grote Husen (grönes Teken) nich up lütten (rood) oder middelmatigen (geel) Steden baut worden könen, aver Husen könen up Steden baut worden, de mehr Rüümte as nödig hebben. Daar sallst du immer an denken, wenn du eene gode Stee utsöchst.

source: Every military building has a certain conquer area – the more expensive the building, the more land it conquers.
target: All Soldateree-Boen hebben hör egen Innehmens-Kuntrei – so dürer de Boo is, so mehr Land nimmt 't in.

source: In this scenario, I’m going to tell you about soldiers, their training and their profession: warfare. Although Widelands is about building up, not burning down, there is an enemy you sometimes have to defeat. Yet warfare is mainly focused on economics, not on military strategies, and its mechanics deserve explanation.
target: In deese Inföhren verklaar ick di Soldaten, hör Utbildung un hör Beruf: Krieg. In Widelands gaht 't um Upbauen, nich Ofbrannen, aver of un an mutt du eenen Feind manntjen. Bi’m Krieg gaht 't in 't Geheel um de Wirtschaft, nich taktiske Dingen, aver Slachten mutten doch verklaart worden.

source: I’ve set up a small village that contains the most important buildings. You also have enough wares, so you do not have to take care of your weapons production. In a real game, you will not have this luxury.
target: Ick hebb een lüttes Dörp mit de wichtigsten Husen baut. Du hest Waren genoog un mutt keene Wapens produzeren. In eenem echten Speel hest du deesen Luxus nich.

source: Take a look at the soldiers that are on their way to our military buildings. They look different from normal workers: they have a health bar over their head that displays their remaining health, and they have four symbols, which symbolize the individual soldier’s current levels in the four different categories: health, attack, defense and evade.
target: Kiek de Soldaten an, de nu to de Soldateree-Boen gahn. Se sehn anners ut as annere Arbeiders: Se heeben eenen Levendwieser över hör Kopp, wat hör Gesundheid wiest, un se hebben veer Tekens, de de Stand vun deese Soldat in de veer Egenskuppen wiesen: Gesundheid, Angriff, Verteidigung, Utwieken.

source: You should also keep in mind that each of the three tribes in Widelands has its own way of training, so the buildings and wares are different. Also, the ability levels cannot be compared: an Imperial soldier has a base attack of %1% at level 0, while a Barbarian soldier at the same level only has a base attack of %2%.
target: Vergeet nich, dat alle Völker in Widelands anners öven un annere Boen un Waren hebben. De Egenskuppen-Standen könen nich vergleken worden: Een Rieks-Soldat hett een Angriff vun %1% bei Stand 0, een Willer Soldat mit de sülvigen Stand blot %2%.

source: When you are expanding into no man’s land, you can make your buildings prefer rookies. When you are planning to attack, send heroes into that region. Conquered buildings always prefer heroes.
target: Wenn du nejes Land innimmst, kannst du diene Boen Snöttbaarten vörtrecken laten. Wenn du angriepen willt, treck Helden vör. Innohmen Boen trecken immer Helden vör.

source: There is another way how you can control the strength of a military building: by the number of soldiers stationed there. Just click on the arrow buttons to decrease or increase the desired number of soldiers. Every building has a maximum capacity. In case of the barrier, it is five, for example.
target: Du kannst de Foss vun eenem Soldateree-Boo ok anners fastsetten: indeem du de Tahl vun Soldaten, de hier wohnen, ännerst. Klick de Piel-Knopen an, um de wiskt Tahl to verhogen oder minnern. Jede Boo hett eene höchste Tahl vun Steden. To 'n Bispööl hett een Uppass fiev.

source: However, destroying a military building is always linked with a risk: the land is still yours, but it is no longer protected. Any enemy that builds his own military sites can take over that land without a fight, causing your buildings to burst into flames. Furthermore, some parts of the land can now be hidden under the fog of war. You should therefore only dismantle military buildings deep inside your territory where you are safe from enemies.
target: Een Soldateree-Boo oftobrannen is immer riskant: Dat Land höört di noch, is aver nich mehr schütt. Een Feind, de sülvst een Soldateree-Boo baut, kann dat Land sünner Stried innehmen. Diene Husen brannen dann of. Butendeem sünd villicht Parten vun dienem Land dann unner de Kriegsnevel verstoken. Du sallst Soldateree-Boen daarher blot dann plattrieten, wenn se deep in dien Gewest sünd, waar keene Feinde henkomen.

source: The citadel can house 12 soldiers, and it is the biggest military building the Barbarians can build. It also costs a lot of resources and takes a long time to build. It is most suited to guard strategically important points like constricted points or mountains.
target: Dat Kasteel hett Steden för 12 Soldaten un is de grootste Soldateree-Boo, wat de Willen Lüü bauen könen. 't köst mennig Materialien un dat Bauen düürt lang. 't is good gadelk, um taktisk dürable Steden as enge Passen oder Bargen to schütten.

source: Your soldiers will come from all nearby military buildings. Likewise, the defenders will come from all nearby military buildings of the enemy and intercept your forces.
target: Diene Soldaten komen vun all dienen Soldateree-Boen in de Naberskupp. Vun all Soldateree-Boen in de Naberskupp, de tum Feind hören, komen siene Soldaten un verdedigen sük tegen diene Soldateree.

source: Ports are big buildings, but they can only be built at special locations: those marked with the
target: Muden sünd grote Husen, könen aver blot an besünnern Steden baut worden: Deese Steden hebben dat

source: Ports are built like normal buildings, but are only available on blue port spaces. Just click on a field with the icon and the building menu automatically offers you to build a port.
target: Muden baust du as annere Husen, aver se sünd blot up de blauen Rüümten för Muden paraat. Klick een Feld mit de Teken an un dat Bau-Menü büddt di eene Muu an.

source: On this map, there is no enemy to fear. As always, you can continue playing and watch how the ships deliver wares to the island when you construct some buildings there. There is also another island where you can build a port.
target: Up deese Kaart gifft 't keene Feinde. As immer kannst du wiederspölen un tokieken as de Schippen Waren to de Insel brengen, wenn du daar Husen baust. 't gifft noch eene anner Insel, wo du eene Muu bauen kannst.

source: But one day, you discovered a barren wasteland with abandoned buildings in the east. A strange aura came from there, and no one wanted to set foot there. But the border could not be left undefended, and so you constructed three castles.
target: Aver eenes Dags hest du im Oosten een schraes Unland mit verlatenen Husen funnen. De Lücht daar is gruselig, nüms wull daar hengahn. De Grenz kann aver nich sünner Verdedigung laten worden, also hest du dree Slötten baut.

source: The building statistics window gives you an overview over the buildings you have.
target: Dat Fenster för Tahlen över Husen wiest di de Husen, wat du hest.

source: This is the building statistics window. It shows you all buildings you can own, sorted by their size.
target: Dat us dat Fenster för Tahlen över Husen. 't wiest du all de Husen, de du hest, na Grött sorteert.

source: ‘0%’: This indicates the average productivity of all buildings of that type. You have just started this game, therefore none of your buildings has done any work yet, but they are going to start working soon.
target: »0%«: Dat is de Wöörde, de all Husen vun deese Aard dör de Bank hebben. Du hest deeses Speel jüüst begunnen, daarum hebben diene Husen noch nix daan, aver se fangen bold an to arbeiden.

source: ‘2/4’ below your sentry: For military buildings, the stationed soldiers are shown instead of a productivity. You want to have four soldiers in your sentries, but only two soldiers are stationed in this kind of building. This leaves two vacant positions – we really need more soldiers.
target: »2/4« unner diener Wachters-Kamer: För Soldateree-Boen wiest dat Fenster de Tahl vun Soldaten un nich de Wöörde. Du willt veer Soldaten in dienen Wachters-Kamerken hebben, hest aver blot twee Soldaten in deesen Husen. 't gifft also twee lege Steden – wi bruken absolut mehr Soldaten.

source: If you don’t have any building of a particular building type, it will be shown greyed out.
target: Husen, wo du keene vun hest, worden grau wiest.

source: The stock menu window has four tabs. The first (and currently selected) one shows you all your current wares, including those on roads, at flags and inside buildings waiting for processing.
target: Dat Bestand-Fenster hett veer Listenwesslers. De eerste (de jüüst utköört is) wiest all Waren de du hest, ok de, de up Straten un Fahnen sünd oder in Husen wachten, bit se bruukt worden.

source: The second tab shows you all your workers, again those on roads and in buildings summed up.
target: De twede Listenwessler wiest all de Arbeiders, weer all up Straten un in Husen tosammen.

source: When you’ve played a lot, you will know all these things by heart. But until then or if you’re unsure about your tribe’s needs and abilities and how its buildings and workers operate, you can look it up easily in our tribe-specific in-game help and encyclopedia.
target: Wenn du vööl spöölt hest, weetst du all dat utwennig. Bit dann kannst du heel licht in de Hülp im Speel naslaan, wenn du nich wiss büst, wat dien Volk kann un bruukt oder wo de Husen un Arbeiders warken.

source: The ‘Wares’ tab shows information about the wares that your tribe needs, including a short help text, a list of buildings that produce each ware, the needed wares to produce it and where the ware is consumed.
target: De Listenwessler »Waren« hett Informationen över all de Waren, de dien Volk bruukt. För elkeen Waar gifft 't een körte Text un Listen mit all Husen, de deese Waar produzeren oder bruken.

source: The ‘Buildings’ tab contains all the necessary information about the buildings of your tribe.
target: De Listenwessler »Husen« hett all Informationen över all Husen, de dien Volk hett.

source: A soldier needs a wooden spear and a helmet – from there on out, you can search backwards to find the wares and the buildings you need to supply your barracks where the soldier is recruited. When you are finished, just close the encyclopedia window.
target: Een Soldat bruukt eene Holtpieke un eenen Helm – vun daar kannst du torügg söken un rutfinnen, wat för Waren un Husen du bruukst, um de Kasern to versörgen, waar de Soldat anhüürt word. Wenn dat daan is, maak dat Fenster tum Naslaan dicht.

source: In our situation, you might want to work the bakeries as fast as possible because they supply our taverns, so you could set water to the highest priority for them. The other buildings (for example the donkey farm) would then get less water, but the bakery could work faster.
target: Hier willt du villicht, dat de Backereen so fix as mögelk arbeiden, wiel se uns' Kneipen versörgen, also kannst du hör de hoogste Wichtigkeid för Water fastsetten. De annern Husen (to 'n Bispööl de Langohrtüchteree) kriegen dann minner Water, aver de Backeree warkt gauer.

source: Most buildings will only produce something when the stock level in your warehouses falls below the target quantity, so you should indicate the reserve you want to stockpile.
target: De meesten Husen produzeren blot dann wat, wenn diene Kraamhusen minner Waren hebben, as de End-Tahl fastleggt. Du kannst so also fastsetten, wo völe Waren du överhollen willt.

source: Only buildings that consume wares care about this setting. Buildings that produce wares for free (e.g. your farms or wells) will always keep working.
target: Blot Husen, de Waren verbruuken, achten up deese Instellungen. Husen, de Waren umsünst produzeren (to 'n Bispööl Buurdereen oder Wellen) arbeiden alltied.

source: Widelands records every game you play in two files. One of these files has a .wrpl.wgf extension and contains an initial savegame. The other file has a .wrpl extension and contains all commands that were issued by all players, such as building a road or attacking an enemy. The rest of the filenames will tell you the time you started the game.
target: Widelands nimmt elkeen Speel, wat du spöölst, in twee Dateien up. Eene daarvun hett eenen Naam, de up .wrpl.wgf ennt, un een sekerts Speel vum Anfang hett. De Naam vun de anner Datei ennt up .wrpl; daarin sünd all Befehlen, de Spelers geven hebben, to 'n Bispööl eene Straat to bauen oder eenen Feind antogriepen. De Rest vum Naam vun de Datei seggt di, wann dat Speel anfangen hett.
