source: The latter three can only be set by the hosting client by left-clicking the ‘type’ button of a player. Hosting players can also set the initialization of each player (the set of buildings, wares and workers the player starts with) and the tribe and team for computer players.
target: De lesten dree könen blot vun de Weert fastleggt worden, indeem he de »Aard«-Knoop vun eenem Speler mit de linken Muustaste anklickt. De Weert kann ok de Instellungen för elkeen Speler (de Husen, Waren un Arbeiders wat de Speler mit anfangt) un de Volk un Klottje för künstelke Spelers.

source: Atlanteans need spidercloth for many buildings. Build the needed infrastructure early before you run out.
target: Atlantinger bruken Spinnenstoff för mennig Husen. Bau de nödigen Husen bitieden, oder dat word to laat.

source: Most enhanced buildings need experienced workers. Do not enhance a building unless you have the necessary workers available.
target: De meesten utbauten Husen bruken Arbeiders mit Erfahrung. Bau de Husen eerst dann ut, wenn du de nödigen Arbeiders hest.

source: The building process will only start after a road is built to the construction site.
target: Dat Beschicken begünnt eerst, wenn eene Straat tur Baustee föhrt.

source: Be sure to send a geologist to survey sites before building a well or a mine.
target: Schick immer eenen Schattsöker, um de Stee to unnersöken, bevör du eene Well oder een Bargwark baust.

source: Your territory can be expanded by building various military buildings – Sentry, Fortress, Blockhouse, etc.
target: Du kannst dien Gewest groter maken, indeem du Soldateree-Boen baust – to 'n Bispööl Wachters-Kamern, Schanzen oder Toorns.

source: The fisher working out of this fisher’s house can’t find any fish in his work area. Remember that you can increase the number of existing fish by building a fish breeder’s house.
target: De Fisker dat warkt bi deese Fiskeree hett keene Fiske tum Fangen. Du kannst de Fiske vermehren, wenn du een Fisstüchteree baust.

source: Weaves spidercloth for buildings and ships’ sails, and tabards to equip and train the soldiers.
target: Spinnt Spinnenstoff för Husen un Seils, un Kluften, um Soldaten uttorüsten un to lehren.

source: Burns bricks using granite and clay, and coal as fuel. Bricks are the most important building material.
target: Brannt Backstenen ut Flint un Lehm. Köhle hollt dat Füür heet. Backstenen sünd dat wichtigste Baumaterial.

source: Precious stones are used in the construction of big buildings. They can be dug up by a crystal mine. You will also get granite from the mine.
target: Dürabele Stenen worden tum Bauen vun groten Husen bruukt. Se könen vun eenem Edelflint-Bargwark oboot worden. Du kriggst ok Flint ut de Bargwark.

source: Granite is a basic building material and can be dug up by a granite mine.
target: Flint is een wichtiges Baumaterial un kann vun Flint-Bargwarken ofboot worden.

source: Marble is a basic building material and can be dug up by a marble mine. You will also get granite from the mine.
target: Marmel is een wichtiges Baumaterial un kann vun Marmel-Bargwarken ofboot worden. Du kriggst ok Flint ut de Bargwark.

source: Granite is a basic building material and can be dug up by a rock mine.
target: Flint is een wichtiges Baumaterial un kann vun Flint-Bargwarken ofboot worden.

source: This fire-hardened wood is as hard as iron and it is used for several buildings. It is produced out of logs in the wood hardener.
target: Deeses Holt is im Füür hardt worden. 't is so hard as Iesen un word för eenige Husen bruukt. 't word in de Holtharderee ut Boomstammen produzeert.

source: Bricks are the best and most important building material. They are made out of clay and granite.
target: Backstenen sünd dat beste un wichtigste Baumaterial. Se worden ut Lehm un Flint brannt.

source: Cloth is needed to build several buildings. It is also consumed in the armor smithy.
target: Eenige Husen bruken Stoff. 't word ok vun de Panzersmee verbruukt.

source: These wonderful diamonds are used to build some exclusive buildings. They are mined in a crystal mine.
target: Deese wunnermojen Edelstenen worden för eenige besünners gode Husen bruukt. Se worden in eenem Edelflint-Bargwark ofboot.

source: Only very important things are embellished with gold. It is used as a precious building material and to produce different axes (in the war mill) and different parts of armor (in the helm smithy).
target: Blot bannig wichtige Dingen worden mit Gold utrüst. 't is een düres Baumaterial, un 't word bruukt um (in de Oorlogs-Smee) eenige Exten un (in de Helmsmee) verschedene Helms to produzeren.

source: Gold ore is mined in a gold mine. Smelted in a smelting works, it turns into gold which is used as a precious building material and to produce weapons and armor.
target: Goldkluut word in Gold-Bargwarken ofboot un in Smeltwarken smelt. Dann word daarut Gold, wat een düres Baumaterial is un för Wapens un Wapenrocken bruukt word.

source: Granite is a basic building material.
target: Flint is een wichtigs Baumaterial.

source: Granite can be processed into grout which provides a solid, non burning building material. Grout is produced in a lime kiln.
target: Ut Flint kann man Mörtel maken, wat een stevigs Baumaterial is un nich brannt. Mörtel word in de Kalkbranneree produzeert.

source: Logs are an important basic building material. They are produced by felling trees.
target: Boomstammen sünd een wichtigs Baumaterial. Se worden produzeert, indeem man Bomen ofkappt.

source: Planks are an important building material.
target: Planken sünd een wichtigs Baumaterial.

source: These transparent quartz gems are used to build some exclusive buildings. They are produced in a crystal mine.
target: Deeser schienende Blinkerflint word för eenige besünners gode Husen bruukt. 't word in eenem Edelflint-Bargwark ofboot.

source: Spidercloth is made out of spider silk in a weaving mill. It is used in the toolsmithy and the shipyard. Also some higher developed buildings need spidercloth for their construction.
target: Spinnenstoff word in Spinnweelmöhlen ut Spinnensied maakt. 't word vun de Warktüügsmee un de Warft bruukt. Eenige grote Husen bruken Spinnenstoff tum bauen.

source: Thatch reed is produced in a reed yard and used to make the roofs of buildings waterproof.
target: Reit word in eener Reitplanteree produzeert un deent daarto, de Dacken vun Husen waterdicht to maken.

source: Produces spidercloth for buildings, ships and soldiers.
target: Produzeert Spinnenstoff för Husen, Schippen un Soldaten.

source: Some of your starting buildings didn’t have enough room and weren’t built. You are at a disadvantage with this; consider restarting this map with a fair starting condition.
target: Welke vun dienen Anfangs-Husen sünd nich gebout worden, wiel keen Rüümte daar is. Daarum hest du enen Nadeel un sölst overlegen, of du de Kaart noch eenmal gerecht anfangen wullt.

source: Start building road after placing a flag
target: Na de Fahnenbauen Straat bauen

source: Toggle building label display
target: Namen vun Husen wiesen oder verbargen

source: Military buildings lost
target: Verlorene Soldateree-Boen

source: Military buildings defeated
target: Innohmene Soldateree-Boen

source: Civilian buildings lost
target: Verlorene freedsame Husen

source: A building is being dismantled at this dismantle site, returning some of the resources that were used during this building’s construction to your tribe’s stores.
target: Hier word een Huus plattreten, um eenige Waren torüggtokriegen, de tum Bauen verwendt wurren.

source: As your road network gets longer and more complicated, you should employ horses to help out your carriers. Horses are bred at horse farms using water and corn. A warehouse will also help to ensure that your transportation system does not collapse.
target: As dien Stratennett groter un kumplizeerter word, sallst du Peer in Deenst stellen, um dienen Lastendragers to helpen. Peer worden in Peertüchtereen mit Water un Mais tücht. Een Kraamhuus helpt ok, dat dien Stratennett nich tosamenbreckt.

source: When roads are under heavy load for a long time, one carrier is usually not enough to transport goods swiftly. Traffic jams are the consequence. Such roads therefore employ a second carrier: an ox that helps to carry the wares. This doubles the transport capacity.
target: Wenn Straten lange starken Verkehr hebben, is een Lastendrager mennigtied nich genoog, um Waren fix to transporteren. Da gahn Staus na. Sülke Straten kriegen daarum eenen tweeden Lastendrager: een Oss helpt, Waren to dragen. Dat verdübbelt de Kansen tum Transport.

source: Lower the demand for marble columns in the economy settings to four. This will help to save some marble for buildings.
target: Minner de Nafraag för Marmelpielers in de Wirtschafts-Instellungen to veer. Dann blievt uns mehr Marmel för Husen över.

source: Yes my fellow soldiers, we have done it! We have met all the challenges that were put in front of us. But my heart is still with our home. We shall set sail as soon as possible to help defend the Empire from the Barbarian tribe.
target: Jau, miene Soldaten-Fründe, wi hebben 't klaar brocht! Wi hebben all de Rutföderungen överwunnen, de vör uns laggen. Aver mien Hart is noch to Huus. Wi sallen tur See fahren, sobold wi nu könen, um dat Riek tegen dat Wille Volk mit to verteidigen.

source: We will need a barracks, of course; a reindeer farm to produce fur, and a sewing room to sew the fur into garments. The reindeer farm produces some meat as a by-product of fur, and it also trains reindeer to help our carriers on busy roads.
target: Wi bruken eene Kasern, klaar; eene Sneeihirsktüchteree um Fell to produzeren, un eene Naiheree, um Kluften ut de Fell to naihen. De Sneeihirsktüchteree produzeert een bietjet Fleesk, wenn se Fell maakt, un se lehrt eenige Sneeihirsken, dat se uns' Lastendragers up besigen Straten helpen.

source: You have completed this mission. You may move on to the next scenario now to help us build a new home, far from the false God’s vengeful reach…
target: Du hest deese Rutfödderung ofsloten. Du kannst nu de token Rutfödderung anfangen un uns helpen, eene neje Heimaad uptobauen, wied weg vun de haatsken Macht vun de falsken Gott …

source: The ‘Wares’ tab shows information about the wares that your tribe needs, including a short help text, a list of buildings that produce each ware, the needed wares to produce it and where the ware is consumed.
target: De Listenwessler »Waren« hett Informationen över all de Waren, de dien Volk bruukt. För elkeen Waar gifft 't een körte Text un Listen mit all Husen, de deese Waar produzeren oder bruken.

source: This was the last tutorial I had prepared for you. I’ve now taught you everything I know. There are still secrets hidden in this world even I don’t know about. I will now search for a quiet place to spend my sunset years. If you have still questions, the Widelands community will surely help you. You can find it at:
target: Dat is de leste Inföhren, de ick för di maakt hebb. Ick hebb di nu all lehrt, wat ick weet. 't gifft noch alltied Geheimnissen in deese Welt, de ok ick nich kenn. Ick söök nu eene moje Stee tum verpuusten. Wenn du noch Fragen hest, helpt du wiss de Widelands-Gemeenskupp. Du finnst se unner:

source: If the bug concerns something not being displayed correctly or if it helps demonstrate the issue, please include one or more screenshots.
target: Wenn sük de Fehler up de Anzeige betreckt oder dat dat Probleem verklaart, giff bidde eenen oder een paar Bildschirmfotos.

source: Only this beer is acceptable for the soldiers in a battle arena. Some say that the whole power of the Barbarians lies in this ale. It helps to train the soldiers’ evade level from 0 to 1 to 2. Strong beer is also used in big inns to prepare meals.
target: Nix as deeses Beer is good genoog för Soldaten im Slachtenring. 't heet, all de Kracht vun de Willen Lüü kummt vun deesem Drank. 't helpt, de Utwieken-Stand vun Soldaten vun 0 över 1 na 2 to verbetern. Deftigs Beer word ok in Weertshusen bruukt, um Mahltieden torechttomaken.

source: Horses help to carry items along busy roads. They are reared in a horse farm.
target: Peer dragen Waren över besige Straten. Se worden in de Peertüchteree tücht.

source: Oxen help to carry items along busy roads. They are reared in a cattle farm.
target: Ossen dragen Waren över besige Straten. Se worden in de Ossentüchteree tücht.

source: Donkeys help to carry items along busy roads. They are reared in a donkey farm.
target: Langohren dragen Waren över besige Straten. Se worden in de Langohrtüchteree tücht.

source: Reindeer help to carry items along busy roads. They are reared in a reindeer farm.
target: Sneeihirsken dragen Waren över besige Straten. Se worden in de Sneeihirsktüchteree tücht.

source: If you wish to help us translate, please visit %s
target: Wenn du mit de Översetten helpen willt, besöök bidde %s

source: Please report this problem to help us improve Widelands. You will find related messages in the standard output (stdout.txt on Windows). You are using build %1$s (%2$s).
target: Bidde melle deeses Probleem, daarmit wi Widelands beter maken könen. Du finnst mehr Narichten över dat Probleem in de Normaal-Utgaav (unner Windows is dat stdout.txt). Du bruukst Versioon %1$s (%2$s).

source: You have completed the last mission of the Barbarian tutorial campaign. You may continue playing if you wish, otherwise move on to the next campaign.
target: Du hest de leste Rutfödderung in deeser Riege ofsloten. Wenn du willt, kannst du wiederspölen, anners de token Rutfödderungs-Riege anfangen.

source: The message window is central to fully controlling your tribe’s fortune. However, you will get a lot of messages in a real game. To keep your head straight, you should try to keep the inbox empty.
target: Dat Narichtenfenster is wichtig, um de Tokunft vun dienem Volk to bestimmen. In eenem echten Speel kriggst du bannig völe Narichten. Um de Överblick to behollen, sallst du lesene Narichten wegdoon.

source: You can build the port either on the easternmost tip of the island or in the place where the enemy’s headquarters stood.
target: Du kannst de Muu of daar bauen, waar dat Raadhuus vun de Feinden stunn, of on de oostelke Spitz vun de Hallig.

source: Greetings, Chieftain Reebaud! I will start with the colonization of the island straight away.
target: Free, Mienheer Reebaud! Ick fang stracks mit de Besiedeln vun de Hallig an.

source: The island is flooding!
target: De Hallig floodt!

source: His God has granted his wish! The ocean is rising! The island is almost flat – we will all drown!
target: Sien Gott kummt sienem Will na! De See riest! De Hallig is binah even – wi mutten all verdrinken!

source: Despair not, I did espy some hope! The easternmost tip of the island, as well as the space where the fiends’ headquarters stood, seems well suited to build a port on. If we manage to construct a ship, and fill it with all we need to build a new settlement, we may be able to escape.
target: Vertwiefel nich, ick hebb wat Hoop! De Oostspitz vun de Hallig on ok de Stee, waar dat Raadhuus vun de Feinden stunn, düchten mi gadelk, eene Muu to bauen. Wenn wi 't schaffen, een Schipp to bauen, un 't mit all de Waren füllen, de wi bruken, um een nejes Dörp to gründen, könen wi villicht utrieten.

source: The map has been generated. Please double-check the player starting positions to make sure that your carriers won’t drown, or be stuck on an island or on top of a mountain.
target: De Kaart is fardig. Bidde kiek na, of de Anfangs-Positionen vun de Spelers good sünd un de Lüü nich verdrinken oder up 'n Barg fastsitten.

source: The hunter working out of this hunter’s hut can’t find any game in his work area. Remember that you can build a gamekeeper’s hut to release more game into the wild.
target: De Jäger, de bi deese Jaggthuus warkt, het keene Deerten tum Jagen. Du kannst neje Deerten tüchten, wenn du een Deertentüchteree baust.

source: The hunter brings fresh, raw meat to the colonists.
target: De Jager jaggt friskes, ruges Fleesk för de Lüü.

source: The hunter brings fresh, raw meat to the colonists.
target: De Jager jaggt friskes, ruges Fleesk för de Lüü.

source: The hunter brings fresh, raw meat to the colonists.
target: De Jager jaggt friskes, ruges Fleesk för de Lüü.

source: The hunter brings fresh, raw meat to the colonists.
target: De Jager jaggt friskes, ruges Fleesk för de Lüü.

source: Center the map on the selected ship
target: To deese Schipp springen

source: Show original map names
target: Wies echte Namen vun de Karten

source: Center the map on the selected ship
target: To deese Schipp springen

source: Boldreth seems more and more torn as the days go by. The spirits of my fellows sink as the cold season approaches, and we are still living in no more than huts and barracks. I never intended to stay out here in the wilderness for so long – but I never thought my brothers would engage in this senseless battle for so long either.
target: As de Dagen vörbigahn, kummt mi Boldreth mehr un mehr rumrieten vör. Miene Kameraden verlesen hör Mood as de kolle Tied nahder kummt, un wi leven immer noch in nix as Kaaten un Brattsen. Ick harr nooit vörhatt, so lang in de Wildernis to blieven – aver ick hett ok nooit docht, dat se sük so lang mit deesem unnützen Krieg befaten.

source: Expanding is as simple as building a military building at the edge of your territory. The Barbarians have a selection of different military buildings: sentries, barriers, towers, fortresses and citadels. The bigger the building, the more expensive it is to build, but the more land it will conquer around itself and the more soldiers can be stationed there. The buildings also vary in their vision range: buildings with a tower see farther than others.
target: Vergrotern is ganz licht: Du baust een Soldateree-Boo dicht bi de Grenz vun dien Gewest. De Willen Lüü hebben verschedene Soldateree-Boen: Wachters-Kamers, Uppassen, Toorns, Schanzen un Kastelen. So groter de Boo is, so dürer is 't, aver 't nimmt mehr Land in un kann mehr Soldaten upnehmen. De Boen hebben unglieke Utsichtswiedten: Boen mit Toorns sehn wieder as anners.

source: To establish a smuggling route, you need to build a warehouse on a sending/receiving spot while your team mate has to build one on the corresponding receiving/sending spot. A ware is then transported every 10 seconds.
target: Um een Smuggel-Padd intorichten, mutt du up eenem Enn vun eenem Tunnel een Kraamhuus bauen, un dien Partner an de glieke Stee in sienem Gewest ok eens bauen. Dann word all 10 Sekünnen eene Waar smuggelt.

source: Remember that the map has rotational symmetry. For example, when you have found a spot to the top-left of your headquarters, the corresponding spot will be to the bottom-right of the headquarters of your team mate.
target: Vergeet nich, dat de Kaart evenmatig mit eenem Dreihzentrum is. Dat heet, wenn du links boven vun dienem Raadhuus eene Stee finnst, hett dien Partner de glieke Stee rechts unner sienem Raadhuus.

source: The second one is the more common and faster one: press-and-hold the right mouse button anywhere on the map, then move your mouse around and you’ll see the view scroll.
target: Over de anner Kant kannst du de rechte Muustaste enerwegens up de Kaart drücken un hollen un dann diene Muus bewegen, un de Sicht verschuuvt sük. Dat is handig un gang un geve.

source: Try it out. Open the minimap, click on a few buttons and try moving around. Close it when you have experimented enough.
target: Versöök 't. Maak de Lütt Kaart open, klick een paar Knopen an un versöök, de Sicht to bewegen. Maak 't to, wenn du genoog probeert hest.

source: All windows in Widelands can be closed by right-clicking into them. Some windows can also be toggled with the buttons at the very bottom of the screen.
target: Du kannst all Fensters in Widelands sluten, indeem du se mit de rechte Muustaste anklickst. Eenige Fensters kannst du ok mit de Knopen an de unnern Rand vum Bildschirm an- un utknipsen.

source: There is another way how you can control the strength of a military building: by the number of soldiers stationed there. Just click on the arrow buttons to decrease or increase the desired number of soldiers. Every building has a maximum capacity. In case of the barrier, it is five, for example.
target: Du kannst de Foss vun eenem Soldateree-Boo ok anners fastsetten: indeem du de Tahl vun Soldaten, de hier wohnen, ännerst. Klick de Piel-Knopen an, um de wiskt Tahl to verhogen oder minnern. Jede Boo hett eene höchste Tahl vun Steden. To 'n Bispööl hett een Uppass fiev.

source: You can control the number of soldiers stationed at a military site with the arrow buttons. If you want to get even your last soldier out, you will have to destroy it. However, it then will no longer protect your territory, which will make it vulnerable to hostile attacks.
target: Du kannst de Tahl vun Soldaten in eenem Soldateree-Boo mit de Piel-Knopen ännern. Wenn du willt, dat all Soldaten rutgahn, mutt du dat Huus ofbrannen. Dann schütt 't dien Gewest nich mehr; dat is dann anfällig för Angriffen vun Feinden.

source: Your expedition ship is ready. It is waiting for your orders in front of your port. It isn’t transporting wares anymore. Use its buttons to send your ship in any of the six main directions of the Widelands map. When it has reached a coastline, you can make it travel around the coast, where it will look for suitable places for landing.
target: Dien Schipp för de Söke is paraat. Nu wacht 't vör diene Muu up diene Befehlen. 't transporteert keene Waren mehr. Bruuk de Knopen in de Schipp-Fenster, um dat Schipp in de sess Richtungen vun de Widelands-Kaart to schicken. Wenn 't eene Küst finnt, kannst du 't um de Insel seilen laten, wo 't na Rüümten för Muden utkiekt.

source: This window looks similar to the stock window, but it has additional buttons at the bottom.
target: Deeses Fenster sücht haast so ut as dat Bestand-Fenster, hett aver eenige Knopen bovendeem am unnern Rand.

source: Every warehouse has four buttons to set the preference. If you move your mouse pointer over them, you will see tooltips that explain what the buttons do.
target: Elkeen Waarhuus hett veer Knopen, um Vörrang fasttoleggen. Wenn du de Muus daaröver beweegst, süchst du Texten, de di seggen, wat de Knopen doon.

source: To decide where your wares get stored, you can use the preference buttons in the warehouses.
target: Um fasttosetten, waar diene Waren verwahrt worden, kannst du de Vörrang-Knopen in Kraamhusen bruken.

source: Use the priority buttons in building windows to adjust delivery of a specific ware. Pressing Ctrl while clicking will adjust all wares at once.
target: Bruuk de Wichtigkeids-Knopen in eenem Huus-Fenster, um de Versörgung mit eener wissen Waar fasttoleggen. Drück daarbi de Strg-Tast, um 't för all Waren up eenmaal fasttosetten.

source: If you like to live dangerously, pressing Ctrl while clicking the enhance, dismantle or destroy building buttons will skip the confirmation.
target: 't is gefahrelk, aver wenn de Strg-Tast drückt hollen, as du de Knopen för 't Utbauen, Plattrieten oder Ofbrannen vun eenem Huus bruukst, word de Sekerheids-Fraag weglaten.

source: We are expanding our territory further and further to the east, and wares need to be transported over longer distances. We should build warehouses near our eastern border in certain distances and preferably store construction materials in the easternmost one. Our headquarters is too far in the west to be useful for long-time ware storage.
target: Wi vergrotern uns' Gewest wieder un wieder na Oosten, un de Waren mutten över eene immer grotere Feernte transporteert worden. Wi sallen in wissen Ofstännen Kraamhusen an de oostelken Grenz bauen un Baumaterialien vörrangig im oostelksten verwahren. Uns' Raadhuus is to wied im Westen, um gadelk to sien, Waren för een heel Sett uptobewahren.

source: I advise to build all those buildings within a short distance of each other, and to construct two warehouses nearby: One should be set to store only weapons, armor, ores, metal and coal; the other to store building materials.
target: Ick raad an, dat all deese Husen dicht binanner baut worden, un twee Kraamhusen in de Naberskupp: För eens sall fastleggt worden, dat 't nix as Wapen, Panzers, Kluten, Metallen un Köhle verwahrt; de anner sall Baumaterialien upbewahren.

source: I have seen some advanced weapons in our warehouses. Perhaps it would be possible to smelt them back into metal? But that seems like a waste of the precious swords…
target: Ick hebb een paar gode Wapen in uns' Kraamhusen sehn. Villicht kann man se in Metall torüggsmelten? Aver dat is eene lepe Upmakeree vun de goden Sweerten …

source: Although ports act as warehouses, you should not build more than necessary: they cost quartz, diamonds and gold, which makes them quite expensive.
target: Muden sünd ok Kraamhusen, aver du sallst nich mehr bauen, as du bruukst: se sünd bannig düür un kösten Blinkerflint, Edelstenen un Gold.

source: The third tab shows you the wares that are stored in your headquarters, your warehouses and ports. They are not needed anywhere and are therefore your reserve.
target: De darde Listenwessler wiest all de Waren, de in dienem Raadhuus, dienen Kraamhusen un dienen Muden verwahrt sünd. Se worden jüüst nich bruukt un wachten, bit se vun elkeen Huus bruukt worden.

source: I’ve shown you our stock menu window, where you could see which wares are at the warehouses. You remember?
target: Ick hebb di al de Bestand-Fenster wiest, waar du sehn kannst, wat för Waren in Kraamhusen sünd. Weetst du noch?

source: Most buildings will only produce something when the stock level in your warehouses falls below the target quantity, so you should indicate the reserve you want to stockpile.
target: De meesten Husen produzeren blot dann wat, wenn diene Kraamhusen minner Waren hebben, as de End-Tahl fastleggt. Du kannst so also fastsetten, wo völe Waren du överhollen willt.

source: Every warehouse has four buttons to set the preference. If you move your mouse pointer over them, you will see tooltips that explain what the buttons do.
target: Elkeen Waarhuus hett veer Knopen, um Vörrang fasttoleggen. Wenn du de Muus daaröver beweegst, süchst du Texten, de di seggen, wat de Knopen doon.

source: You get points for precious wares in your warehouses. The player with the highest number of wares at the end of 4 hours wins the game.
target: Du kriggst Punkten för dürabele Waren in diene Kraamhusen. De Speler mit de hoogst Tahl vun Punkten na 4 Stünnen winnt dat Speel.

source: Beer is produced in micro breweries and used in inns and big inns to produce snacks.
target: Beer word in Lütten Broereen produzeert un vun Krogen un Weertshusen bruukt, um Spiesen to produzeren.

source: The Barbarian bakers are best in making this flat and tasty pitta bread. It is made out of wheat and water following a secret recipe. Pitta bread is used in the taverns, inns and big inns to prepare rations, snacks and meals. It is also consumed at training sites (training camp and battle arena).
target: Nüms kann deeses platte, leckere Pitta-Brood beter maken as de Willen Backers. 't word na eenem gehemen Rezept ut Weit un Water maakt. Pitta-Brood word in Kneipen, Kröög un Weertshusen bruukt, um Happen, Spiesen un Mahltieden torecttomaken. 't word ok vun Övens-Boen (Övens-Lager un Slachtenring) verbruukt.

source: Besides pitta bread and meat, fish is also a foodstuff for the Barbarians. It is used in the taverns, inns and big inns and at the training sites (training camp and battle arena).
target: Tegen Pitta-Brood un Fleesk is ok Fiss eene Spies för de Willen Lüü. 't word in Kneipen, Kröög, Weertshusen un Övens-Boen (Övens-Lager un Slachtenring) bruukt.

source: Meat is used in the taverns, inns and big inns to prepare rations, snacks and meals for the miners. It is also consumed at the training sites (training camp and battle arena).
target: Fleesk word in Kneipen, Kröög un Weertshusen bruukt, um Happen, Spiesen un Mahltieden för de Bargwarkskeerls torechttomaken. 't word ok vun Övens-Boen (Övens-Lager un Slachtenring) bruukt.

source: If the food supply is steady, the coal mine can produce two pieces of coal in %s on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all %s twee Köhlen.

source: Click on the map to increase, Shift + Click on the map to decrease terrain height
target: Klicke de Kaart tum Verhogen an; drücke daar de Umschalt-Tast bi tum lütter maken.

source: Ctrl + Click on the map to set terrain height
target: Klicke de Kaart an un drücke daar de Strg-Tast bi tum Fastsetten vun de Höcht.

source: Click on the map to set terrain height to a random value within the specified range
target: Klick de Kaart an tum Fastmaken vun de Höcht to eene tofällige Tahl in de utköört Intervall.

source: They learn to attack with three different swords: The long sword, broadsword and double-edged sword. The latter two contain gold, and all of them iron. The advanced soldiers are taught to use two swords at once: They keep their first double-edged sword, and are given various other swords to wield in their other hand. This makes six steps of attack training.
target: Se lehren de Angriff mit dree verschedenen Sweerten: Dat Lange, Brede un Tweesneidige Sweert. De lesten twee enthollen Gold, un alle Iesen. De beteren Soldaten bruken twee Sweerten up eenmaal: Se behollen hör eerstes Tweesneidigs Sweert, un kriegen verschedene annere Sweerten, de se mit hör anner Hand föhren könen. Dat sünd all tosamen sess Stappen vun Angriffs-Öven.

source: Of course I could still forge short and long swords, but it is beneath my honor to bother with such basic equipment now.
target: Natürelk kann ick noch Lütte un Lange Sweerten smeden, aver 't is unner miener Wüürd, mi mit sülk eenfachen Dingen to befaten.

source: The long sword is the weapon used by level 1 soldiers. Level 4 soldiers are equipped with a long and a double-edged sword.
target: Dat Lange Sweert is de Wapen, de Soldaten vum Stand 1 bruken. Soldaten vum Stand 4 hebben een Langes un een Tweesneidigs Sweert.

source: The carrier working at this well can’t find any water in his well.
target: De Arbeider, de bi deese Well warkt, het keen Water in de Quell mehr.

source: The carrier working at this well can’t find any water in his well.
target: De Arbeider, de bi deese Well warkt, het keen Water in de Quell mehr.

source: The carrier working at this well can’t find any water in his well.
target: De Arbeider, de bi deese Well warkt, het keen Water in de Quell mehr.

source: The carrier working at this well can’t find any water in his well.
target: De Arbeider, de bi deese Well warkt, het keen Water in de Quell mehr.

source: The map has been generated. Please double-check the player starting positions to make sure that your carriers won’t drown, or be stuck on an island or on top of a mountain.
target: De Kaart is fardig. Bidde kiek na, of de Anfangs-Positionen vun de Spelers good sünd un de Lüü nich verdrinken oder up 'n Barg fastsitten.

source: Six months ago, Lutius – a young general of the Empire – was sent with 150 soldiers to the frontier beyond the northern forests where Barbarian tribes were crossing onto land held by the Empire. His task was to defend the Empire’s land. At first, everything was calm. He even talked to a few Barbarian children and thought about a peaceful life – side by side with this archaic folk. He began to feel safer and his army began to drop their attention off the potential enemy. That was their undoing. One night in March his unprepared army was attacked by 100 Barbarian footmen and was completely scattered. Only with his bare life he and a handful of his soldiers survived.
target: Vör sess Maanten wurr Lutjus – een junger Offizeer vum Latiensken Riek – mit 150 Soldaten an de Grenz achtern de noordelken Walden schickt, wo de Willen Lüü ins Land vum Riek indrungen. Siene Upgaav was, dat Land vum Riek to verdedigen. Eerst was alls friedelk. He snackde mit Willen Kinners un wullt in Freden leven – Sied an Sied mit de steenolle Volk. He meende, seker to wesen, un siene Soldaten achtden nich mehr up de mögelk Feinde. Dat was een Fehler. In eener Määrtnacht wurren siene unrüsten Soldaten vun 100 Willen Stahfasten angrepen un heel un dall verjaggt. He un een paar vun sienen Suldaten överleevden mit nix as de blote Leven.

source: On their way home to defend the Empire, the crew of Lutius was surprised by the will of the gods.
target: As se na Huus gahn, um dat Latienske Riek to verdedigen, worden Lutjus un siene Lüü vun de Will vun de Gotten överrumpelt.

source: The message was addressed to me, begging me to come back to Fremil. It says that the Empire is at war with the Barbarians. They were attacked from the north by the tribe that I was forbidden to attack. It is clear to me what I must do…
target: 't was eene Naricht för mi, de mi daarum anging, dat ick na Freemilt torügg koom. Dat Latienske Riek is im Krieg mit de Willen Lüü. Se sünd vun Noorden angrepen worden, vun de Volk, wat ick nich angriepen dürde. Ick weet, wat ick doon mutt …

source: I really don’t know if and how we will get back home. And the war is going on without us. I hope my fellow soldiers are defending our empire well.
target: Ick weet würrelk nich, of un wo wo torügg na Huus komen sallen. Un de Krieg gaht sünner uns wieder. Ick hoop, miene Soldaten-Fründe verteidigen uns' Riek good.

source: Yes my fellow soldiers, we have done it! We have met all the challenges that were put in front of us. But my heart is still with our home. We shall set sail as soon as possible to help defend the Empire from the Barbarian tribe.
target: Jau, miene Soldaten-Fründe, wi hebben 't klaar brocht! Wi hebben all de Rutföderungen överwunnen, de vör uns laggen. Aver mien Hart is noch to Huus. Wi sallen tur See fahren, sobold wi nu könen, um dat Riek tegen dat Wille Volk mit to verteidigen.

source: Defeat the Barbarians and the Empire Colony
target: Manntje de Willen Lüü un dat Rieks-Dörp

source: The Barbarians and the Empire are too dangerous to allow them to live near us. We must defeat them both.
target: De Willen Lüü un dat Riek sünd to gefahrelk, as dat wi se in uns' Naberskupp leven laten könen. Wi mutten se beide manntjen.

source: Strangers! I, Murilius, Proconsul of the Northern Lands, a province of the Empire, demand to know who you are and what business you have in these lands!
target: Frömde! Ick, Murilius, Prokonsul vun de Noordlannen, eene Provinz vum Latiensken Riek, will weten, well ji west un wat ji in deesen Landen doot!

source: If you seek to live peacefully here, you are not faced with a choice whether to allow them to live here – you are required to assist the Empire in driving them out.
target: Wenn ji hier in Free leven wullt, gifft 't för ji keene Kör, of ji se hier leven laat – ji mutt vun Nöden de Riek daarbi stönen, se daarvun to drieven.

source: Also, as a sign of your good intentions, we demand a gift of friendship to the Empire. As you should have noticed, I have presented you with a new warehouse. Fill it with the required gifts to hand them over. I permit you to give us these wares:
target: Un as Teken för ji goden Willen verlangen wi eene Gaav vun Fründskupp an dat Riek. As ji wull wiss worden sünd, hebb ick ji een nejes Kraamhuus geven. Doot daar de nödigen Gaven in, um se an uns to langen. Ick verloov ji, uns deese Waren to geven:

source: Chieftain Reebaud – the demands of this arrogant Empire Proconsul are just outrageous. He treats us like we are his servants. And we certainly cannot afford to spare that many wares to aid him. I propose that we destroy that ugly warehouse and let him fight his own battles.
target: Mienheer Reebaud – wat deeser heerske Rieks-Prokonsul dwingt, is tum rasend worden. He behannelt uns as siene Slaven. Un wi könen heel nich so völe Waren verkroppen, um hüm to helpen. Ick slaa vör, deeses malle Kraamhuus oftobrannen un hüm siene egenen Slachten fechten to laten.

source: If you fail to deliver these wares, the Empire shall treat you like enemies. And so as to prevent you wasting your precious metal, I forbid you to expand your territory from this moment on until you have given us your gift. Fail to obey, and the Empire shall treat you like enemies.
target: Wenn ji uns deese Waren nich geevt, sall dat Riek ji as Feinde behanneln. Un daamit ji  jo dürabeles Metall nich verklüngelt, versegg ick ji vun nu of an, jo Gewest to vergrotern, bit ji uns jo Gaav geven hebbt. Dood dat nich, un dat Riek sall ji as Feinde behanneln.

source: You will have to fight those barbarians if you intend to live in the area; surely you can see that fighting them together with the Empire is easier than alone? And you really do not want the Empire as your enemy. Barbarians though you are, I do believe you will realize the truth of my words after some consideration.
target: Ji muttst tegen deese Willen kämpen, wenn ji in deese Kuntrei leven wullt; ji köönt wiss sehn, dat 't lichter is, tosammen mit de Riek tegen se to fechten as alleen? Un ji wullt dat Riek würrelk nich as jo Feind. Wull sünd ji Wille Lüü, aver ick bün wiss, dat ji verstaht, dat ick Klookheid segg, nadeem ji daar een bietje över nadacht hebbt.

source: The Empire is Angry
target: Dat Riek is vergrellt

source: You are enemies of the Empire, and I shall treat you as such!
target: Ji sünd Feinde vum Latiensken Riek, un so sall ick mit ji umgahn!

source: The Empire is Grateful
target: Dat Riek is dankbaar

source: Strangers! I see you have kept your word. The Empire rewards its friends, therefore I shall reward you with the friendship of the Empire!
target: Frömde! Ick seh, ji hebbt jo Woord hollt. Dat Riek belohnt siene Frünnen, daarum belohn ick ji mit de Fründskupp vum Riek!

source: Did I understand him correctly? After all we have done for him, after so many of my soldiers have laid down their lives for his sake, he wants us to be servants of this Empire, and take away my leadership? And does the hypocrite dare call this a reward?
target: Hebb ick hüm recht verstahn? Na allem, wat wi för hüm daan hebben, nadeem so völe vun mienen Soldaten hör Leven för siene Saak geven hebben, will he uns as de Bedeenten vun deesem Riek hebben, un miene Leiderskupp wegnehmen? Un deeser Fliemstrieker waagt 't, dat eenen Lohn to nömen?

source: There are three different tribes in Widelands: the Barbarians, the Empire and the Atlanteans. All tribes have a different economy, strength and weaknesses, but the general gameplay is the same for all. We will play the Barbarians for now.
target: In Widelands gifft 't veer Völker: de Willen Lüü, dat Latienske Riek, de Atlantinger un de Fresen. All Völker hebben eene annere Wirtschaft un hör Starkten un Swackten, aver in ’t Geheel is dat Speel för all gliek. Nu spölen wi de Wille Lüü.

source: In this game, you start out on a small piece of land with just a few resources. Using these, you’ll create an empire with many thousands of inhabitants. On your way towards this goal, you will have to establish an economic infrastructure, explore the land around you and face rivaling tribes.
target: In deesem Speel fangst du mit eenem lütten Deel Land an, waar du leep minn Materialien un Mineraale hest. Daarmit baust du een Riek mit dusenden Inwohners up. Up dienem Weg daarhen baust du eene starke Wirtschaft up, förskst dat Land um di rum ut un kämpst tegen tegenstriedige Völker.

source: Basic armor for Empire soldiers. It is produced in the armor smithy and used in the training camp – together with food – to train soldiers from health level 1 to level 2.
target: De eenfachste Wapenrock för Rieks-Soldaten. 't word in de Panzersmee produzeert un im Övens-Lager – tosammen mit Spiesen – bruukt, um Soldaten vun Gesundheid-Stand 1 up Stand 2 uttobilden.

source: The chain armor is a medium armor for Empire soldiers. It is produced in an armor smithy and used in a training camp – together with food – to train soldiers from health level 2 to level 3.
target: De Stahl-Wapenrock is de middelste Wapenrock för Rieks-Soldaten. 't word in de Panzersmee produzeert un im Övens-Lager – tosammen mit Spiesen – bruukt, um Soldaten vun Gesundheid-Stand 2 up Stand 3 uttobilden.

source: The gilded armor is the strongest armor an Empire soldier can have. It is produced in the armor smithy and used in the training camp – together with food – to train soldiers from health level 3 to level 4.
target: De Goldene Wapenrock is de beste Wapenrock för Rieks-Soldaten. 't word in de Panzersmee produzeert un im Övens-Lager – tosammen mit Spiesen – bruukt, um Soldaten vun Gesundheid-Stand 3 up Stand 4 uttobilden.

source: The bakers of the Empire make really tasty bread out of flour and water. It is used in taverns and inns to prepare rations and meals. Bread is also consumed at the training sites (arena, colosseum, training camp).
target: De Rieks-Backers maken bannig leckeres Brood ut Mehl un Water. 't word in Kneipen un Weertskuppen bruukt, um Happen un Mahltieden torechttomaken. Brood word ok vun Övens-Boen (Ring, Groter Ring, Övens-Lager) verbruukt.

source: The fires of the Empire smelting works, armor smithies and weapon smithies are usually fed with coal.
target: Dat Füür in de Rieks-Smeltwark, -Panzersmeden un -Wapensmeden verbrannt meest Köhl.

source: Besides bread and meat, fish is also a foodstuff for the Empire. Fish are used in taverns, inns and training sites (arena, colosseum, training camp).
target: Tegen Brood un Fleesk is ok Fiss eene Spies för dat Latienske Riek. Fisse worden in Kneipen, Weertskuppen un Övens-Boen (Ring, Groter Ring, Övens-Lager) bruukt.

source: Flour is produced by the mill out of wheat and is needed in the bakery to produce the tasty Empire bread.
target: Mehl word in Möhlen ut Weit maakt un word in Backereen bruukt, um dat gode Rieks-Brood to backen.

source: The Empire produces granite blocks in quarries and marble mines.
target: Dat Latienske Riek produzeert Blocken vun Flint in Flintslagerhusen un Marmel-Bargwarken.

source: Marble columns represent the high culture of the Empire, so they are needed for nearly every larger building. They are produced out of marble at a stonemason’s house.
target: Marmelpielers wiesen de hoge Kultuur un Wüürd vum Latiensken Riek un worden daarum för haast elkeen grotes Huus bruukt. Se worden in eenem Steenbickerhuus ut Marmel maakt.

source: This is the best and sharpest weapon the Empire weaponsmith creates for the soldiers. It is used in the training camp – together with food – to train soldiers from attack level 3 to level 4.
target: Dat is de beste un scharpste Wapen, de de Rieks-Wapensmidd för de Soldaten maakt. 't word in de Wapensmee produzeert un im Övens-Lager – tosammen mit Spiesen – bruukt, um Soldaten vun Angriff-Stand 3 up Stand 4 uttobilden.

source: This wooden spear is the basic weapon in the Empire military system. It is produced in the weapon smithy. In combination with a helmet, it is the equipment to fit out young soldiers.
target: Deese Holtpieke is de eenfachste Wapen in de Rieks-Soldateree. Se word in de Wapensmee produzeert. Tosammen mit eenem Helm is se de Utrüstung för neje Soldaten.

source: Expanding would also provide more space for farming. We could use some extra barley to recruit more reindeer, as our roads are quite busy.
target: Uns' Gewest to vergrotern gifft uns ok mehr Rüümte för Ackerland. Wi könen een bietje Garste bovendeem bruken, um mehr Sneeihirsken antohüren; uns' Straten sünd hennig besig.

source: No red dots means that the soldier is not trained, so he has level 0. All your new recruits have this.
target: Keene roden Punkten bedüddt, dat de Soldat nich utbildt wurr. He hett Stand 0. Alle nejen Soldaten hebben dat.

source: Look up which wares are needed to recruit soldiers
target: Kiek na, wat för Waren du bruukst, um Soldaten antohüren

source: You have closed the encyclopedia window, but I didn’t notice that you were trying to find out which wares are needed to recruit a soldier. Would you please reopen it and do so?
target: Du hest dat Fenster tum Naslaan dichtmaakt, aver ick hebb nich sehn, dat du versöcht hest, ruttofinnen, wat för Waren du bruukst, um eenen Soldaten antohüren. Maakst du 't bidde weer open un deist dat?

source: The barracks needs %s on average to recruit one soldier.
target: De Kasern bruukt dör de Bank %s um eenem Soldaten antohüren.

source: third tab (‘Wares in warehouses’), I’ll continue.
target: darden LLstenwessler (»Waren in Kraamhusen«) utköörst, maak ick wieder.

source: At the moment, all mines are supplied with rations. If you want to prioritize a special mine, you simply have to open its window. In the wares tab, behind every ware, you can see ‘traffic lights’.
target: Upstünds worden all Bargwarken mit Happen versörgt. Wenn du een wisses Bargwark vörtrecken willt, kannst du eenfach sien Fenster opmaken. Achtern elkeen Waren-Riege süchst du dree farvige Knopen.

source: The first two tabs show you the production and consumption of any ware. You can toggle them by simply clicking on them.
target: De eersten twee Listenwessler wiesen, waar vööl vun elkeen Waar produzeert un verbruukt word. Du kannst se wiesen oder verbargen, indeem du se anklickst.

source: Salve Lutius. While talking to all our brave builders, they told me that they have to use all our remaining gold for building the port. So, we won’t have any gold left after our port is build.
target: Salve Lutius. As ick mit uns' dappern Baulüü redt hebb, hebben se mi vertellt, dat se all dat Gold, wat wi över hetten, bruukt hebben, um de Muu to bauen. Wi hebben also keen Gold mehr över, wenn de Muu beschickt is.

source: Salve Lutius. We just completed our weaving mill. Now we are very close to taking to the sea again. However, I thought it would be helpful to remind you that ship production is not the only industry that needs cloth.
target: Salve Lutius. Uns' Spinnweelmöhlen is nu beschickt. Ni sünd wi bannig dicht daarbi, weer to schippern. Aver ick gloov, 't is good, wenn du nich vergettst, dat wi Stoff nich blot för Schippen bruken.

source: The third one is to use the minimap. It is especially useful for traveling big distances.
target: Oder du kannst de Lütte Kaart bruuken. Dat is besünners för grote Ofstannen gadelk.

source: Very good. And now about the minimap. You can open it by clicking on the
target: Hunnert. Un nu de Lütte Kaart. Du kannst se openkriegen, indeem du de

source: Beer is produced in micro breweries and used in inns and big inns to produce snacks.
target: Beer word in Lütten Broereen produzeert un vun Krogen un Weertshusen bruukt, um Spiesen to produzeren.

source: Water is used in the bakery, the micro brewery and the brewery. The lime kiln and the cattle farm also need to be supplied with water.
target: Water word in de Backeree, de Lütten Broeree un de Broeree bruukt. De Kalkbranneree un de Ossentüchteree bruken 't ok.

source: Wheat is produced by farms and consumed by bakeries, micro breweries and breweries. Cattle farms also need to be supplied with wheat.
target: Weit word vun Buurdereen produzeert un vun Backereen, Lütten Broereen un Broereen bruukt. Ossentüchtereen bruken 't ok.

source: A tabard and a light trident are the basic equipment for young soldiers. Tabards are produced in the weaving mill.
target: Eene Kluft un een Lütter Dreespitz sünd de Utrüstung för neje Soldaten. Kluften worden in Spinnweelmöhlen produzeert.

source: Dismantle all unproductive small buildings to get some resources for new buildings.
target: Riet all unnützen lütten Husen platt, um Materialien för neje Husen to kriegen.

source: First, I’ll left-click on the symbol where I want the lumberjack’s hut to be built. A window will appear where I can choose between buildings. Because I’ll click a yellow house symbol – which means that its field can house medium and small buildings – I am presented with all the medium buildings that I can build. The lumberjack’s hut is a small building, so I will go on to select the small buildings tab. Then I’ll choose the lumberjack’s hut.
target: Toeerst klick ick de Teken, waar dat Boomhauer-Huus entstahn sall, mit de linke Muustaste an. Een Fenster kummt vundag, waar ick tüsken mehren Husen kören kann. Ick klicke een geles Huus-Teken an – dat heet, daar kann man lütte un middelmatige Husen bauen – daarum worden all de middelmatig Husen, de ick bauen kann, wesen. Dat Boomhauer-Huus is een lüttes Huus, daarum klick ick de Listenwessler för de lütten Husen an. Dann köör ick dat Boomhauer-Huus ut.

source: Red building symbols can only hold small buildings and flags.
target: Up eenem roden Huus-Teken könen blot lütte Husen un Fahnen baut worden.

source: Now go ahead, try it. The quarry is a small building, so if you click on a medium or big building symbol, you will have to select the small buildings tab first to find it. Go on, check it out!
target: Nu versöök 't. Dat Flintslagerhuus is een lüttes Huus; wenn du up een Teken för middelmatig oder grote Husen klickst, mutt du eerst de Listenwessler för lütte Husen utkören, um 't to finnen. Probeer 't!

source: Just click on any house symbol next to the rocks, select the small buildings tab in the window that opens up, then click on the quarry symbol.
target: Klick eenfach een of anner Huus-Teken tegen de Stenen an, köör de Listenwessler för de lütten Husen ut un klick dann de Flintslagerhuus-Teken an.

source: A helmet is a basic tool to protect soldiers. It is produced in the small armor smithy and used to train soldiers from health level 0 to level 1.
target: Een Helm is een eenfacher Schuur för Soldaten. 't word in de Lütten Wapensmee produzeert un bruukt, um Soldaten vun Gesundheid-Stand 0 up Stand 1 uttobilden.

source: We could use these weapons to equip some new soldiers. I hope we won’t find enemies here, but it is always better to be prepared. New soldiers are equipped in a barracks with a short sword and a fur garment, the uniform of all honorable warriors.
target: Wi könen deese Wapen bruken, um wat Soldaten uttobilden. Ick hoop, dat wi hier keene Feinde finnen, aver 't is immer beter, sük klaartomaken. Neje Soldaten worden in eener Kasern mit eenem Lütten Sweert un eener Fellkluft, de Staat vun all ehrbaren Ridders, utstaffeert.

source: This is the basic weapon of the Frisian soldiers. Together with a fur garment, it makes up the equipment of young soldiers. Short swords are produced by the small armor smithy.
target: Dat is de eenfachste Wapen för Freeske Soldaten. Tosammen mit eener Fellkluft is se de Utrüstung för neje Soldaten. Lütte Sweerten worden in de Lütte Wapensmee produzeert.

source: Mead is produced by mead breweries and used in drinking halls for producing meals. Soldiers drink mead during advanced training.
target: Hönnigbeer word vun Brauhusen produzeert un vun Soldaten bi'm Öven drunken.

source: Mead is produced by mead breweries and used in drinking halls for producing meals. Soldiers drink mead during advanced training.
target: Hönnigbeer word vun Brauhusen produzeert un vun Soldaten bi'm Öven drunken.

source: First, I’ll left-click on the symbol where I want the lumberjack’s hut to be built. A window will appear where I can choose between buildings. Because I’ll click a yellow house symbol – which means that its field can house medium and small buildings – I am presented with all the medium buildings that I can build. The lumberjack’s hut is a small building, so I will go on to select the small buildings tab. Then I’ll choose the lumberjack’s hut.
target: Toeerst klick ick de Teken, waar dat Boomhauer-Huus entstahn sall, mit de linke Muustaste an. Een Fenster kummt vundag, waar ick tüsken mehren Husen kören kann. Ick klicke een geles Huus-Teken an – dat heet, daar kann man lütte un middelmatige Husen bauen – daarum worden all de middelmatig Husen, de ick bauen kann, wesen. Dat Boomhauer-Huus is een lüttes Huus, daarum klick ick de Listenwessler för de lütten Husen an. Dann köör ick dat Boomhauer-Huus ut.

source: You have closed the building statistics window. I didn’t notice that you switched to the medium buildings to look up the number of taverns. Would you please be so nice and show it to me?
target: Du hest dat Fenster för Tahlen över Husen dichtmaakt. Ick hebb nich sehn, dat du de Listenwessler för middelmatige Husen utköört hest, um de Tahl vun Kneipen natokieken. Wees doch bidde so good un wies mi dat?

source: Build a forester’s house to preserve the wood resources of this island.
target: Bau een Förster-Huus, um de Walden up de Insel to wahren.

source: The repair of our ship will take a few weeks, anyway, and the resources we harvest now might be the base of strong and big buildings in another land.
target: Uns' Schipp to repareren düürt sowieso eenige Weken, un wat wi nu arnten, kann de Grundlage för grote, machtige Husen in eenem annern Land sien.

source: Of course this means you will need more resources for preparing this food – like fish, meat or bread.
target: Daar bruukst du natürelk Waren to, um de Spiesen torechttomaken – Fiss, Fleesk oder Brood.

source: To make matters even worse, all the land we can see is blocked by rocks and trees. I fear we won’t find the resources we need to build a new ship.
target: Un 't is noch slimmer: All dat Land, wat wi sehn könen, is mit Stenen un Bomen dichtmüürt. Ick bün bang, dat wi de nödigen Materialien, de wi bruken, um een nejes Schipp to bauen, nich finnen könen.

source: As we don’t know how many resources we can get, we should be very restrictive in spending them. Even for military buildings, we should be very careful.
target: Wi weten nich, wo völe Materialien wi kriegen könen, also sallen wi blot nich to vööle verklüngeln. Ok för Soldateree-Boen mutten wi leep good uppassen.

source: Sire, Amalea is right about the resources. Therefore I correct myself. We should only build an outpost as this is the most effective military building.
target: Mienheer, Amalee' hett Recht över de Materialien. Ick änner mienen Raad. Wi sallen blot eene Butenstee bauen, wat de goodkopenste Soldateree-Boo is.

source: Now that we have all resources ready for building a ship, we should explore the surrounding islands.
target: Nu dat wi alle Materialien paraat hebben, um een Schipp to bauen, sallen wi de Inseln umto utförsken.

source: Dismantle all unproductive small buildings to get some resources for new buildings.
target: Riet all unnützen lütten Husen platt, um Materialien för neje Husen to kriegen.

source: Use your resources wisely to train at least three fully promoted heroes.
target: Bruuk diene Waren klook, um tominnst dree Soldaten kumpleet uttobilden.

source: Dismantling the quarry: a builder will walk from the headquarters to dismantle the quarry piece by piece. Thereby, you regain some of the resources you used for the construction.
target: Dat Flintslagerhuus plattrieten: Een Baukeerl kummt vum Raadhuus, um dat Flintslagerhuus stückwies platttorieten. So kriggst du een paar vun de Materialien torügg, de tum Bauen verwendt wurren.

source: Dismantling the quarry: A builder will walk from the headquarters to dismantle the quarry piece by piece. Thereby, you regain some of the resources you used for the construction.
target: Dat Flintslagerhuus plattrieten: Een Baukeerl kummt vum Raadhuus, um dat Flintslagerhuus stückwies platttorieten. So kriggst du een paar vun de Materialien torügg, de tum Bauen verwendt wurren.

source: The citadel can house 12 soldiers, and it is the biggest military building the Barbarians can build. It also costs a lot of resources and takes a long time to build. It is most suited to guard strategically important points like constricted points or mountains.
target: Dat Kasteel hett Steden för 12 Soldaten un is de grootste Soldateree-Boo, wat de Willen Lüü bauen könen. 't köst mennig Materialien un dat Bauen düürt lang. 't is good gadelk, um taktisk dürable Steden as enge Passen oder Bargen to schütten.

source: Keep an eye on your fishers and build a fish breeder’s house. After fish resources are exhausted in their work area, the fish supply cannot be regenerated.
target: Kiek up diene Fiskers un bau Fisstüchtereen. Wenn de Fiss leeg is, kann sük de Fiss-Versörgung nich verhalen.

source: Keep an eye on your fishers. After fish resources are exhausted in their work area, they will stop fishing.
target: Kiek up diene Fiskers. Wenn de Fiss leeg is, arbeiden se nich mehr.

source: The fish breeder working out of this fish breeder’s house can’t find any fish in his work area. Remember that you can only regenerate your fish resources if there are some fish left to breed.
target: De Fiss-Tüchter dat warkt bi deese Fisstüchteree hett keene Fiske tum Tüchten. Du kannst de Fiske blot dann vermehren, wenn du een poor overlettst.

source: A building is being dismantled at this dismantle site, returning some of the resources that were used during this building’s construction to your tribe’s stores.
target: Hier word een Huus plattreten, um eenige Waren torüggtokriegen, de tum Bauen verwendt wurren.

source: Fish is one of the biggest food resources of the Atlanteans. It has to be smoked in a smokery before being delivered to mines, training sites and scouts.
target: Fiss is eene vun de wichtigsten Spiesen för de Atlantinger. 't mutt in eener Rökelkamer rökelt worden, ehr 't vun Bargwarken, Övens-Boen un Bespejers bruukt worden kann.

source: Fish is a very important food resource for the Frisians. It is fished from the shore or reared in aqua farms.
target: Fiss is eene bannig wichtige Spies för de Fresen. 't word vun de Waterkant fiskt oder in Fissbuurdereen tücht.

source: Build a forester’s house to preserve the wood resources of this island.
target: Bau een Förster-Huus, um de Walden up de Insel to wahren.

source: The repair of our ship will take a few weeks, anyway, and the resources we harvest now might be the base of strong and big buildings in another land.
target: Uns' Schipp to repareren düürt sowieso eenige Weken, un wat wi nu arnten, kann de Grundlage för grote, machtige Husen in eenem annern Land sien.

source: Of course this means you will need more resources for preparing this food – like fish, meat or bread.
target: Daar bruukst du natürelk Waren to, um de Spiesen torechttomaken – Fiss, Fleesk oder Brood.

source: To make matters even worse, all the land we can see is blocked by rocks and trees. I fear we won’t find the resources we need to build a new ship.
target: Un 't is noch slimmer: All dat Land, wat wi sehn könen, is mit Stenen un Bomen dichtmüürt. Ick bün bang, dat wi de nödigen Materialien, de wi bruken, um een nejes Schipp to bauen, nich finnen könen.

source: As we don’t know how many resources we can get, we should be very restrictive in spending them. Even for military buildings, we should be very careful.
target: Wi weten nich, wo völe Materialien wi kriegen könen, also sallen wi blot nich to vööle verklüngeln. Ok för Soldateree-Boen mutten wi leep good uppassen.

source: Sire, Amalea is right about the resources. Therefore I correct myself. We should only build an outpost as this is the most effective military building.
target: Mienheer, Amalee' hett Recht över de Materialien. Ick änner mienen Raad. Wi sallen blot eene Butenstee bauen, wat de goodkopenste Soldateree-Boo is.

source: Now that we have all resources ready for building a ship, we should explore the surrounding islands.
target: Nu dat wi alle Materialien paraat hebben, um een Schipp to bauen, sallen wi de Inseln umto utförsken.

source: Dismantle all unproductive small buildings to get some resources for new buildings.
target: Riet all unnützen lütten Husen platt, um Materialien för neje Husen to kriegen.

source: Use your resources wisely to train at least three fully promoted heroes.
target: Bruuk diene Waren klook, um tominnst dree Soldaten kumpleet uttobilden.

source: Dismantling the quarry: a builder will walk from the headquarters to dismantle the quarry piece by piece. Thereby, you regain some of the resources you used for the construction.
target: Dat Flintslagerhuus plattrieten: Een Baukeerl kummt vum Raadhuus, um dat Flintslagerhuus stückwies platttorieten. So kriggst du een paar vun de Materialien torügg, de tum Bauen verwendt wurren.

source: Dismantling the quarry: A builder will walk from the headquarters to dismantle the quarry piece by piece. Thereby, you regain some of the resources you used for the construction.
target: Dat Flintslagerhuus plattrieten: Een Baukeerl kummt vum Raadhuus, um dat Flintslagerhuus stückwies platttorieten. So kriggst du een paar vun de Materialien torügg, de tum Bauen verwendt wurren.

source: The citadel can house 12 soldiers, and it is the biggest military building the Barbarians can build. It also costs a lot of resources and takes a long time to build. It is most suited to guard strategically important points like constricted points or mountains.
target: Dat Kasteel hett Steden för 12 Soldaten un is de grootste Soldateree-Boo, wat de Willen Lüü bauen könen. 't köst mennig Materialien un dat Bauen düürt lang. 't is good gadelk, um taktisk dürable Steden as enge Passen oder Bargen to schütten.

source: Keep an eye on your fishers and build a fish breeder’s house. After fish resources are exhausted in their work area, the fish supply cannot be regenerated.
target: Kiek up diene Fiskers un bau Fisstüchtereen. Wenn de Fiss leeg is, kann sük de Fiss-Versörgung nich verhalen.

source: Keep an eye on your fishers. After fish resources are exhausted in their work area, they will stop fishing.
target: Kiek up diene Fiskers. Wenn de Fiss leeg is, arbeiden se nich mehr.

source: The fish breeder working out of this fish breeder’s house can’t find any fish in his work area. Remember that you can only regenerate your fish resources if there are some fish left to breed.
target: De Fiss-Tüchter dat warkt bi deese Fisstüchteree hett keene Fiske tum Tüchten. Du kannst de Fiske blot dann vermehren, wenn du een poor overlettst.

source: A building is being dismantled at this dismantle site, returning some of the resources that were used during this building’s construction to your tribe’s stores.
target: Hier word een Huus plattreten, um eenige Waren torüggtokriegen, de tum Bauen verwendt wurren.

source: Fish is one of the biggest food resources of the Atlanteans. It has to be smoked in a smokery before being delivered to mines, training sites and scouts.
target: Fiss is eene vun de wichtigsten Spiesen för de Atlantinger. 't mutt in eener Rökelkamer rökelt worden, ehr 't vun Bargwarken, Övens-Boen un Bespejers bruukt worden kann.

source: Build 2 ports on distant islands
target: Bau 2 Muden up annern Insels

source: Discover more land in your vicinity and build as many ports as you can.
target: Försk mehr Land in de Naberskupp ut un bau so völe Muden as gaht.

source: Lutius. Well done. Well done. We have discovered all possible port locations in the complete region. Now we can strengthen our economy and we will manage to sail home soon.
target: Lutjus. Hunnert. Hunnert. Wi hebben all de Rüümte för Muden funnen, de 't hier eenerwegens gifft. Nu könen wi uns' Wirtschaft starken un bold na Huus seilen.

source: Welcome back. In this tutorial, you are going to learn the most important things about seafaring, that is ships, ports, and expedition.
target: Willkomen torügg. In deese Inföhren lehrst du de wichtigsten Dingen över Seefahrt, also Schippen, Muden un Söken.

source: Although ports act as warehouses, you should not build more than necessary: they cost quartz, diamonds and gold, which makes them quite expensive.
target: Muden sünd ok Kraamhusen, aver du sallst nich mehr bauen, as du bruukst: se sünd bannig düür un kösten Blinkerflint, Edelstenen un Gold.

source: In this scenario, you’ve learned everything about seafaring: how to build ports and ships and how to send out an expedition. Remember that expeditions are sometimes the fastest way to reach essential resources – and sometimes the only one.
target: In deese Inföhren hest du alls över Seefahrt lehrt: wo dat gaht, Muden un Schippen to bauen un eene Söke antofangen. Vergeet nich, dat Söken faaktieden de gaueste Weg to wichtigen Mineraalen sünd – mennigmaal de eenzigste.

source: The third tab shows you the wares that are stored in your headquarters, your warehouses and ports. They are not needed anywhere and are therefore your reserve.
target: De darde Listenwessler wiest all de Waren, de in dienem Raadhuus, dienen Kraamhusen un dienen Muden verwahrt sünd. Se worden jüüst nich bruukt un wachten, bit se vun elkeen Huus bruukt worden.

source: New port construction site is gone
target: Neje Rüümte för Muden is verswunnen

source: Widelands could not establish a connection to the given address. Either no Widelands server was running at the supposed port or the server shut down as you tried to connect.
target: Widelands kunn keen Verbinnen mit de angeven Adress maken. Of keen Widelands-Server leep an de angeven Port of de Server weer utknipst as du di verbinnen wullst.

source: Widelands was unable to use the local network. Maybe some other process is already running a server on port %sor your network setup is broken.
target: Widelands kunn de stedenwies Nett nich bruken. Wahrschienelk bedrifft een annerer Prozess al eenen Server up Port %s oder diene Nett-Instellungen sünd kaputt.

source: To provide these foodstuffs, you can build a fisher’s house, a hunter’s house, a farm, a mill and a bakery.
target: Um deese Rohköst to produzeren, kannst du eene Fiskeree, een Jaggthuus, eene Buurderee un eene Backeree bauen.

source: It’s been months, and we are still hiding where the forests are old and dark.
target: 't is Maanten her, un wi versteken uns immer noch in ollen, dunkeln Walden.

source: An old man says…
target: Een oller Mann seggt …

source: Replace the old and ineffective forester’s houses
target: Verneei de ollen, unnützen Förster-Husen

source: The barbarian tribe he mentioned is also a threat. I don’t want to share this land with anyone, as sharing only leads to conflicts and battles, as we saw in our old home. We must defeat the barbarians as well.
target: Dat Wille Volk, waar he vun sproken hett, is ok eene Gefahr. Ick will deeses Land mit nüms delen, wiel Delen blot to Stried un Kriegen föhrt, as wie in uns' oller Heimaad sehn hebben. Wi mutten ok de Willen Lüü manntjen.

source:
An old Barbarian proverb
meaning that you need to take some risks sometimes.
target:
Eene olle Wille Seggwies,
wat bedüddt, dat du mennigmaal een Raakwark doon muttst.

source: You have two messages at the moment. This one, which you are currently reading, and the one that informed you that a new headquarters was added to your economy. Let’s learn how to archive messages: first, select the message that you wish to archive by clicking on it in the list. Then, click the
target: Du hest even twee Narichten. Deese hier, wat du upstünds leest, un eene, wat di över een nejes Raadhuus in diener Wirtschaft informeert. Laat mi di lehren, wo dat Wegdoon vun Narichten gaht: Toeerst köörst du de Naricht, wat du wegdoon willt, ut, indeem du se in de Liste anklickst. Dann klick de

source: On MacOS, you can find the file called COPYING in the archive you downloaded from the website.
target: Up Linux finnst du de Datei mit de Naam »COPYING« in de Paket, dat du vun de Internett-Sied runnerladen hest.

source: Manage your messages more efficiently: press ‘N’ for News to access the messages window, then use ‘G’ for Go To, and the Delete key to archive messages.
target: Kümmer di fixer um diene Narichten: Drück »N« as »Naricht«, um de Narichten-Fenster opentokregen, bruuk dann »G«, um daarhen to gahn, un de Entf-Tast, um de Naricht wegtodoon.

source: Oxen are bred in cattle farms out of wheat and water.
target: Ossen worden in Buurdereen mit Weit un Water tücht.

source: However, we can already start focusing on recruiting and training soldiers. We can now afford to use metal for weapons, helmets and garments. I propose building armor smithies, a barracks, a training arena and a tailor’s shop now.
target: Aver wi könen al begünnen, uns um dat Anhüren un Utbilden vun Soldaten to kümmern. Wi könen uns nu günnen, Metall för Wapen, Helms un Kluften to bruken. Ick slaa vör, nu Wapensmeden, eene Kasern, eene Övens-Ring un eene Sniederee to bauen.

source: The Atlantean fires in smelting works, armor smithies and weapon smithies are fed with coal.
target: Dat Füür in Atlantisken Smeltwark, Panzersmeden un Wapensmeden verbrannt Köhl.

source: The fires of the Empire smelting works, armor smithies and weapon smithies are usually fed with coal.
target: Dat Füür in de Rieks-Smeltwark, -Panzersmeden un -Wapensmeden verbrannt meest Köhl.

source: The fires of the furnaces and armor smithies are fed with coal.
target: Dat Füür in Smeltereen un Wapensmeden bruukt Köhl.

source: Gold is used by the armor smithy, the weapon smithy and the gold spinning mill.
target: Gold word in Panzersmeden, Wapensmeden un de Goldspinneree bruukt.

source: As your road network gets longer and more complicated, you should employ horses to help out your carriers. Horses are bred at horse farms using water and corn. A warehouse will also help to ensure that your transportation system does not collapse.
target: As dien Stratennett groter un kumplizeerter word, sallst du Peer in Deenst stellen, um dienen Lastendragers to helpen. Peer worden in Peertüchtereen mit Water un Mais tücht. Een Kraamhuus helpt ok, dat dien Stratennett nich tosamenbreckt.

source: Breeds the strong Atlantean horses for adding them to the transportation system.
target: Tücht de stevigen Atlantisken Peer för dat Stratennett.

source: This corn is processed in the mill into fine cornmeal that every Atlantean baker needs for a good bread. Also horse and spider farms need to be provided with corn.
target: Deeser Mais word in Möhlen to Maismehl verarbeidt, wat elkeen Atlantisker Backer för godes Brood bruukt. Ok Peertüchtereen un Spinnentüchtereen mutten mit Mais versörgt worden.

source: Water is used in the bakery and the horse and spider farms.
target: Water word in de Backeree, de Peertüchteree un de Spinnentüchteree bruukt.

source: Horses help to carry items along busy roads. They are reared in a horse farm.
target: Peer dragen Waren över besige Straten. Se worden in de Peertüchteree tücht.

source: Breeds the strong Atlantean horses for adding them to the transportation system.
target: Tücht de stevigen Atlantisken Peer för dat Stratennett.

source: Expeditions can be started in every port. Then, all needed wares are transported to that port. The wares are exactly those your tribe needs to build a port (your goal is to build a port far away from home, so this is not surprising), and of course you need a builder, too. When everything is prepared, a ship will come and pick it up.
target: Du kannst eene Söke in elkeen Muu begünnen. Alle nödigen Waren worden dann to deese Muu brocht. De Waren sünd nau deese, de dien Volk bruukt, um eene Muu to bauen (du willt ja eene Muu wied weg bauen, also keene Överraschung), un du bruukst natürelk ok eenen Baukeerl. Wenn alls paraat is, kummt een Schipp un nimmt alls mit.

source: At first, I was naive and hoped that they were peaceful, but as soon as one of them saw me, they charged towards me and started attacking me with their throwing spears. Thanks be to the Gods that I was able to flee and hide myself, before retreating back to our colony under cover of darkness.
target: Vörderhand was ick so eenfoldig, to glöven, se wesen villicht freedsam, aver as eener vun hör mi sehn hett, sünd se all to mi henlöpptun hebben Speren na mi smeten. De Gotten Loff un Dank dat ick flüchten un mi versteken kunn, ehr ick im Dunkeln torügg in uns' Dörp gahn kunn.

source: They are used by berry and reed farmers as well as foresters. Clay diggers also need them to dig mud out of hard soil.
target: Se worden vun Buskenplanters, Reitburen un Försters bruukt. Lehmgravers bruken se ok, um Klei ut harder Eer to graven.

source: Widelands is a free, open source real-time strategy game with singleplayer campaigns and a multiplayer mode. The game was inspired by Settlers II but has significantly more variety and depth to it. Still, it is easy to get started through playable tutorials.
target: Widelands is een frejes, quellopens taktisk Speel in Echt-Tied mit Rutfödderungen för eenen Speler oder för mennig Spelers. Dat Speel is vun Settlers II anreegt, hett aver unbannig vööl mehr Ofwesseln un Deepde. Aver dör de Inföhrens tum Spölen kann man doch leep licht mit Widelands bekennt worden.

source: Invalid path to file in campaigns.conf: %s
target: De Datei-Padd »%s« in de campaigns.conf is ungültig.

source: Ports are built like normal buildings, but are only available on blue port spaces. Just click on a field with the icon and the building menu automatically offers you to build a port.
target: Muden baust du as annere Husen, aver se sünd blot up de blauen Rüümten för Muden paraat. Klick een Feld mit de Teken an un dat Bau-Menü büddt di eene Muu an.

source: It is easier to understand what type of buildings can be built on which field when the symbols for the building spaces are enabled.
target: 't is lichter to verstahn, up welken Felden wat för Husen baut worden könen, wenn de Tekens för de Rüümten tum Bauen wesen worden.

source: Great! Erwyn gave up when he saw his last buildings burning down. That’s one less strong warlord on this island!
target: Hunnert! Erwin hett upgeven as he siene lesten Husen ofbrannen sach. Dat is een machtiger Kummandant minner up de Insel!

source: Great! Jomo gave up when he saw his last buildings burning down. That’s one less warlord on this island!
target: Hunnert! Jomo hett upgeven as he siene lesten Husen ofbrannen sach. Dat is een Kummandant minner up de Insel!

source: Still, I saw no way that I could erase my shame without fighting against these Barbarians. So, I left Fremil by boat to find a new world and a new life for myself, somewhere in the south. Now I am sailing on the Gulf of Perl with my family, some of my friends and a few of my best warriors.
target: Ick wuss nich, wo ick mien Schann ohne eene Slacht tegen de Willen Lüü liekmaken kann. Also hebb ick Freemilt up eenem Schipp verlaten, um eene neje Heimaad un een nejes Leven to finnen, enerwaar im Süden. Upstünds seil ick in de Parrelsbucht mit mien Familie, eenigen Frünnen un een paar vun mienen besten Soldaten.

source: We landed on an unknown coast and found peaceful rest under the palm trees growing at the shore. But that is about as good as it gets. The truth is: when I woke up this morning, I saw nothing but sand around us.
target: Wi sünd up eener frömden Küst lannt un kunnen uns unner de Palmen an de Waterkant hagelk verhalen. 't is as 't is, man nich as 't wesen mutt. De Wahrheid is: as ick vunmörgens upwaakde, hebb ick nix as Sand sehn.

source: Sire, I saw that the construction of the blockhouse was completed, so I have assigned one of my best soldiers to it to keep watch on the desert.
target: Mienheer, ick hebb sehn, dat de Wachters-Kamerke nu beschickt is. Ick hebb eenen vun mienen besten Soldaten schickt, över de Wüüst to wachten.

source: At first, I was naive and hoped that they were peaceful, but as soon as one of them saw me, they charged towards me and started attacking me with their throwing spears. Thanks be to the Gods that I was able to flee and hide myself, before retreating back to our colony under cover of darkness.
target: Vörderhand was ick so eenfoldig, to glöven, se wesen villicht freedsam, aver as eener vun hör mi sehn hett, sünd se all to mi henlöpptun hebben Speren na mi smeten. De Gotten Loff un Dank dat ick flüchten un mi versteken kunn, ehr ick im Dunkeln torügg in uns' Dörp gahn kunn.

source: Sire, I saw that the construction of the outpost was completed, so I have assigned some of my best soldiers to it to keep the watch.
target: Mienheer, ick hebb sehn, dat de Butenstee nu beschickt is. Ick hebb een paar vun mienen besten Soldaten tum Schildern schickt.

source: The barbarian tribe he mentioned is also a threat. I don’t want to share this land with anyone, as sharing only leads to conflicts and battles, as we saw in our old home. We must defeat the barbarians as well.
target: Dat Wille Volk, waar he vun sproken hett, is ok eene Gefahr. Ick will deeses Land mit nüms delen, wiel Delen blot to Stried un Kriegen föhrt, as wie in uns' oller Heimaad sehn hebben. Wi mutten ok de Willen Lüü manntjen.

source: In every military building, you can set the preference for heroes (trained soldiers) or rookies. From time to time, a soldier will walk out of the building and be replaced by a stronger/weaker one automatically – this is what you saw earlier.
target: För elkeen Soldateree-Boo kannst du fastleggen, of Helden (utbildt Suldaten) oder Snöttbaarten vörtrucken worden. Of un an verlaat een Soldat dat Huus un word automatisk mit eenem starkeren/swackeren utwesselt – dat hest du vörhen sehn.

source: Other ways to produce food – different kinds of food – are fishers and farms. The wheat of the farms has to be processed with water in a bakery before it becomes edible. You can obtain water by building a well on a spot where your geologists have found a water source.
target: Annere Wege, Spiesen – annere Aarden vun Spiesen – to produzeren, sünd Fiskers un Buurdereen. De Weit vun Buurdereen mutt mit Water in eener Backeree verarbeidt worden, ehr man 't eten kann. Du kriggst Water, indeem du eene Well an eener Stee baust, waar een Schattsöker Water funnen hett.

source: You’ve lead the expedition to a successful end and founded a new colony. I’ve sent out some geologists – they already report that they’ve found some iron ore.
target: Du hest de Söök good klaarmaakt un een nejes Dörp gründt. Ick hebb eenen Schattsöker schickt – he hett al Iesenkluut funnen.

source: An expedition ship reached a coast and is waiting for further commands.
target: Een Schiüü up Söke hett een Küst funnen un wacht för dien Gebodd.

source: Center view on this
target: Hierher springen

source: Center the main view on this
target: Hierher springen

source: Food is very important for mines and military training areas. Establish a well working food environment by building at least one farm, one blackroot farm and a mill. The two kinds of flour together with water from a well will be baked into bread in a bakery, so build a bakery and a well, too.
target: Spiesen sünd leep wichtig för Bargwarken un Övens-Boen för Soldaten. Bau eene gode Versörgung mit Spiesen up, indeem du tominnst eene Buurderee, eene Swartwuddel-Buurderee un eene Möhlen baust. De twee Aarden vun Mehl worden mit Water ut eener Well in eener Backeree to Brood backen, bau also ok eene Backeree un eene Well.

source: In this scenario, I’m going to tell you about soldiers, their training and their profession: warfare. Although Widelands is about building up, not burning down, there is an enemy you sometimes have to defeat. Yet warfare is mainly focused on economics, not on military strategies, and its mechanics deserve explanation.
target: In deese Inföhren verklaar ick di Soldaten, hör Utbildung un hör Beruf: Krieg. In Widelands gaht 't um Upbauen, nich Ofbrannen, aver of un an mutt du eenen Feind manntjen. Bi’m Krieg gaht 't in 't Geheel um de Wirtschaft, nich taktiske Dingen, aver Slachten mutten doch verklaart worden.

source: Your soldiers will leave the fortress while the construction is going on. This means that your fortress will lose its military influence, as I described above.
target: Diene Soldaten verlaten de Schanz as 't utbaut word. Diene Schanz schütt unnertüsken dat Land nich mehr, as ick al beschreven hebb.
