source: Build military sites to expand your territory
target: Bau Soldateree-Boen, um dien Gewest to vergrotern

source: If you’re low on soldiers to occupy new military sites, use the downward arrow button to decrease the capacity. You can also click on a soldier to send him away.
target: Wenn du nich genoog Soldaten hest, um neje Soldateree-Boen to besetten, kannst du de Tahl vun Soldaten mit de Piel-runner-Knoop minnern. Du kannst ok eenen Soldat anklicken, um hüm wegtostüren.

source: I hope I could teach you how you can control the economy in Widelands. There are many options and they can be confusing at first. Even if you’ve only understood a few concepts, you mustn’t give up. Try them out in some games, become familiar with them and experience the possibilities. Then, return to this tutorial and learn the rest!
target: Ich hoop, dat ick di lehren kunn, wo du de Wirtschaft in Widelands kuntrolleren kannst. 't gifft mennig Instellungen un se könen toeerst elkeen rammdösig maken. Ok wenn du eerst een paar daarvun verstahn hest, dürst du nich upgeven. Versöök 't all in een paar Spelen, um 't to kennen to kriegen, un probeer de Kansen ut. Dann koom torügg to deese Inföhren un lehr de Rest!

source: The hunter working out of this hunter’s house can’t find any game in his work area.
target: De Jäger, de bi deese Jaggthuus warkt, het keene Deerten tum Jagen.

source: The hunter working out of this hunter’s hut can’t find any game in his work area. Remember that you can build a gamekeeper’s hut to release more game into the wild.
target: De Jäger, de bi deese Jaggthuus warkt, het keene Deerten tum Jagen. Du kannst neje Deerten tüchten, wenn du een Deertentüchteree baust.

source: The hunter working out of this hunter’s house can’t find any game in his work area.
target: De Jäger, de bi deese Jaggthuus warkt, het keene Deerten tum Jagen.

source: The hunter working out of this hunter’s house can’t find any game in his work area.
target: De Jäger, de bi deese Jaggthuus warkt, het keene Deerten tum Jagen.

source: Meat contains a lot of energy, and it is obtained from wild game taken by hunters.
target: In Fleesk steckt bannig vööl Energie. 't word vun Jägers produzeert, indeem se wille Deerten jaggen.

source: Save Game Error!
target: Fehler bi’m sekern!

source: --nosound            Starts the game with sound disabled.
target: --nosound            Sünner elkeen Gedrüüs spölen

source: You may of course enhance all mines to deep mines instantly given you have the workers – bigger mines work a bit faster, smaller mines need cheaper food. It’s up to you which strategy you prefer.
target: Natürelk kannst du all Bargwarken stracks utbauen, wenn du de nödigen Arbeiders hest – deepe Bargwarken arbeiden en bietje gauer, lütte Bargwarken bruuken billigers Eten. Du maakst of, wat di lever is.

source: We need to build a tavern for preparing rations. To get the raw food, we have to build a fisher’s house, and as nobody likes raw fish, a smokery to smoke it. Furthermore, build a berry farm which will plant berry bushes, and a fruit collector’s house so the bushes will be harvested.
target: Wi bruken eene Kneipe, um Happen torechttomaken. Um dat ruge Eten to kriegen bruken wi eene Fiskeree, un wiel nüms rugen Fiss mag, eene Rökelkamer, um 't to rökeln. Bau ok eene Buskenplanteree, de Busken för Früchten anplant, un eene Früchtenpottjeree, um de Busken to arnten.

source: The warrior’s ax is the most dangerous of all Barbarian weapons. Only a few soldiers ever were able to handle this huge and powerful ax. It is produced in a war mill and used – together with food – in a training camp to train soldiers from attack level 4 to level 5.
target: De Ridderext is de machtigste Wapen vun allen, de de Willen Lüü hebben. Bedröövt minn Soldaten könen deese grote, baldadige Ext bruken. 't word in de Oorlogs-Smee produzeert un – tosammen mit Spiese – im Övens-Lager bruukt, um Soldaten vun Angriff-Stand 4 up Stand 5 to verbetern.

source: This tasty bread is made in bakeries out of cornmeal, blackroot flour and water. It is appreciated as basic food by miners, scouts and soldiers in training sites (labyrinth and dungeon).
target: Deeses leckere Brood word in Backereen ut Maismehl, Swartwuddel-Mehl un Water maakt. 't is eene gode Spies för Bargwarkskeerls, Bespejers un Soldaten in Övens-Boen (Dwaalwegen un Gefahrelke Gangen).

source: Fish is a very important food resource for the Frisians. It is fished from the shore or reared in aqua farms.
target: Fiss is eene bannig wichtige Spies för de Fresen. 't word vun de Waterkant fiskt oder in Fissbuurdereen tücht.

source: A meal is made out of pitta bread, strong beer and fish/meat in a big inn. This substantial food is exactly what workers in a deeper mine need.
target: Een Mahl word in eenem Weertshuus ut Pitta-Brood, Deftigen Beer un Fiss oder Fleesk maakt. Dat is wat de Arbeiders in eenem Bannig deepen Bargwark bruken.

source: Most buildings will only produce something when the stock level in your warehouses falls below the target quantity, so you should indicate the reserve you want to stockpile.
target: De meesten Husen produzeren blot dann wat, wenn diene Kraamhusen minner Waren hebben, as de End-Tahl fastleggt. Du kannst so also fastsetten, wo völe Waren du överhollen willt.

source: No Level Ground
target: Hebb keen Klei mehr

source: The clay digger working at this clay pit can’t find any level ground in his work area. Consider dismantling this clay pit and rebuilding it somewhere else.
target: De Lehmgraver dat warkt bi deese Lehmkuhl hett keen Klei tum utbuddeln. Überlegg di, of du dat Huus plattrieten oder ofbrannen un annerwegens wedde hensetten willt.

source: This mine exploits all of the resource down to the deepest level. But even after having done so, it will still have a %s chance of finding some more coal.
target: Deeses Bargwark haalt de Mineraal kumpleet ut d Grund. Wenn 't leeg is, kann 't immer noch mit eener Kans vun %s Köhle finnen.

source: This mine exploits all of the resource down to the deepest level. But even after having done so, it will still have a %s chance of finding some more gold ore.
target: Deeses Bargwark haalt de Mineraal kumpleet ut d Grund. Wenn 't leeg is, kann 't immer noch mit eener Kans vun %s Goldkluut finnen.

source: This mine exploits all of the resource down to the deepest level. But even after having done so, it will still have a %s chance of finding some more granite.
target: Deeses Bargwark haalt de Mineraal kumpleet ut d Grund. Wenn 't leeg is, kann 't immer noch mit eener Kans vun %s Flint finnen.

source: This mine exploits all of the resource down to the deepest level. But even after having done so, it will still have a %s chance of finding some more iron ore.
target: Deeses Bargwark haalt de Mineraal kumpleet ut d Grund. Wenn 't leeg is, kann 't immer noch mit eener Kans vun %s Iesenkluut finnen.

source: This mine exploits all of the resource down to the deepest level. But even after having done so, it will still have a %s chance of finding some more coal.
target: Deeses Bargwark haalt de Mineraal kumpleet ut d Grund. Wenn 't leeg is, kann 't immer noch mit eener Kans vun %s Köhle finnen.

source: This mine exploits all of the resource down to the deepest level. But even after having done so, it will still have a %s chance of finding some more gold ore.
target: Deeses Bargwark haalt de Mineraal kumpleet ut d Grund. Wenn 't leeg is, kann 't immer noch mit eener Kans vun %s Goldkluut finnen.

source: This mine exploits all of the resource down to the deepest level. But even after having done so, it will still have a %s chance of finding some more iron ore.
target: Deeses Bargwark haalt de Mineraal kumpleet ut d Grund. Wenn 't leeg is, kann 't immer noch mit eener Kans vun %s Iesenkluut finnen.

source: This mine exploits all of the resource down to the deepest level. But even after having done so, it will still have a %s chance of finding some more granite.
target: Deeses Bargwark haalt de Mineraal kumpleet ut d Grund. Wenn 't leeg is, kann 't immer noch mit eener Kans vun %s Flint finnen.

source: If the food supply is steady, the rock mine can produce two blocks of granite in %s on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all %s twee Blocken Flint.

source: As your road network gets longer and more complicated, you should employ horses to help out your carriers. Horses are bred at horse farms using water and corn. A warehouse will also help to ensure that your transportation system does not collapse.
target: As dien Stratennett groter un kumplizeerter word, sallst du Peer in Deenst stellen, um dienen Lastendragers to helpen. Peer worden in Peertüchtereen mit Water un Mais tücht. Een Kraamhuus helpt ok, dat dien Stratennett nich tosamenbreckt.

source: When roads are under heavy load for a long time, one carrier is usually not enough to transport goods swiftly. Traffic jams are the consequence. Such roads therefore employ a second carrier: an ox that helps to carry the wares. This doubles the transport capacity.
target: Wenn Straten lange starken Verkehr hebben, is een Lastendrager mennigtied nich genoog, um Waren fix to transporteren. Da gahn Staus na. Sülke Straten kriegen daarum eenen tweeden Lastendrager: een Oss helpt, Waren to dragen. Dat verdübbelt de Kansen tum Transport.

source: If there are difficulties with building all the buildings needed, we should think about all we have learned so far. We can cut down all the rocks. We should perhaps optimize our roads to free up some building sites, or even dismantle some military buildings to obtain more space for our economy.
target: Wenn 't nich gaht, all de nödigen Husen to bauen, mutten wi över dat nadenken, wat wi bit nu lehrt hebben. Wi könen all de Stenen ofslagen. Wi könen villicht uns' Stratennett verbetern, um wat Rüümte för Husen freei to maken, oder ok een paar Soldateree-Boen plattrieten, um mehr Rüümte för uns' Wirtschaft to kriegen.

source: Clear Road Network
target: Stratennett uprümen

source: Resolve the chaotic road network by clearing all unnecessary roads.
target: Rüüm deeses Kuddelmuddel vun eenem Stratennett up, indeem du all unnützen Straten wegdoost.

source: Oh no! Amalea is right. In fact, I can’t see any productivity at all. And the road network seems to be completely in shambles as well. Who might be responsible for this chaos?
target: Och nee! Amalee' hett recht. Ick kann överhoopt keene Wöörde sehn. Un dat Stratennett is ok heel un daal in ’t Wilde. Well is wull för deeses Dörnanner verantwoordelk?

source: Amalea Reminds to Clear Road Network
target: Amalee' mahnt, dat Stratennett uptorümen

source: Amalea reminds Lutius of the scrambled road network…
target: Amalee' mahnt Lutjus an dat bregenklöterge Stratennett …

source: Expanding would also provide more space for farming. We could use some extra barley to recruit more reindeer, as our roads are quite busy.
target: Uns' Gewest to vergrotern gifft uns ok mehr Rüümte för Ackerland. Wi könen een bietje Garste bovendeem bruken, um mehr Sneeihirsken antohüren; uns' Straten sünd hennig besig.

source: When soldiers train to use new weapons, their old equipment is discarded. Take into account that the useless scraps will clutter up your roads until they are stored in a warehouse somewhere.
target: Wenn Soldaten bi’m Öven neje Wapen kriegen, word de olle Utrüstung wegsmeten. Vergeet nich, dat de unnützen Överblievsels diene Straten verstoppen, bit se in een of anner Kraamhuus unnerbrocht sünd.

source: Do we have a reindeer farm already? If not, we should build one now. We need more reindeer for the crowded roads, and we could already start sewing fur garments to equip new soldiers. Who knows whether we will have to fight eventually?
target: Hebben wi al eene Sneeihirsktüchteree? Wenn nich, sallen wi nun eene bauen. Wi bruken mehr Sneeihirsken för de övervullen Straten, un wi könen ok anfangen, Fellkluften för neje Soldaten to naihen. Well weet, of wi nich eenmaal kämpen mutten?

source: That won’t do yet. I still need to connect the lumberjack’s hut to the rest of my road network. After ordering the construction site, I was automatically put into road building mode, so all I have to do is click on the blue flag in front of my headquarters.
target: Dat langt noch nich. Ick mutt dat Boomhauer-Huus eerst mit de Stratennett verbinnen. Nadeem ick de Baustee anörnt hebb, bün ick automatisk klaar tum Stratenbau. Ick mutt also blot de blaue Fahn vör mienem Raadhuus anklicken.

source: The shorter your road segments are, the faster your wares will be transported. You should therefore make sure that your roads have as many flags as possible.
target: So körter diene Straten-Delen sünd, so fixer worden diene Waren transporteert. Daarum sallst du so völe Fahnen as mögelk up diene Straten stellen.

source: The minimap shows the complete map in miniature. You can directly jump to any field by left-clicking on it. You can also toggle buildings, roads, flags and player indicators on and off inside the minimap.
target: De Lütte Kaart wiest de kumplete Kaart in Lütt. Du kannst stracks to eenem Feld springen, indeem du mit de linke Muustaste daarup klickst. Du kannst ok Wieser för Husen, Straten, Fahnen un Spelers in de Lütt Kaart an- un utknipsen.

source: the road building symbol.
target: dat Stratenbau-Teken utköörst.

source: Excellent! To enter road building mode for any flag, left-click on a flag and select
target: Hunnert! Du kannst mit de Straten-Bauen vun elkeen Fahn anfangen, indeem du eene Fahn mit de linken Muustaste anklickst un

source: Keep the slopes in mind while placing roads and use them to your advantage. Also, try to keep roads as short as possible and always remember to place as many flags as you can on road segments to share the load better.
target: Denk an de Schüünten wenn du Straten baust un bruuk se tu dienem Vördeel. Maak de Straten immer so kört un stell so völe Fahnen up as mögelk, daarmit de Last good verdeelt word.

source: Build a second quarry near the rocks and connect it to your road network.
target: Bau noch een Flintslagerhuus dicht bi de Stenen un verbinn 't mit dienen Straten.

source: The shipyard is a medium building. Although it can be built everywhere on the map, the shipwright only works when he is close to the water and there are no trees or roads at the shoreline.
target: De Warft is een middelmatigs Huus. Se kann up de ganze Kaart baut worden, aver de Schippebauer warkt blot dann, wenn Water in de Naberskupp is un de Küst nich vun Bomen oder Straten verdeckt word.

source: The stock menu window has four tabs. The first (and currently selected) one shows you all your current wares, including those on roads, at flags and inside buildings waiting for processing.
target: Dat Bestand-Fenster hett veer Listenwesslers. De eerste (de jüüst utköört is) wiest all Waren de du hest, ok de, de up Straten un Fahnen sünd oder in Husen wachten, bit se bruukt worden.

source: The second tab shows you all your workers, again those on roads and in buildings summed up.
target: De twede Listenwessler wiest all de Arbeiders, weer all up Straten un in Husen tosammen.

source: Split your roads into shorter sections by planting some flags. This will speed up transportation of your wares.
target: Deel diene Straten in körte Delen up, indeem du Fahnen baust. Dann worden diene Waren gauer transporteert.

source: An economy consists of all buildings and flags connected by roads. The supplies and demands of buildings are handled in its economy.
target: Eene Wirtschaft umfaat all Husen un Fahnen, de mit Straten verbunnen sünd. De Versörgung vun elkeen Huus word vun siener Wirtschaft regelt.

source: Some buildings, such as the farm, have a very small work area. If the building is surrounded with trees or roads, production will stop.
target: Eenige Husen, to 'n Bispööl de Buurderee, hebben een bannig lüttes Arbeidsgewest. Wenn dat Huus mit Bomen oder Straten dichtmüürt is, kann 't nich mehr arbeiden.

source: When a building is destroyed, its workers will start looking for a nearby flag from which they can move by road to a connected warehouse. If there are no such flags in the vicinity, they will keep wandering around and eventually die.
target: Wenn een Huus ofrieten word, söken de Arbeiders na eener Fahn, vun waar se över Straten to een Kraamhuus komen könen. Wenn keene sülke Fahn in de Naberskupp is, wannern se sünner Stüür rum bit se starven.

source: Horses help to carry items along busy roads. They are reared in a horse farm.
target: Peer dragen Waren över besige Straten. Se worden in de Peertüchteree tücht.

source: Oxen help to carry items along busy roads. They are reared in a cattle farm.
target: Ossen dragen Waren över besige Straten. Se worden in de Ossentüchteree tücht.

source: Donkeys help to carry items along busy roads. They are reared in a donkey farm.
target: Langohren dragen Waren över besige Straten. Se worden in de Langohrtüchteree tücht.

source: Reindeer help to carry items along busy roads. They are reared in a reindeer farm.
target: Sneeihirsken dragen Waren över besige Straten. Se worden in de Sneeihirsktüchteree tücht.

source: First, you will have to open the statistics menu (you can find the corresponding button at the bottom). We will need this menu several times.
target: Toeerst muttst du dat Tahlen-Menü opmaken (de Knoop daarför is am unnern Rand). Wi bruken deeses Menü mennig Tied.

source: Open it. You can access it from the statistics menu.
target: Maak 't up. Dat kannst du vum Tahlen-Menü doon.

source: The statistics menu is accessed via the second button at the bottom. It provides several windows that give you information about the game.
target: Dat Tahlen-Menü kannst du mit de tweden Knoop am unnern Rand opmaken. 't hett eenige Knopen, de di Informationen över dat Speel geven.

source: The double-edged sword is the weapon used by level 3 soldiers. Level 6 soldiers are equipped with two of these ferocious swords.
target: Dat Tweesneidige Sweert is de Wapen, de Soldaten vum Stand 3 bruken. Soldaten vum Stand 6 hebben twee vun deesen grieselken Sweerten.

source: But a war is expensive, and not always the path leading to the goal. When setting up a new game, you can also choose peaceful win conditions. You should definitely try them out, they’re worth it.
target: Aver Kriege sünd düür, un Slachten sünd nich immer de Weg tum Enn. Wenn du een nejes Speel begünnst, kannst du ok friedelke Upgaven tum Winnen utkören. Du sallst se absolut versöken, se sünd beter as Oorlog.

source: Unable to determine valid win conditions because the map '%s' could not be loaded.
target: Kunn de Kaart »%s« nich laden un daarum mögelk Upgaven tum WInnen nich utfinnen.

source: We do not train soldiers to evade attacks; a true warrior can block his opponent’s blows with a skillful twist of the sword instead of jumping away like a coward.
target: Wi lehren uns' Soldaten nich, Angriffen uttowieken; een echter Soldat kann de Slagen vun sienem Tegenpart mit sienem Sweert mooi upfangen, in Stee, dat he as een Bangbüx herumhüppkt.

source: Excellent. Do you remember how to close windows? You simply have to right-click on them. This will work with all windows except for story message windows like this one. Go ahead and try it.
target: Hunnert. Weetst du noch, wo dat Sluten vun Fensters gaht? Du mutt se blot mit de rechte Muustast anklicken. Dat gaht för all Fensters buten Vertellsel-Fensters as deeses hier. Versöök 't.

source: Like all other tribes, the Atlanteans are also able to train soldiers: the dungeon trains attack – the major attribute of the Atlanteans – and the labyrinth trains evasion, health and defense. The items produced by the industry are used to train better soldiers in the two training sites.
target: As all Völker könen de Atlantinger hör Soldaten utbilden: Gefahrelke Gangen lehren Angriff – daar sünd se baldadig in – un Dwaalwegen lehren Utwieken, Gesundheid un Verteidigung. De twee Övens-Boen bruken tum Lehren vun Soldaten de Waren, de vun de Metall-Wirtschaft produzeert worden.

source: Today my hunters brought men, women and little children before me who had hidden out in the forests, trying to escape the war, hate and revenge that rage among the tribes fighting each other like in olden times, when we were no more but wild beasts driven and controlled by instincts. None of my brothers will ever gain and hold control over the wooden throne, none of the tribes will be strong enough to subdue the other. There will be no end to this slaughter, unless… is this it? As father told me?
target: Vandaag hebben miene Jägers Mannen, Froen un lütte Kinners vör mi brocht, de sük in de Walden verstoken hebben, versöökt hebben, vör de Krieg to flüchten un vör de Haat un Hitz, wat tüsken de Völkers regeert, de tegen nanner kämpen as in de ollen Tieden, as wi nix as wille Deerten waren, de vun hör Dreven kuntrolleert worden. Keener vun mienen Bröörs kann jemaals de Kuntroll över de holten Throon kriegen un behollen, keens vun de Völkers kann machtig genoog wesen, um de annern unnertokriegen. 't kann keen Enn to deesen Slachten geven, wenn nich … is 't so? As Vader mi seggt hett?

source: Three weeks later, I returned to Fremil to speak with our king. He was furious at the Barbarians, yet forbade any attack on these tribes. He believed that our army was too weak to survive in a war against the Barbarians.
target: Dree Weken naher was ick torügg in Freemilt, um mit de König to spreken. He was güünsk över de Willen Lüü, versee mir aver, deese Völker antogriepen. He meende, uns' Soldateree is to swack, deese Willen Lüü im Krieg to manntjen.

source: Build a fortress on the peninsula (near where the Barbarian headquarters stood before). Finally, this will avoid new settlements of other tribes in that region.
target: Bau eene Schanz up de Uthamm (waar vördeem dat Wille Raadhuus stunn). Dann laten sük keene annern Völker in deese Gegend daal.

source: Today, as I walked down to the eastern shore, I got a shock. I caught sight of one of those hated, evil, Barbarian tribes with whom we have had so many problems before.
target: As ick vörhen to de oostelken Küst gahn bün, hebb ick mi verschrickt. Ick hebb eenes vun deesen furchtbaren, öveln, Willen Völkern sehn, waar wi al so mennig Problemen mit harren.

source: There are three different tribes in Widelands: the Barbarians, the Empire and the Atlanteans. All tribes have a different economy, strength and weaknesses, but the general gameplay is the same for all. We will play the Barbarians for now.
target: In Widelands gifft 't veer Völker: de Willen Lüü, dat Latienske Riek, de Atlantinger un de Fresen. All Völker hebben eene annere Wirtschaft un hör Starkten un Swackten, aver in ’t Geheel is dat Speel för all gliek. Nu spölen wi de Wille Lüü.

source: In Widelands, it is necessary to build many buildings, which take up a lot of space. To expand your territory, you have to build military buildings next to your border. Every tribe has several military buildings.
target: In Widelands mutt du völe Husen bauen, de mennig Rüümte bruuken. Um dien Gewest to vergrotern mutt du immer Soldateree-Boen dicht bi de Grenz bauen. All Völker hebben eenige Soldateree-Boen.

source: You should also keep in mind that each of the three tribes in Widelands has its own way of training, so the buildings and wares are different. Also, the ability levels cannot be compared: an Imperial soldier has a base attack of %1% at level 0, while a Barbarian soldier at the same level only has a base attack of %2%.
target: Vergeet nich, dat alle Völker in Widelands anners öven un annere Boen un Waren hebben. De Egenskuppen-Standen könen nich vergleken worden: Een Rieks-Soldat hett een Angriff vun %1% bei Stand 0, een Willer Soldat mit de sülvigen Stand blot %2%.

source: Great work, the citadel is finished. But what’s that? A hostile tribe has settled next to us while the citadel was under construction! Do you see how they took away a part of our land? And our lumberjack has now lost his place of work. This is what I was talking about. Let’s take our land back and defeat the enemy!
target: Hunnert, de Kasteel is beschickt. Aver wat is dat? Een Feind hett sük tegen uns daallaten as de Kasteel baut wurr! Süchst du, dat se eenen Part vun uns' Land ofgrapst hebben? Un uns' Boomhauer hett nu keen Huus mehr. Dat hebb ick meent. Laat uns uns' Land torügghalen un de Feind manntjen!

source: You are now ready to play the campaigns. They will teach you about the different economies of the tribes. You can also play the remaining tutorials, but they are not crucial for succeeding in the campaigns.
target: Nu büst du klaar um Spölen vun de Rutfödderungs-Riegen. Se föhren di in de Wirtschaften vun de verschedenen Völkern in. Du kannst ok de annern Inföhrens spölen, aver du bruukst se nich unbedingt, um de Rutfödderungen to spölen.

source: The mighty tribes of the east-lands.
target: De furchtbaaren Lüü vun de Lannen im Oosten.

source: The tribe or team that can defeat all others wins the game!
target: De Speler oder Klottje dat kriggt all annern unner siegt!

source: Six months ago, Lutius – a young general of the Empire – was sent with 150 soldiers to the frontier beyond the northern forests where Barbarian tribes were crossing onto land held by the Empire. His task was to defend the Empire’s land. At first, everything was calm. He even talked to a few Barbarian children and thought about a peaceful life – side by side with this archaic folk. He began to feel safer and his army began to drop their attention off the potential enemy. That was their undoing. One night in March his unprepared army was attacked by 100 Barbarian footmen and was completely scattered. Only with his bare life he and a handful of his soldiers survived.
target: Vör sess Maanten wurr Lutjus – een junger Offizeer vum Latiensken Riek – mit 150 Soldaten an de Grenz achtern de noordelken Walden schickt, wo de Willen Lüü ins Land vum Riek indrungen. Siene Upgaav was, dat Land vum Riek to verdedigen. Eerst was alls friedelk. He snackde mit Willen Kinners un wullt in Freden leven – Sied an Sied mit de steenolle Volk. He meende, seker to wesen, un siene Soldaten achtden nich mehr up de mögelk Feinde. Dat was een Fehler. In eener Määrtnacht wurren siene unrüsten Soldaten vun 100 Willen Stahfasten angrepen un heel un dall verjaggt. He un een paar vun sienen Suldaten överleevden mit nix as de blote Leven.

source: The mighty tribes of the east-lands.
target: De furchtbaaren Lüü vun de Lannen im Oosten.

source: Your territory can be expanded by building various military buildings – Sentry, Fortress, Blockhouse, etc.
target: Du kannst dien Gewest groter maken, indeem du Soldateree-Boen baust – to 'n Bispööl Wachters-Kamern, Schanzen oder Toorns.

source: ‘2/4’ below your sentry: For military buildings, the stationed soldiers are shown instead of a productivity. You want to have four soldiers in your sentries, but only two soldiers are stationed in this kind of building. This leaves two vacant positions – we really need more soldiers.
target: »2/4« unner diener Wachters-Kamer: För Soldateree-Boen wiest dat Fenster de Tahl vun Soldaten un nich de Wöörde. Du willt veer Soldaten in dienen Wachters-Kamerken hebben, hest aver blot twee Soldaten in deesen Husen. 't gifft also twee lege Steden – wi bruken absolut mehr Soldaten.

source: By the Gods, this is an unbelievable stroke of fortune! There are two more mountains, and it seems that one has a large quantity of coal and the other of iron ore. I advise you to immediately build iron and coal mines (or at least charcoal kilns), smelting works, toolsmithies, armor and weapon smithies.
target: Bi de Gotten, wat för een unbannigs Glück! 't gifft noch twee annere Bargen, un ick glööv, de eene hett een Bült vun Köhle un de anner vun Iesenkluut. Ick raad Jo, stracks Iesen- un Köhle-Bargwarken (oder tominnst Holtköhl-Brannereen), Smeltwarken, Warktüügsmeden, Wapensmeden un Panzersmeden to bauen.

source: I advise to build all those buildings within a short distance of each other, and to construct two warehouses nearby: One should be set to store only weapons, armor, ores, metal and coal; the other to store building materials.
target: Ick raad an, dat all deese Husen dicht binanner baut worden, un twee Kraamhusen in de Naberskupp: För eens sall fastleggt worden, dat 't nix as Wapen, Panzers, Kluten, Metallen un Köhle verwahrt; de anner sall Baumaterialien upbewahren.

source: We will need a tailor’s shop to sew more protective garments, and another sewing room to keep producing normal fur garments. Also, you should enhance the small armor smithy to produce better weapons and helmets, and build a new small one so we will still get basic weapons. We need at least one gold mine now, because the best weapons and armor use gold.
target: Wi bruken eene Sniederee, um betere Schuulkluften to naihen, un eene neje Naiheree, um noch normaale Fellkluften to kriegen. Un du sallst de Lütte Wapensmee utbauen, um betere Wapen un Helms to produzeren, un eene neje Lütte bauen, darmit wi noch eenfache Wapen kriegen. Wi bruken nu tominnst een Gold-Bargwark, wiel de besten Wapen un Panzers Gold bruken.

source: Breeds strong reindeer for adding them to the transportation system. Also keeps them for their fur, which is turned into armor and cloth.
target: Tücht stevige Sneeihirsken för dat Stratennett. Se worden ok för hör Fell tücht, wat man för Kluften un Stoff bruukt.

source: Only very important things are embellished with gold. It is used as a precious building material and to produce different axes (in the war mill) and different parts of armor (in the helm smithy).
target: Blot bannig wichtige Dingen worden mit Gold utrüst. 't is een düres Baumaterial, un 't word bruukt um (in de Oorlogs-Smee) eenige Exten un (in de Helmsmee) verschedene Helms to produzeren.

source: This is the most enhanced Barbarian armor. It is produced in the helm smithy and used in the training camp – together with food – to train soldiers from health level 2 to level 3.
target: Dat is de beste Wille Helm. 't word in de Helmsmee produzeert un im Övens-Lager – tosammen mit Spiesen – bruukt, um Soldaten vun Gesundheid-Stand 2 up Stand 3 uttobilden.

source: A warhelm is an enhanced armor for Barbarian soldiers. It is produced in a helm smithy and used in a training camp – together with food – to train soldiers from health level 1 to level 2.
target: Een Kriegshelm is een goder Schuur för Wille Soldaten. 't word in de Helmsmee produzeert un im Övens-Lager – tosammen mit Spiesen – bruukt, um Soldaten vun Gesundheid-Stand 1 up Stand 2 uttobilden.

source: Tools and weapons are made of iron. It is also used as jewellery for fur garment armor to give it a silver shine.
target: Warktüüg un Wapens worden ut Iesen maakt. 't word ok bruukt, um Fellkluften to verbetern.

source: The Atlantean fires in smelting works, armor smithies and weapon smithies are fed with coal.
target: Dat Füür in Atlantisken Smeltwark, Panzersmeden un Wapensmeden verbrannt Köhl.

source: The fires of the Empire smelting works, armor smithies and weapon smithies are usually fed with coal.
target: Dat Füür in de Rieks-Smeltwark, -Panzersmeden un -Wapensmeden verbrannt meest Köhl.

source: Gold is used by the armor smithy, the weapon smithy and the gold spinning mill.
target: Gold word in Panzersmeden, Wapensmeden un de Goldspinneree bruukt.

source: To establish a smuggling route, you need to build a warehouse on a sending/receiving spot while your team mate has to build one on the corresponding receiving/sending spot. A ware is then transported every 10 seconds.
target: Um een Smuggel-Padd intorichten, mutt du up eenem Enn vun eenem Tunnel een Kraamhuus bauen, un dien Partner an de glieke Stee in sienem Gewest ok eens bauen. Dann word all 10 Sekünnen eene Waar smuggelt.

source: For harder to defend smuggling routes, you get 2 or 3 points per ware smuggled. The first team to collect %s wins.
target: För Smuggel-Padden, de swaar to verdedigen sünd, kriggst du 2 oder 3 Punkten för elkeen smuggelt Waar. De eerste Klottje, de %s sammelt, winnt.

source: A new smuggling route from %1$s to %2$s has been established! Every ware they smuggle there is worth %3$s.
target: Een nejer Smuggel-Padd vun %1$s na %2$s is klaar! Elkeen Waar, de da smuggelt word, is %3$s weert.

source: The other two important food wares are smoked fish and smoked meat. Raw meat is delivered from a hunter. A fisher gets the fish out of the sea while a fish breeder makes sure that a school of fish does not go extinct by breeding more. Make sure that there are always fish left, otherwise the fish breeder won’t be able to breed new ones. The smoking happens in a smokery, you will need at least two of those.
target: De annern twee wichtigen Spiesen sünd Rökelfiss un Rökelfleesk. Een Jäger levert rauhes Fleesk. Een Fisker hollt Fisse ut de See un een Fisstüchter kümmert sük daarum, dat de Fisse nich all fiskt worden, indeem he welke tücht. Pass up, dat immer een paar Fisse övrig sünd, anners kann de Fisstüchter keene mehr tüchten. Fiss un Fleesk worden in eener Rökelkamer rökelt, bau daar tominnst twee vun.

source: This is only the first example of a ware which has to be refined before being used in a secondary building – others will follow.
target: Dat is blot een Bispööl för eene Waar, de eerst verarbeidt worden mutt, ehr se in eenem tweeden Huus bruukt worden kann – 't gifft mennig annere Bispölen.

source: For example, it might be a good idea to produce a reasonable amount of a ware and afterwards dismantle the building to gain space for another building.
target: To 'n Bispööl is 't villicht eene gode Idee, eenen lepen Bült vun eener Waar to produzeren un dann dat Huus platt to rieten, um Rüümte för een anners Huus to kriegen.

source: The shipwright will take the ware he needs to a free spot at the shoreline and build a ship there. When the first ship is finished, it will launch onto the sea, and the shipwright will construct another one.
target: De Schippebauer nimmt de Waar, de he jüüst bruukt, to eener frejen Stee an de Küst mit un baut daar een Schipp. Wenn dat eerste Schipp kumpleet is, seilt 't tur See, un de Schippebauer baut een nejes.

source: The first two tabs show you the production and consumption of any ware. You can toggle them by simply clicking on them.
target: De eersten twee Listenwessler wiesen, waar vööl vun elkeen Waar produzeert un verbruukt word. Du kannst se wiesen oder verbargen, indeem du se anklickst.

source: In this tab, you can see the difference between production and consumption, called ‘economy health’. You can see at one glance which one of those two is higher for the selected ware, that means whether the amount increases or decreases.
target: Deese Listenwessler wiest de Ofstand tüsken dat, wat produzeert word, un dat, wat verbruukt word. Dat heet »Wirtschafts-Utglekenheid«. Du kannst stracks sehn, welkes vun beiden för de utköörte Waar hoger is, also of de Bestand verhoogt oder minnert word.

source: The third tab shows you the economy health of the ware. When the value is positive, this means your stock is growing.
target: De darde Listenwessler wiest de Wirtschafts-Utglekenheid för elkeen Waar. Wenn de Weert groter as null is, heet dat, dat de Bestand wasst.

source: The fisher working at this aqua farm can’t find any fish ponds in his work area. Please make sure there is a working clay pit nearby and the aqua farm is supplied with all needed wares, or consider dismantling or destroying this building.
target: De Fisker dat warkt bi deese Fissbuurderee hett keene Polen mehr. Bidde pass up dat eene Lehmkuhl in de Naberskupp arbeidt un de Fissbuurderee all’s hett wat se tum Arbeiden bruukt. Oder überlegg di, of du dat Huus ofbrannen oder plattrieten willt.

source: the economy needs the ware ‘%s’
target: de Wirtschaft bruukt de Waar »%s«

source: the economy doesn’t need the ware ‘%s’
target: de Wirtschaft bruukt de Waar »%s« nich

source: The other two important food wares are smoked fish and smoked meat. Raw meat is delivered from a hunter. A fisher gets the fish out of the sea while a fish breeder makes sure that a school of fish does not go extinct by breeding more. Make sure that there are always fish left, otherwise the fish breeder won’t be able to breed new ones. The smoking happens in a smokery, you will need at least two of those.
target: De annern twee wichtigen Spiesen sünd Rökelfiss un Rökelfleesk. Een Jäger levert rauhes Fleesk. Een Fisker hollt Fisse ut de See un een Fisstüchter kümmert sük daarum, dat de Fisse nich all fiskt worden, indeem he welke tücht. Pass up, dat immer een paar Fisse övrig sünd, anners kann de Fisstüchter keene mehr tüchten. Fiss un Fleesk worden in eener Rökelkamer rökelt, bau daar tominnst twee vun.

source: The fisher working at this aqua farm can’t find any fish ponds in his work area. Please make sure there is a working clay pit nearby and the aqua farm is supplied with all needed wares, or consider dismantling or destroying this building.
target: De Fisker dat warkt bi deese Fissbuurderee hett keene Polen mehr. Bidde pass up dat eene Lehmkuhl in de Naberskupp arbeidt un de Fissbuurderee all’s hett wat se tum Arbeiden bruukt. Oder überlegg di, of du dat Huus ofbrannen oder plattrieten willt.

source: By the Gods, this is an unbelievable stroke of fortune! There are two more mountains, and it seems that one has a large quantity of coal and the other of iron ore. I advise you to immediately build iron and coal mines (or at least charcoal kilns), smelting works, toolsmithies, armor and weapon smithies.
target: Bi de Gotten, wat för een unbannigs Glück! 't gifft noch twee annere Bargen, un ick glööv, de eene hett een Bült vun Köhle un de anner vun Iesenkluut. Ick raad Jo, stracks Iesen- un Köhle-Bargwarken (oder tominnst Holtköhl-Brannereen), Smeltwarken, Warktüügsmeden, Wapensmeden un Panzersmeden to bauen.

source: An example: the default value for scythes is 1. If you build a farm, a carrier will take a scythe and become a farmer. Then there will be no scythes left, but the target quantity is 1, therefore your toolsmith will start producing another one.
target: To 'n Bispööl is de End-Tahl för Sichten 1. Wenn du eene Buurderee baust, nimmt een Lastendrager eene Sichte un word een Buur. Dann sünd keene Sichten över, aver de End-Tahl is 1, also maakt diene Warktüügsmee eene neje.

source: Our ship is badly damaged and is taking in more and more water. We can thank the Gods if we survive this black night with our lives.
target: Uns Schipp is heel un dall in de Dutt un vull mit Lecks. Wi mutten de Gotten Loff un Dank seggen, wenn wi deese swarte Nacht överleven.

source: Failed to host the server!
target: Kunn de Server nich berieten!

source: Produces beer of the lower grade. This beer is a vital component of the snacks that inns and big inns prepare for miners in deep mines.
target: Maakt jentigs Beer. Deeses Beer word för de Spiesen bruukt, de Weertskuppen un Weertshusen för Bargwarkskeerls in deepen Bargwarken torechtmaken.

source: Beer is produced in micro breweries and used in inns and big inns to produce snacks.
target: Beer word in Lütten Broereen produzeert un vun Krogen un Weertshusen bruukt, um Spiesen to produzeren.

source: Only this beer is acceptable for the soldiers in a battle arena. Some say that the whole power of the Barbarians lies in this ale. It helps to train the soldiers’ evade level from 0 to 1 to 2. Strong beer is also used in big inns to prepare meals.
target: Nix as deeses Beer is good genoog för Soldaten im Slachtenring. 't heet, all de Kracht vun de Willen Lüü kummt vun deesem Drank. 't helpt, de Utwieken-Stand vun Soldaten vun 0 över 1 na 2 to verbetern. Deftigs Beer word ok in Weertshusen bruukt, um Mahltieden torechttomaken.

source: The Barbarian bakers are best in making this flat and tasty pitta bread. It is made out of wheat and water following a secret recipe. Pitta bread is used in the taverns, inns and big inns to prepare rations, snacks and meals. It is also consumed at training sites (training camp and battle arena).
target: Nüms kann deeses platte, leckere Pitta-Brood beter maken as de Willen Backers. 't word na eenem gehemen Rezept ut Weit un Water maakt. Pitta-Brood word in Kneipen, Kröög un Weertshusen bruukt, um Happen, Spiesen un Mahltieden torecttomaken. 't word ok vun Övens-Boen (Övens-Lager un Slachtenring) verbruukt.

source: Besides pitta bread and meat, fish is also a foodstuff for the Barbarians. It is used in the taverns, inns and big inns and at the training sites (training camp and battle arena).
target: Tegen Pitta-Brood un Fleesk is ok Fiss eene Spies för de Willen Lüü. 't word in Kneipen, Kröög, Weertshusen un Övens-Boen (Övens-Lager un Slachtenring) bruukt.

source: Meat is used in the taverns, inns and big inns to prepare rations, snacks and meals for the miners. It is also consumed at the training sites (training camp and battle arena).
target: Fleesk word in Kneipen, Kröög un Weertshusen bruukt, um Happen, Spiesen un Mahltieden för de Bargwarkskeerls torechttomaken. 't word ok vun Övens-Boen (Övens-Lager un Slachtenring) bruukt.

source: Bread is made out of barley and water and is used in the taverns and drinking halls to prepare rations. It is also consumed by training soldiers.
target: Brood word ut Garste un Water maakt un in Kneipen bruukt, um Happen torechttomaken. Ok Soldaten bi'm Öven eten Brood.

source: Mead is produced by mead breweries and used in drinking halls for producing meals. Soldiers drink mead during advanced training.
target: Hönnigbeer word vun Brauhusen produzeert un vun Soldaten bi'm Öven drunken.

source: Beer is produced in micro breweries and used in inns and big inns to produce snacks.
target: Beer word in Lütten Broereen produzeert un vun Krogen un Weertshusen bruukt, um Spiesen to produzeren.

source: Bread is made out of barley and water and is used in the taverns and drinking halls to prepare rations. It is also consumed by training soldiers.
target: Brood word ut Garste un Water maakt un in Kneipen bruukt, um Happen torechttomaken. Ok Soldaten bi'm Öven eten Brood.

source: Mead is produced by mead breweries and used in drinking halls for producing meals. Soldiers drink mead during advanced training.
target: Hönnigbeer word vun Brauhusen produzeert un vun Soldaten bi'm Öven drunken.

source: He told me about the blockhouse. Well, I don’t think we need more blockhouses – instead, we might concentrate on other things now.
target: He hett mi vun de Wachters-Kamerke vertellt. Nu, ick glööv nich, dat wi noch mehr Wachters-Kamerkes bruuken – wi könen uns nu um annere Dingen kümmern.

source: Lutius, this may seem very tricky, but we can do it. First of all, we need patience as well as speed and a plan to succeed in this part of the world.
target: Lutjus, dat sücht wull slimm ut, aver wi könen dat schaffen. Toeerst bruken wi Geduld un Spood, un eenen Plaan, wo wi in deesem Deel vun de Welt Glück hebben könen.

source: I think I have heard the wind carrying some weird but well known sounds from the north. If I’m not totally wrong, I have heard some Barbarian war drums. So, we should better go and have a look at what is going on up there.
target: Ick gloov, de Noordwind hett komiske aver leep bekannte Luden herdragen. Wenn ick nich ganz un gaar falsk ligg, hebb ick de Kriegstrummels vun Willen Lüü höört. Wi sallen uns beter upmaken un nakieken, wat daar boven vör sük gaht.

source: Lutius. Well done. Well done. We have discovered all possible port locations in the complete region. Now we can strengthen our economy and we will manage to sail home soon.
target: Lutjus. Hunnert. Hunnert. Wi hebben all de Rüümte för Muden funnen, de 't hier eenerwegens gifft. Nu könen wi uns' Wirtschaft starken un bold na Huus seilen.

source: We need some cloth as well for producing armor in our armor smithy. We need it to build some of the training buildings for our soldiers. And most important and most imminent of all, we need it to send out expeditions.
target: Wi bruken ok wat Stoff, um Wapenrocken ins uns' Panzersmee to produzeren. Wi bruken 't för eenige vun de Övens-Boen för uns' Soldaten. Un dat wichtigste un drockste is, wi bruken 't, um Söken uttorüsten.

source: Unfortunately, we lost our holy shrine of Neptune in the great storm, so we can’t worship him well. I think we should search the whole region to see if we can recover all six pieces of the shrine.
target: Leider hebben wi de hilligen Neptun-Altar in de groten Störm verloren, also könen wi hüm nich good hoogachten. Ick gloov, wi sallen in de helen Kuntrei söken, um to sehn, of wi all sess Delen vun de Altar torügg kriegen könen.

source: Sire, we need to train some of our people to serve in your great army. It is important to increase the number of our soldiers as fast as we can. And we should train them well to improve their fighting abilities.
target: Mienheer, wi mutten mehr vun uns' Lüü utbilden, in diener groten Soldateree to denen. 't is wichtig, de Tahl vun uns' Soldaten so fix to verhogen as wi könen. Un wi mutten se good utbilden, um hör Vermögen im Krieg to verbetern.

source: We should start by taking care of our wood production. Trees don’t seem to grow well on this island; better build at least two houses for foresters and one for a woodcutter.
target: Wi sallen mit uns' Holt-Versörgung anfangen. Bomen wassen wull nich good up de Hallig; bau bidde tominnst twee Husen för Försters un eens för eenen Boomslager.

source: You did well. Our entire building material production is working now. Let’s wait until we have gathered some more materials. We could expand our territory some more, to see what else can be found on this island.
target: Hunnert. Wi könen nu all de nödigen Baumaterialien produzeren. Laat uns wachten, bit wi eenige Materialien sammelt hebben. Wi könen nu uns' Gewest vergrotern, um to sehn, wat 't noch up deese Hallig gifft.

source: Build an iron mine and perhaps a gold mine. As they produce only ores, we will need a furnace to smelt them. Also build a blacksmithy to ensure we won’t run out of tools – and yes, a small armor smithy as well. It produces helmets as well as swords. I hope we won’t meet enemies here, but it’s better to be prepared.
target: Bau een Iesen-Bargwark un wenn mögelk een Gold-Bargwark. Se produzeren nix as Kluten, wi bruken also eene Smelteree, um se to smelten. Bau ok eene Smede, daarmit dat Warktüüg nich knapp word – och, un ok eene Lütte Wapensmee. Se produzeert Helms un Sweerten. Ick hoop, dat wi hier keene Feinde treffen, aver 't is beter, sük klaartomaken.

source: Our mines are working well. We can now produce all the tools we need, and some weapons as well.
target: Uns' Bargwarken arbeiden good. Wi könen nu all dat Warktüüg produzeren, wat wi bruken, un ok een paar Wapen.

source: Soldiers are trained in two steps in defense and health. They get fur garments studded with iron and also gold to cushion blows; and helmets forged from iron, and gold as well, to lengthen their life in battle.
target: Soldaten lehren Verteidigung un Gesundheid in twee Stappen. Se kriegen Fellkluften mit Iesen un ok Gold as Polsters för Slagen; un Helms, de ut Iesen un ok Gold smeedt worden, um hör Leven in de Slacht langer to maken.

source: Despair not, I did espy some hope! The easternmost tip of the island, as well as the space where the fiends’ headquarters stood, seems well suited to build a port on. If we manage to construct a ship, and fill it with all we need to build a new settlement, we may be able to escape.
target: Vertwiefel nich, ick hebb wat Hoop! De Oostspitz vun de Hallig on ok de Stee, waar dat Raadhuus vun de Feinden stunn, düchten mi gadelk, eene Muu to bauen. Wenn wi 't schaffen, een Schipp to bauen, un 't mit all de Waren füllen, de wi bruken, um een nejes Dörp to gründen, könen wi villicht utrieten.

source: You are right – we should build more berry farms, collector’s houses and taverns as well as a drinking hall, and advanced bakeries and breweries.
target: Du hest recht – wi sallen mehr Buskenplantereen, Früchtenpottjereen un Kneipen bauen, un daarto eene Weertskupp un betere Backereen un Broereen.

source: You have done well, strangers! As I did tell you earlier, you will be rewarded with the friendship of the Empire!
target: Ji hebbt dat good daan, Frömde! As ick ji vörhen seggt hebb, sallt ji mit de Fründskupp vum Riek belohnt worden!

source: I wanted to teach you how to build new flags, but it seems you have already found out on your own. Well done!
target: Ick wull di lehren, wo dat Upstellen vun nejen Fahnen gaht, aver du hest dat openbaar sülvst utfunnen. Hunnert!

source: The needed wares are also delivered there. For successful training, you need pitta bread and strong beer, as well as either fish or meat.
target: De nödigen Waren worden daar ok al hen transporteert. Daarmit dat Öven klappt, bruukst du Pitta-Brood un Deftigs Beer, un of Fiss of Fleesk.

source: Here in the northern part, you only have a goldmine and a warehouse. While the miners are supplied well with food, there is no way to transport the gold ore to our smelting works in the southern part.
target: Hier im Noorden hest du nix as een Gold-Bargwark un een Kraamhuus. De Bargwarkskeerls kriggen Spiesen satt, aver wi könen de Goldkluten nich to de Smeltwarken im Süden transporteren.

source: Welcome back. In this tutorial, I’ll tell you what you can do to check how well your economy works.
target: Wilkomen torügg. In deese Inföhren vertell ick di, wat du doon kannst, um natokieken, wo good diene Wirtschaft löppt.

source: Building your economy up and making it work well and grow is the main part of Widelands. But you can’t control the workers directly – they will follow the general conditions you set.
target: Diene Wirtschaft uptobaun un daarför to sörgen, dat se good arbeidt un wasst, is dat Wichtigste, wat 't in Widelands gifft. Aver du kannst de Arbeiders nich stuuv instrueren – se hören up de Grundsatzen för de Wirtschaft, de du fastleggst.

source: You can find the full text of the license there as well as further information about its philosophy and the legal implications.
target: Da finnst du de kumpleten Text vun de Lizenz un anner Informatioonen över hör Philosophie un rechtliches Utwirken.

source: Connected to a computer player (the face in the picture as well as the mouse hover texts indicate the strength of the currently selected computer player).
target: Mit eenem künstelken Speler verbunnen (dat Gesicht in de Bill un de Text, de kummt, wenn du mit de Muus daarup wiest, geven de Starkde vun de utköört künstelken Speler an).

source: You can find general help for the editor as well as a short tutorial on our wiki at %s.
target: Du finnst allgemeene Hülp för de Bewarker un een körte Inföhren in uns' Wiki unner %s.

source: Trains soldiers in Attack up to level 3 as well as in Defense and Health to level 1. Equips the soldiers with all necessary weapons and armor parts.
target: Lehrt Soldaten Angriff tum Stand 3 un in Verteidigung un Gesundheid tum Stand 1. Rüst de Soldaten mit all nödigen Wapen un Wapenrocken ut.

source: They are used by berry and reed farmers as well as foresters. Clay diggers also need them to dig mud out of hard soil.
target: Se worden vun Buskenplanters, Reitburen un Försters bruukt. Lehmgravers bruken se ok, um Klei ut harder Eer to graven.

source: Thatch reed is a special kind of reed that is grown in a reed farm. Nothing is better suited to make roofs waterproof. It is also used to make buckets and fishing nets as well as cloth.
target: Reit word in eener Reitbuurderee anbaut. Nix is beter, um Dacken waterdicht to maken. 't word ok bruukt, um Emmers un Fiskernetten un Stoff to maken.

source: Please also include which operating system you are running Widelands on as some bugs can be platform specific.
target: Bidde segg ok, welkes Bedriev-Systeem du bruukst. Eenige Fehler passeren nämlich blot up bestimmte Systemen.

source:
--editor             Directly starts the Widelands editor.
                      You can add a =FILENAME to directly load
                      the map FILENAME in editor.
target:
--editor             Stracks de Bewarker opmaken.
                      Du kannst =DATEINAAM daarbidoon, um de
                      Kaart DATEINAAM im Bewarker opentodoon.

source: This basket is needed by the vine farmer for harvesting the grapes. It is produced by the toolsmith.
target: Deesen Körv bruukt de Wienplanter, um Druven to arnten. 't word vum Warktüügsmidd produzeert.

source: These grapes are the base for a tasty wine. They are harvested in a vineyard and processed in a winery.
target: Ut deesen Druven kann man leckeren Wien maken. Se worden in de Wienplanteree arnt un in de Wienmakeree verarbeidt.

source: By the Gods! One of our scouts has discovered a mighty castle at the center of the old plateau. The castle must be quite old and seems to have been built in a foreign style. It’s quite obvious that this is not barbarian craft.
target: Bi de Gotten! Eener vun uns' Bespejers hett een machtigs Slött in de Midde vun de Ollen Flackland funnen. Dat Slött mutt steenold wesen un is in butenlandsker Aard baut. Dat is wisse keene Wille Künst.

source: Six months ago, Lutius – a young general of the Empire – was sent with 150 soldiers to the frontier beyond the northern forests where Barbarian tribes were crossing onto land held by the Empire. His task was to defend the Empire’s land. At first, everything was calm. He even talked to a few Barbarian children and thought about a peaceful life – side by side with this archaic folk. He began to feel safer and his army began to drop their attention off the potential enemy. That was their undoing. One night in March his unprepared army was attacked by 100 Barbarian footmen and was completely scattered. Only with his bare life he and a handful of his soldiers survived.
target: Vör sess Maanten wurr Lutjus – een junger Offizeer vum Latiensken Riek – mit 150 Soldaten an de Grenz achtern de noordelken Walden schickt, wo de Willen Lüü ins Land vum Riek indrungen. Siene Upgaav was, dat Land vum Riek to verdedigen. Eerst was alls friedelk. He snackde mit Willen Kinners un wullt in Freden leven – Sied an Sied mit de steenolle Volk. He meende, seker to wesen, un siene Soldaten achtden nich mehr up de mögelk Feinde. Dat was een Fehler. In eener Määrtnacht wurren siene unrüsten Soldaten vun 100 Willen Stahfasten angrepen un heel un dall verjaggt. He un een paar vun sienen Suldaten överleevden mit nix as de blote Leven.

source: Another Barbarian – edited by king_of_nowhere
target: Another Barbarian – vun king_of_nowhere bewarkt

source: You have completed the last mission of the Barbarian tutorial campaign. You may continue playing if you wish, otherwise move on to the next campaign.
target: Du hest de leste Rutfödderung in deeser Riege ofsloten. Wenn du willt, kannst du wiederspölen, anners de token Rutfödderungs-Riege anfangen.

source: What has become of our Empire? I really ask this question – why did my king forbid me from fighting against that monstrous Barbarian tribe, who first acted as a peaceful friend and then attacked my army in the darkest night?
target: Wat is blot ut uns' Latiensken Riek worden? Dat fraag ick würrelk – waarum hett min König mi unnerseggt, mit deesem verfuterten Willen Volk to fechten, dat sük eerst as Fründ upspöölt hett, um miene Soldaten dann um Middernacht antogriepen?

source: With an army of 150 men, I was assigned to patrol on our northern frontier, which lies near the Galdin Mountains in a great, beautiful and ancient forest. Soon, we met a Barbarian tribe, which at first was friendly. A few of my men even traded with them and their children came to us, to admire our clean and tidy uniforms and weapons.
target: Mit 150 Soldaten bün ick schickt worden, de Grenz im Noorden, wat in de Naberskupp vun de Galdin-Bargen in eenem groten, mojen, steenollen Wald liggt, unner Ogen to hollen. Wi hebben bold een Willes Volk truffen, wat toeerst liesaam was. Een paar vun mienen Lüü hebben mit för sogaar hannelt; hör Kinners sünd to uns komen un hebben uns püken, akkeraten Kluften un Wapens to bewunnern.

source: Destroy the Barbarian tribe
target: Verneel dat Wille Volk

source: Destroy the Barbarian Tribe
target: Verneel dat Wille Volk

source: Attack and completely destroy the Barbarian buildings as soon as you have enough soldiers.
target: Griep de Willen Husen an un verneel se kumpleet, sobald du genoog Soldaten hest.

source: Build a fortress on the peninsula (near where the Barbarian headquarters stood before). Finally, this will avoid new settlements of other tribes in that region.
target: Bau eene Schanz up de Uthamm (waar vördeem dat Wille Raadhuus stunn). Dann laten sük keene annern Völker in deese Gegend daal.

source: Today, as I walked down to the eastern shore, I got a shock. I caught sight of one of those hated, evil, Barbarian tribes with whom we have had so many problems before.
target: As ick vörhen to de oostelken Küst gahn bün, hebb ick mi verschrickt. Ick hebb eenes vun deesen furchtbaren, öveln, Willen Völkern sehn, waar wi al so mennig Problemen mit harren.

source: There are still a few Barbarians hiding on our island, but I am sure that we will find them soon. Every Barbarian who doesn’t attack us will be put in a boat with the other peaceful ones, and sent back to their country.
target: 't gifft noch een paar Wille Lüü, de sük up uns' Insel versteken, aver wiss finnen wi se bold. All Willen, de uns nich angriepen, setten wi in een Schipp mit de annern freedsamen un schicken se in hör Land torügg.

source: I think I have heard the wind carrying some weird but well known sounds from the north. If I’m not totally wrong, I have heard some Barbarian war drums. So, we should better go and have a look at what is going on up there.
target: Ick gloov, de Noordwind hett komiske aver leep bekannte Luden herdragen. Wenn ick nich ganz un gaar falsk ligg, hebb ick de Kriegstrummels vun Willen Lüü höört. Wi sallen uns beter upmaken un nakieken, wat daar boven vör sük gaht.

source: Sire, we found the ruins of a former Barbarian fortress and village. I’m somewhat worried that we will have to fight against them before we are ready to do so.
target: Mienheer, wi hebben de Ruinen vun eener ollen Willen Schanz un Dörp funnen. Ick bün wat bang, dat wi tegen se fechten mutten ehr wi daarto paraat sünd.

source: Yes my fellow soldiers, we have done it! We have met all the challenges that were put in front of us. But my heart is still with our home. We shall set sail as soon as possible to help defend the Empire from the Barbarian tribe.
target: Jau, miene Soldaten-Fründe, wi hebben 't klaar brocht! Wi hebben all de Rutföderungen överwunnen, de vör uns laggen. Aver mien Hart is noch to Huus. Wi sallen tur See fahren, sobold wi nu könen, um dat Riek tegen dat Wille Volk mit to verteidigen.

source: End the Barbarian intrusion into your very own part of the world.
target: De Willen Lüü sall 't in deesen Deel vun de Welt, wat di un nüms anners höört, nich mehr geven. Kümmer di drum.

source: The barbarian tribe he mentioned is also a threat. I don’t want to share this land with anyone, as sharing only leads to conflicts and battles, as we saw in our old home. We must defeat the barbarians as well.
target: Dat Wille Volk, waar he vun sproken hett, is ok eene Gefahr. Ick will deeses Land mit nüms delen, wiel Delen blot to Stried un Kriegen föhrt, as wie in uns' oller Heimaad sehn hebben. Wi mutten ok de Willen Lüü manntjen.

source: New soldiers are created differently from normal workers: recruits will walk from a warehouse (or your headquarters) to the barracks where they will receive some basic training and become soldiers. Basic Barbarian soldiers do not use armor, they only need an ax.
target: Neje Soldaten worden nich as annere Arbeiders anhüürt: Lehrwichter gahn vun eenem Kraamhuus (oder dienem Raadhuus) to eener Kasern, waar se de Grundlagen büffeln un Soldaten worden. Neje Soldaten vun de Willen Lüü bruuken keenen Wapenrock, blot eene Ext.

source: If a Barbarian soldier is fully trained, he has level %1% health, level %2% attack, level %3% defense and level %4% evade. This is one fearsome warrior then! The individual abilities have the following meaning:
target: Een allerbest utbildt Willer Soldat hett Gesundheid-Stand %1%, Angriff-Stand %2%, Verteidigung-Stand %3% un Utwieken-Stand %4%. Wat för een grieselker Soldat! De Egenskuppen bedüden:

source: The total life of a soldier. A Barbarian soldier starts with %1% health, and he will gain %2% health with each health level.
target: Dat Leven vun eenem Soldat. Een Willer Soldat hett anfangs %1% Gesundheid-Punkten un kriggt mit jedem Gesundheid-Stand %2% Punkten bito.

source: The amount of damage a soldier will inflict on the enemy when an attack is successful. A Barbarian soldier with attack level 0 inflicts ~%1% points of health damage when he succeeds in hitting an enemy. For each attack level, he gains %2% damage points.
target: De Schaa, wat een Soldat de feind dood, wenn een Angriff klappt. Een Willer Soldat mit Angriff-Stand 0 besehrt de Feind um ~%1% Gesundheid-Punkten, wenn he de Feind trefft. Mit jedem Angriff-Stand kriggt he %2% Schaa-Punkten bito.

source: The defense is the percentage that is subtracted from the attack value. The Barbarians cannot train in this skill and therefore have always defense level 0, which means that the damage is always reduced by %1%%%. If an attacker with an attack value of 3500 points hits a Barbarian soldier, the Barbarian will lose 3500·%2%%% = %3% health.
target: De Verteidigung is een Prozent-Tahl, wat vun eenem Angriff oftreckt word. Wille Lüü könen deese Egenskupp nich verbetern un hebben also immer Verteidigung-Stand 0, de Schaa word also immer um %1%%% minnert. Wenn een Angrieper mit eenem Angriff-Weert vun 3500 eenen Willen Soldat trefft, verlüst de Wille 3500·%2%%% = %3% Gesundheid-Punkten.

source: Evade is the chance that the soldier is able to dodge an attack. A level 0 Barbarian has a %1%%% chance to evade an attack, and this increases in steps of %2%%% for each level.
target: Utwieken is de Kans, dat een Soldat eenem Angriff ut de Mööt gaht. Een Willer Soldat mit Stand 0 hett eene Kans vun %1%%%, eenem Angriff uttowieken, un deese Kans wörd mit jedem Utwieken-Stand um %2%%% beter.

source: There is a second training site: the training camp. It is a big building too, and to complement the battle arena, it trains attack and health (remember, the Barbarian soldiers cannot be trained in defense).
target: 't gifft noch eenen annern Övens-Boo: dat Övens-Lager. Ok dat is een grotes Huus, un 't deit tum Slachtenring bi, indeem 't Angriff un Gesundheid lehrt (vergeet nich, de Willen Soldaten könen keene Verteidigung lehren).

source: This equipment is produced in smithies out of coal, iron, and sometimes gold. You will learn more about this in the second scenario of the Barbarian campaign.
target: Deese Dingen worden in Smeden ut Köhle, Iesen un bi eenigen ok Gold smeedt. De tweede Wille-Lüü-Rutfödderung lehrt di mehr daaröver.

source: You should also keep in mind that each of the three tribes in Widelands has its own way of training, so the buildings and wares are different. Also, the ability levels cannot be compared: an Imperial soldier has a base attack of %1% at level 0, while a Barbarian soldier at the same level only has a base attack of %2%.
target: Vergeet nich, dat alle Völker in Widelands anners öven un annere Boen un Waren hebben. De Egenskuppen-Standen könen nich vergleken worden: Een Rieks-Soldat hett een Angriff vun %1% bei Stand 0, een Willer Soldat mit de sülvigen Stand blot %2%.

source:
An old Barbarian proverb
meaning that you need to take some risks sometimes.
target:
Eene olle Wille Seggwies,
wat bedüddt, dat du mennigmaal een Raakwark doon muttst.

source: The Barbarian ax workshop is the intermediate production site in a series of three buildings. It is enhanced from the metal workshop but doesn’t require additional qualification for the worker.
target: De Wille Extensmede is dat middelste Huus vun eener Riege vun dree Husen. Eene Metalldreihbank word daarto utbaut, aver de Arbeider bruukt daar keene Erfahrung för.

source: The Barbarian metal workshop is the basic production site in a series of three buildings and creates all the tools that Barbarians need. The others are for weapons.
target: De Wille Metalldreihbank is dat eerste Huus vun eener Riege vun dree Husen un produzeert all dat Warktüüg, dat de Willen Lüü bruken. De annern sünd för Wapens.

source: Cultivates reed that serves two different purposes for the Barbarian tribe.
target: Kultiveert Reit, wat de Willen Lüü för twee Dingen bruken.

source: The Barbarian war mill is their most advanced production site for weapons. As such you will need to enhance an ax workshop in order to get one.
target: De Wille Oorlogs-Smee is dat grootste Huus för Wapen. Du mutt eene Extensmede utbauen, um se to kriegen.

source: The warrior’s ax is the most dangerous of all Barbarian weapons. Only a few soldiers ever were able to handle this huge and powerful ax. It is produced in a war mill and used – together with food – in a training camp to train soldiers from attack level 4 to level 5.
target: De Ridderext is de machtigste Wapen vun allen, de de Willen Lüü hebben. Bedröövt minn Soldaten könen deese grote, baldadige Ext bruken. 't word in de Oorlogs-Smee produzeert un – tosammen mit Spiese – im Övens-Lager bruukt, um Soldaten vun Angriff-Stand 4 up Stand 5 to verbetern.

source: The Barbarian bakers are best in making this flat and tasty pitta bread. It is made out of wheat and water following a secret recipe. Pitta bread is used in the taverns, inns and big inns to prepare rations, snacks and meals. It is also consumed at training sites (training camp and battle arena).
target: Nüms kann deeses platte, leckere Pitta-Brood beter maken as de Willen Backers. 't word na eenem gehemen Rezept ut Weit un Water maakt. Pitta-Brood word in Kneipen, Kröög un Weertshusen bruukt, um Happen, Spiesen un Mahltieden torecttomaken. 't word ok vun Övens-Boen (Övens-Lager un Slachtenring) verbruukt.

source: Cloth is needed for Barbarian ships. It is produced out of thatch reed.
target: Wille Schippen bruken Stoff. 't word ut Reit produzeert.

source: This is the most enhanced Barbarian armor. It is produced in the helm smithy and used in the training camp – together with food – to train soldiers from health level 2 to level 3.
target: Dat is de beste Wille Helm. 't word in de Helmsmee produzeert un im Övens-Lager – tosammen mit Spiesen – bruukt, um Soldaten vun Gesundheid-Stand 2 up Stand 3 uttobilden.

source: A warhelm is an enhanced armor for Barbarian soldiers. It is produced in a helm smithy and used in a training camp – together with food – to train soldiers from health level 1 to level 2.
target: Een Kriegshelm is een goder Schuur för Wille Soldaten. 't word in de Helmsmee produzeert un im Övens-Lager – tosammen mit Spiesen – bruukt, um Soldaten vun Gesundheid-Stand 1 up Stand 2 uttobilden.

source: After losing an important battle against the barbarians which lead to the loss of a big part of the Empire’s territory, Lutius leaves Fremil to start a new life. But his destiny takes his ship into a heavy storm, which nearly destroys it. Only with a lot of luck he manages to beach his damaged ship on an unknown desert strand and save his people. For now.
target: Nadeem he eene wichtige Slacht tegen de Willen Lüü un eenen groten Part vun de Land vun de Latiensken Riek verloren hett, verlett Lutjus Freemilt un begünnt een nejes Leven. Aver sien Schipp word vun de Slag in eenen Kohstörm föhrt un haast verneelt. Nix as Glück vergünnt hüm, mit de ramponeerten Schipp up eenen frömden Strand uptolopen un siene Lüü to redden. Vöreerst.

source: Three weeks later, I returned to Fremil to speak with our king. He was furious at the Barbarians, yet forbade any attack on these tribes. He believed that our army was too weak to survive in a war against the Barbarians.
target: Dree Weken naher was ick torügg in Freemilt, um mit de König to spreken. He was güünsk över de Willen Lüü, versee mir aver, deese Völker antogriepen. He meende, uns' Soldateree is to swack, deese Willen Lüü im Krieg to manntjen.

source: Still, I saw no way that I could erase my shame without fighting against these Barbarians. So, I left Fremil by boat to find a new world and a new life for myself, somewhere in the south. Now I am sailing on the Gulf of Perl with my family, some of my friends and a few of my best warriors.
target: Ick wuss nich, wo ick mien Schann ohne eene Slacht tegen de Willen Lüü liekmaken kann. Also hebb ick Freemilt up eenem Schipp verlaten, um eene neje Heimaad un een nejes Leven to finnen, enerwaar im Süden. Upstünds seil ick in de Parrelsbucht mit mien Familie, eenigen Frünnen un een paar vun mienen besten Soldaten.

source: You have established a working economy, trained new soldiers and driven the Barbarians from the island.
target: Du hest eene gode Wirtschaft baut, neje Soldaten utstaffeert un de Willen Lüü vun de Insel verdreven.

source: The message was addressed to me, begging me to come back to Fremil. It says that the Empire is at war with the Barbarians. They were attacked from the north by the tribe that I was forbidden to attack. It is clear to me what I must do…
target: 't was eene Naricht för mi, de mi daarum anging, dat ick na Freemilt torügg koom. Dat Latienske Riek is im Krieg mit de Willen Lüü. Se sünd vun Noorden angrepen worden, vun de Volk, wat ick nich angriepen dürde. Ick weet, wat ick doon mutt …

source: Send a ship northwards to gather some intelligence about the Barbarians. Try to build a port on the island and found an outpost.
target: Stüür een Schipp na Noorden, um wat över de Willen Lüü ruttofinnen. Versöök, eene Muu up de Insel to bauen un eene Butenstee uptosetten.

source: Let’s finish the Barbarians off and provide a nice colony to the caesar of our empire.
target: Laat uns de Willen Lüü schieren un wi könen de Kaiser vun uns' Riek eene moje Provinz geven.

source: Sire, finally we have defeated the Barbarians in this region. And furthermore, we have built a nice colony for our empire.
target: Mienheer, wi hebben uplest de Willen Lüü in deeser Gegend manntjet. Un daarto hebben wi een mojes Dörp för uns' Riek baut.

source: Praise the gods, we have succeeded. We managed all the challenges that were imposed on us. We even expelled the Barbarians out of our country. However, our victory is only temporary, as this is still just the beginning of the war. Let’s see what the future still holds for us.
target: De Gotten wees Pries, wi hebben wunnen. Wi hebben all de Rutföderungen överwunnen, de vör uns laggen. Wi hebben sogaar de Willen Lüü ur uns' Land dreven. Aver uns' Sieg is blot för körte Tied, denn dat is eerst de Anfang vum Krieg. Laat uns wachten, wat de Tokunft för uns noch paraat hollt.

source: I am really afraid, because we are completely unprepared should the Barbarians decide to attack us.
target: Ick bün würrelk bange, wiel wi överhoopt nich vörbereidt sünd, wenn de Willen Lüü uns angriepen wullen.

source: Sire, let me start from the beginning. The king left Fremil a long time ago to fight the Barbarians. As this duty was demanding his full commitment, he delegated the authority of running the city to his former secretary and instated him as his surrogate around here.
target: Mienheer, ick will am Anfang begünnen. De König hett Freemilt vör langer Tied verlaten, um tegen de Willen Lüü to kämpen. Daar bruukde he siene hele Acht för, also hett he sienen ollen Macker mit sienen Upgaven as Börgmester betraut.

source: Decide whether you want to work with Murilius against the Barbarians. If so, fill his warehouse with these wares:
target: Entschee di, of du mit Murilius tegen de Willen Lüü tosammenarbeiden willt. Wenn ja, doo deese Waren in sien Kraamhuus:

source: Defeat the Barbarians and the Empire Colony
target: Manntje de Willen Lüü un dat Rieks-Dörp

source: The Barbarians and the Empire are too dangerous to allow them to live near us. We must defeat them both.
target: De Willen Lüü un dat Riek sünd to gefahrelk, as dat wi se in uns' Naberskupp leven laten könen. Wi mutten se beide manntjen.

source: In this case, Reebaude, I must inform you of the presence of an inhospitable, hostile tribe of barbarians in the vicinity of this very outpost of the Empire.
target: In deesem Gefall, Reebaude, mutt ick di up de Biwesenheid vun eenem unwirtelken, tegenstriedigen Volk vun Willen henwiesen, de in de Naberskupp vun jüüst deeser Butenstee vum Latiensken Riek leven.

source: The barbarian tribe he mentioned is also a threat. I don’t want to share this land with anyone, as sharing only leads to conflicts and battles, as we saw in our old home. We must defeat the barbarians as well.
target: Dat Wille Volk, waar he vun sproken hett, is ok eene Gefahr. Ick will deeses Land mit nüms delen, wiel Delen blot to Stried un Kriegen föhrt, as wie in uns' oller Heimaad sehn hebben. Wi mutten ok de Willen Lüü manntjen.

source: Now I permit you to assist us in conquering the barbarians, who live in a sheltered valley northwest to us. I charge you, expand along the northern end of the mountains enclosing this outpost; you will find the barbarians there – attack them! We will fend off attacks launched by the enemy.
target: Nu verlööv ick ji, uns to helpen, de Willen Lüü to manntjen, wat in eenem schuligen Daal noordwestelk vun uns leven. Ick kumdeer ji, vergrotert jo Gewest langs de noordelken Enn vun de Kedd vun Bargen, wat deese Butenstee insluten; daar finnt ji de Willen Lüü – griept se an! Wi verteidigen tegen all Angriffen, wat de Feind begünnt.

source: Expanding is as simple as building a military building at the edge of your territory. The Barbarians have a selection of different military buildings: sentries, barriers, towers, fortresses and citadels. The bigger the building, the more expensive it is to build, but the more land it will conquer around itself and the more soldiers can be stationed there. The buildings also vary in their vision range: buildings with a tower see farther than others.
target: Vergrotern is ganz licht: Du baust een Soldateree-Boo dicht bi de Grenz vun dien Gewest. De Willen Lüü hebben verschedene Soldateree-Boen: Wachters-Kamers, Uppassen, Toorns, Schanzen un Kastelen. So groter de Boo is, so dürer is 't, aver 't nimmt mehr Land in un kann mehr Soldaten upnehmen. De Boen hebben unglieke Utsichtswiedten: Boen mit Toorns sehn wieder as anners.

source: The Barbarians have four different military buildings you can build: the sentry (small), the barrier and the tower (both medium) and the fortress (big). Just choose the one you like most.
target: De Willen Lüü hebben veer Soldateree-Boen, wat du bauen kannst: De Wachters-Kamer (lütt), de Uppass un de Toorn (beide middelmatig) un de Schanz (grot). Köör dat ut, wat du am meesten magst.

source: The initial setting depends on the type of the building. For the Barbarians, the sentry is the only building that prefers rookies by default. You should change this setting to fit your current needs.
target: De normaale Instellung hangt vun de Huus-Aard of. De Willen Lüü hebben blot een Boo, de Wachters-Kamer, wat normaal Snöttbaarten vörtreckt. Du sallst deese Instellung ännern, as 't upstünds good is.

source: The citadel can house 12 soldiers, and it is the biggest military building the Barbarians can build. It also costs a lot of resources and takes a long time to build. It is most suited to guard strategically important points like constricted points or mountains.
target: Dat Kasteel hett Steden för 12 Soldaten un is de grootste Soldateree-Boo, wat de Willen Lüü bauen könen. 't köst mennig Materialien un dat Bauen düürt lang. 't is good gadelk, um taktisk dürable Steden as enge Passen oder Bargen to schütten.

source: Ages ago, the Barbarians learned to delve into mountainsides for that black material that feeds their furnaces.
target: In ollen Tieden hebben de Willen Lüü lehrt, in Bargen na deem swarten Mineraal to söken, wat hör Füürsteden unnerhollt.

source: The Barbarian metal workshop is the basic production site in a series of three buildings and creates all the tools that Barbarians need. The others are for weapons.
target: De Wille Metalldreihbank is dat eerste Huus vun eener Riege vun dree Husen un produzeert all dat Warktüüg, dat de Willen Lüü bruken. De annern sünd för Wapens.

source: Produces all the axes that the Barbarians use for warfare.
target: Produzeert all Exten, de de Willen Lüü för Slachten bruken.

source: The ax is the basic weapon of the Barbarians. All young soldiers are equipped with it.
target: De Ext is de eenfachste Wapen för de Willen Lüü. Alle nejen Soldaten kriegen eene.

source: This is a dangerous weapon the Barbarians are able to produce. It is produced in the war mill. Only trained soldiers are able to wield such a weapon. It is used – together with food – in the training camp to train soldiers from attack level 3 to 4.
target: Dat is eene priekelne Wapen, wat de Willen Lüü produzeren könen! 't word in de Oorlogs-Smee produzeert. Blot bannig gode Soldaten könen sülk eene Wapen bruken. 't word – tosammen mit Spiesen – im Övens-Lager bruukt, um Soldaten vun Angriff-Stand 3 up 4 to verbetern.

source: Only this beer is acceptable for the soldiers in a battle arena. Some say that the whole power of the Barbarians lies in this ale. It helps to train the soldiers’ evade level from 0 to 1 to 2. Strong beer is also used in big inns to prepare meals.
target: Nix as deeses Beer is good genoog för Soldaten im Slachtenring. 't heet, all de Kracht vun de Willen Lüü kummt vun deesem Drank. 't helpt, de Utwieken-Stand vun Soldaten vun 0 över 1 na 2 to verbetern. Deftigs Beer word ok in Weertshusen bruukt, um Mahltieden torechttomaken.

source: The fires of the Barbarians are usually fed with coal. Consumers are several buildings: lime kiln, smelting works, ax workshop, war mill, and helm smithy.
target: Dat Füür in Willen Husen brannt meest mit Köhl. To 'n Bispööl in de Kalkbranneree, Smeltwark, Extensmede, Oorlogs-Smee un Helmsmee.

source: Besides pitta bread and meat, fish is also a foodstuff for the Barbarians. It is used in the taverns, inns and big inns and at the training sites (training camp and battle arena).
target: Tegen Pitta-Brood un Fleesk is ok Fiss eene Spies för de Willen Lüü. 't word in Kneipen, Kröög, Weertshusen un Övens-Boen (Övens-Lager un Slachtenring) bruukt.

source: The Barbarians produce granite blocks in quarries and granite mines.
target: De Willen Lüü produzeren Blocken vun Flint in Flintslagerhusen un Flint-Bargwarken.

source: In the last tab, you can also see your absolute stock. It will increase when the economy health is positive, and decrease otherwise. Compare the two graphs!
target: De leste Listenwessler wiest de Bestand all tosammen. Wenn de Wirtschafts-Utglekenheit groter as null is, word he groter, anners lütter. Vergliek de beiden Berichten!

source: An example: the default value for scythes is 1. If you build a farm, a carrier will take a scythe and become a farmer. Then there will be no scythes left, but the target quantity is 1, therefore your toolsmith will start producing another one.
target: To 'n Bispööl is de End-Tahl för Sichten 1. Wenn du eene Buurderee baust, nimmt een Lastendrager eene Sichte un word een Buur. Dann sünd keene Sichten över, aver de End-Tahl is 1, also maakt diene Warktüügsmee eene neje.
