source: I noticed that the construction of the sawmill is complete, so we can begin to refine the logs that the lumberjacks are harvesting into planks.
target: De Saagmöhlen is beschickt, wi könen nu Planken ut de de Boomstammen vun de Boomhauers maken.

source: The blackroot farmer needs %1% on average to sow and harvest a bundle of blackroot.
target: De Swartwuddel-Buur bruukt dör de Bank %1% um een Bünsel Swartwuddels to saien un to arnten.

source: The farmer needs %1% on average to sow and harvest a sheaf of corn.
target: De Buur bruukt dör de Bank %1% um een Bünsel Mais to saien un to arnten.

source: The farmer needs %1% on average to sow and harvest a sheaf of wheat.
target: De Buur bruukt dör de Bank %1% um een Bünsel Weit to saien un to arnten.

source: The baker needs %1% on average to bake a loaf of bread.
target: De Backer bruukt dör de Bank %1% um een Brood to backen.

source: The brewer needs %1% on average to brew a vat of beer.
target: De Broer bruukt dör de Bank %1% um een Fatt Beer to broen.

source: The farmer needs %1% on average to sow and harvest a sheaf of wheat.
target: De Buur bruukt dör de Bank %1% um een Bünsel Weit to saien un to arnten.

source: The innkeeper needs %1% on average to prepare a ration and a meal. If the economy doesn’t need both, the innkeeper needs %2% on average to prepare one ration or one meal.
target: De Weert bruukt dör de Bank %1% um een Happ un een Mahl torechttomaken. Wenn de Wirtschaft nich beide bruukt, bruukt de Weert dör de Bank %2% um een Happ oder een Mahl torechttomaken.

source: The miller needs %1% on average to grind wheat into a sack of flour.
target: De Müller bruukt dör de Bank %1% um Weit för eenen Sack Mehl to mahlen.

source: The pig breeder needs %1% on average to raise and slaughter a pig.
target: De Swientjentüchter bruukt dör de Bank %1% um een Swientje to föden un to slachten.

source: The innkeeper needs %1% on average to prepare a ration.
target: De Weert bruukt dör de Bank %1% um een Happ torechttomaken.

source: Build at least three lumberjack’s houses and two quarries to renew your building material supply chain.
target: Bau tominnst dree Boomhauereen un twee Flintslagerhusen, um de Versörgung mit Baumaterialien weer torechttomaken.

source: Connect your quarry construction site to your headquarters with a road. You would have been put directly into road building mode after ordering a new site. But now, you aren’t.
target: Verbinn de Baustee för dat Baustee över eene Straat mit dienem Raadhuus. Nadeem du eene neue Baustee beschickt hest, büst du egentlik klaar tum Stratenbauen. Nu büst du 't aver nich.

source: Now we know what’s going on. Let’s wait for the quarries to finish.
target: Nu weten wi, wat passeert. Laat uns wachten bit beide Flintslagerhusen kumpleet sünd.

source: Well done! Let’s see how messages work in a real game, shall we? For this, I’ll take all rocks away from the poor stonemasons in the quarries. They will then send a message each that they can’t find any in their work areas the next time they try to do some work.
target: Hunnert! Laat uns nu sehn, för wat Narichten in eenem echten Speel good sünd, inverstahn? Ick graps nu all Stenen vun de bedurelk Flintslagers in de Flintslagerhusen of. Beide schicken dann eene Naricht, dat se in hör Naberskuppen keene Stenen mehr finnen könen, wenn se weer arbeiden willen.

source: You received some messages. See how the button at the bottom of the screen has changed appearance? You can destroy the quarries now as they are no longer of any use and just blocking space. To do so, there are two possibilities:
target: Du hest een paar Narichten kregen. Hest du spitzkregen, wo sük de Knoop an de unnern Rand vum Bildschirm verännert hett? Du kannst de Flintslagerhusen nu ofrieten, denn se sünd nu unnütz un Stah-in-de-Wegen. 't gifft twee Aarden, dat to doon:

source: Since our quarries are useless now, you can destroy them and reuse the space later on.
target: Uns' Flintslagerhusen sünd nu unnütz, du kannst se ofrieten un de Rüümte naher weer bruuken.

source: The Atlanteans produce granite blocks in quarries and crystal mines.
target: De Atlantinger produzeren Blocken vun Flint in Flintslagerhusen un Edelflint-Bargwarken.

source: The Barbarians produce granite blocks in quarries and granite mines.
target: De Willen Lüü produzeren Blocken vun Flint in Flintslagerhusen un Flint-Bargwarken.

source: The Frisians produce granite blocks in quarries and rock mines. They can be refined in a brick kiln.
target: De Fresen produzeren Blocken vun Flint in Flintslagerhusen un Stenen-Bargwarken. Se könen in eener Backsteenbranneree verbetert worden.

source: The Empire produces granite blocks in quarries and marble mines.
target: Dat Latienske Riek produzeert Blocken vun Flint in Flintslagerhusen un Marmel-Bargwarken.

source: To do so, place a flag up on the mountain’s flank to the east (on mountain terrain though, not mountain meadow). When you click on the new flag, you can send geologists there. Because the flag is on a mountain, the geologists will search for ores; otherwise, they would search for water. Then build a mine for both kinds of resources that they will find, choosing the appropriate mine to be built:
target: Daarto mutt du eene Fahn up de Sied vun de Barg im Oosten upstellen (up eener Barg-Landskupp, nich eener Bargmede). Wenn du de neje Fahn anklickst, kannst du daar Schattsökers henschicken. Wenn de Fahn up eenem Barg is, söcht de Schattsöker na Mineraalen, anners Water. Bau dann een Bargwark för elkeen vun de beiden Mineraale, wat se finnen. Um de rechte Aard vun Bargwark uttokören:

source: A normal mine can only dig up about one third of all the resources that lie beneath it; then it must be enhanced to a deep mine in order to keep it working properly. To enhance a building, choose it and then click the appropriate button in the appearing window.
target: Een normaales Bargwark kann blot een Dardel vun all Mineraale daarunner ofboen; dann mutt 't to eenem Deepen Bargwark utbaut worden, daarmit 't wieder arbeiden kann. Um een Huus uttobauen, klick 't an un klick dann de »Utbauen«-Knoop im Huus-Fenster an.

source: In order to call a geologist to search for water, click on a flag in the area that you want him to search and then on the button labeled ‘Send geologist to explore site’.
target: Daarmit een Schattsöker Water söcht, klick eene Fahn an, de in de Kuntrei staht, waar he söken sall, un klick dann de Knoop »Een Schattsöker sall deese Stee unnersöken« an.

source: Remember that you can access the economy settings by clicking on any flag.
target: Du kannst de Wirtschafts-Instellungen openmaken, indeem du elkeen Fahn anklickst.

source: First, I’ll left-click on the symbol where I want the lumberjack’s hut to be built. A window will appear where I can choose between buildings. Because I’ll click a yellow house symbol – which means that its field can house medium and small buildings – I am presented with all the medium buildings that I can build. The lumberjack’s hut is a small building, so I will go on to select the small buildings tab. Then I’ll choose the lumberjack’s hut.
target: Toeerst klick ick de Teken, waar dat Boomhauer-Huus entstahn sall, mit de linke Muustaste an. Een Fenster kummt vundag, waar ick tüsken mehren Husen kören kann. Ick klicke een geles Huus-Teken an – dat heet, daar kann man lütte un middelmatige Husen bauen – daarum worden all de middelmatig Husen, de ick bauen kann, wesen. Dat Boomhauer-Huus is een lüttes Huus, daarum klick ick de Listenwessler för de lütten Husen an. Dann köör ick dat Boomhauer-Huus ut.

source: Click the ‘OK’ button to watch me. I’ll go really slowly: I will click – then select the tab – and finally I’ll choose the building.
target: Klick de »Jau«-Knoop an, um mi totokieken. Ick maak 't ganz langsaam: Ick klick – dann köör ick de Listenwessler ut – ennelk köör ick dat Huus.

source: You try it this time: click on the yellow flag symbol in between the two blue flags we just placed and then click on the
target: Nu versöchst du 't: Klick dat gele Fahnen-Teken tüsken de twee blauen Fahnen, de wi even upstellt hebben, an, un klick dann dat

source: If you click on the construction site, a window will open. You can see the wares that are still missing grayed out. You can also see the progress of this construction site.
target: Wenn du de Baustee anklickst, deit sük een Fenster open. De Waren, de noch hapern, sehn grau ut. Du süchst ok, wo vööl vun de Baustee al beschickt is.

source: Very good. And now about the minimap. You can open it by clicking on the
target: Hunnert. Un nu de Lütte Kaart. Du kannst se openkriegen, indeem du de

source: Try it out. Open the minimap, click on a few buttons and try moving around. Close it when you have experimented enough.
target: Versöök 't. Maak de Lütt Kaart open, klick een paar Knopen an un versöök, de Sicht to bewegen. Maak 't to, wenn du genoog probeert hest.

source: Make sure that you are showing the building spaces, then just click on the space where you want the building to be, choose it from the window that appears, and it is placed. Maybe this is a good time to explain about all those building space symbols we activated earlier.
target: Pass up, dat de Rüümte tum Bauen to sehn sünd, dann klick de Stee an, waar de dat Huus hebben willt, köör 't ut in de Fenster, wat vundag kummt, un alls is klaar. Villicht is 't nu up rechte Tied, all deese »Rüümte tum Bauen«-Tekens, de wi vörhen sehn hebben, to verklaren.

source: Now go ahead, try it. The quarry is a small building, so if you click on a medium or big building symbol, you will have to select the small buildings tab first to find it. Go on, check it out!
target: Nu versöök 't. Dat Flintslagerhuus is een lüttes Huus; wenn du up een Teken för middelmatig oder grote Husen klickst, mutt du eerst de Listenwessler för lütte Husen utkören, um 't to finnen. Probeer 't!

source: Just click on any house symbol next to the rocks, select the small buildings tab in the window that opens up, then click on the quarry symbol.
target: Klick eenfach een of anner Huus-Teken tegen de Stenen an, köör de Listenwessler för de lütten Husen ut un klick dann de Flintslagerhuus-Teken an.

source: If you decide you do not want to build a road at this time, you can cancel road building by clicking on the starting flag of the road and selecting
target: Wenn du jüüst doch keene Straat bauen willt, kannst du dat Stratenbauen ofbreken, indeem du up de Anfangs-Fahn klickst un

source: If you decide that you do not want to build a road at this time, you can cancel road building by clicking on the starting flag of the road and selecting
target: Wenn du jüüst doch keene Straat bauen willt, kannst du dat Stratenbauen ofbreken, indeem du up de Anfangs-Fahn klickst un

source: To build a completely new road, just click on the flag in front of your construction site, click on the build road icon and then click on the flag in front of your headquarters. Wait for the completion of the quarry.
target: Um eene neje Straat to bauen, klick de Fahn vör diener Baustee an, klick dat »Straten bauen«-Teken an un klick dann de Fahn vör dienem Raadhuus an. Wacht bit dat Flintslagerhuus kumpleet is.

source: Your workers do not like to walk across country. You have to build a road from your headquarters to the construction site so that carriers can transport wares. The simplest way is to click on the construction site’s flag, choose ‘Build road’, and then click on the destination flag (the one in front of your headquarters), just like I’ve demonstrated.
target: Diene Arbeiders lopen nich geern över de Meedjes. Du mutt eene Straat vun dienem Raadhuus tur Baustee bauen, daarmit de Lastendragers Waren transporteren könen. Dat is ganz licht: Klick de Fahn vör de Baustee an, köör »Straten bauen« ut, un klick de Ennfahn (vör dienem Raadhuus) an, as ick di vörmaakt hebb.

source: You have two messages at the moment. This one, which you are currently reading, and the one that informed you that a new headquarters was added to your economy. Let’s learn how to archive messages: first, select the message that you wish to archive by clicking on it in the list. Then, click the
target: Du hest even twee Narichten. Deese hier, wat du upstünds leest, un eene, wat di över een nejes Raadhuus in diener Wirtschaft informeert. Laat mi di lehren, wo dat Wegdoon vun Narichten gaht: Toeerst köörst du de Naricht, wat du wegdoon willt, ut, indeem du se in de Liste anklickst. Dann klick de

source: To do so, open the message window by pressing ‘n’ or clicking the second button from the right at the very bottom of the screen. The newest message will be marked for you automatically. Keep clicking the ‘Archive selected message’ button until all messages have been archived and the list is empty.
target: Daarto maakst du dat Narichtenfenster up, indeem du »N« oder de tweeden Knoop vun rechts an de unnern Rand vum Bildschirm drückst. De neeiste Naricht word automatisk utköört. Klick solang de »Deese Naricht wegdoon«-Knoop an, bit alle Narichten wegdaan sünd un de Liste leeg is.

source: To leave this game and return to the main menu, click on the
target: Um dat Speel to verlaten un tum Höövdmenü torüggtogahn, klick de

source: ‘Main Menu’ button on the very left at the bottom of the screen. Then click the
target: »Höövdmenü«-Knoop ganz links an de unnern Rand vum Bildschirm an. Klick dann de

source: There is another way how you can control the strength of a military building: by the number of soldiers stationed there. Just click on the arrow buttons to decrease or increase the desired number of soldiers. Every building has a maximum capacity. In case of the barrier, it is five, for example.
target: Du kannst de Foss vun eenem Soldateree-Boo ok anners fastsetten: indeem du de Tahl vun Soldaten, de hier wohnen, ännerst. Klick de Piel-Knopen an, um de wiskt Tahl to verhogen oder minnern. Jede Boo hett eene höchste Tahl vun Steden. To 'n Bispööl hett een Uppass fiev.

source: If you wish to send a certain soldier away, you can simply click on it. It will then be replaced by another soldier.
target: Wenn du eenen wissen Soldat wegstüren willt, klick hüm an. He word dann mit eenem annern Soldat utwesselt.

source: Citadels can’t be built directly. Instead, you’ll have to construct a fortress first and then enhance it to a citadel. To do so, click on the fortress, then choose the ‘Enhance to Citadel’ button.
target: Kastelen könen nich direkt baut worden. Du mutt toeerst eene Schanz bauen, dann kannst du se to een Kasteel utbauen. Um dat to doon, klick de Schanz an un köör de »To Kasteel utbauen«-Knoop ut.

source: To attack a building, click on its doors, choose the number of soldiers that you wish to send and click on the ‘Attack’ button.
target: Um een Huus antogriepen, klick siene Döör an, köör de Tahl vun Soldaten, wat de schicken willt, ut, un klick dann de »Angriepen«-Knoop an.

source: Additionally, ports offer the possibility of transporting wares via ships. When you click on the port you already have, you will notice two additional tabs: ‘Wares waiting to be shipped’ and ‘workers waiting to embark.’ They are waiting for a ship to transport them to another port. Currently, there are none because we have not yet built a second port. So let’s change this!
target: Muden maaken 't aver ok mögelk, Waren mit Schippen to transporteren. Klick eene Muu, de du al hest, an, un du süchst twee neje Listenwesslers: »Waren de up een Schipp wachten« un »Arbeiders de up een Schipp wachten«. Se wachten up een Schipp, wat se to eener annern Muu brengen sall. Upstünds wacht nix, wiel wi blot eene Muu hebben. Laat uns noch eene bauen!

source: Ports are built like normal buildings, but are only available on blue port spaces. Just click on a field with the icon and the building menu automatically offers you to build a port.
target: Muden baust du as annere Husen, aver se sünd blot up de blauen Rüümten för Muden paraat. Klick een Feld mit de Teken an un dat Bau-Menü büddt di eene Muu an.

source: When you click on the expedition ship, a window opens where you can control your ship.
target: Wenn du dat Schipp up Söke anklickst, süchst du een Fenster mit wat du dat Schipp stüren kannst.

source: If you click on a building, you can scroll through the buildings of the selected type.
target: Klick up een Huus un du kannst tüsken all Husen vun de utköörte Aard jumpen.

source: Now have a look at these two tabs. When you click on the
target: Kiek di deese twee Listenwesslers nu an. Wenn du de

source: When you click on the red dot (low priority), the corresponding ware gets delivered less frequently. Green means that as many wares as possible should be delivered to this building, maybe because it produces something important.
target: Wenn du de roden Knoop utköörst, word de Waar seltener levert. De gröne Knoop maakt, dat so völe Waren as mögelk to deese Huus transporteert worden sallen, to 'n Bispööl wiel 't wat wichtigs produzeert.

source: I’ll continue as soon as you click on the
target: Ick maak wieder, wenn du de

source: The first two tabs show you the production and consumption of any ware. You can toggle them by simply clicking on them.
target: De eersten twee Listenwessler wiesen, waar vööl vun elkeen Waar produzeert un verbruukt word. Du kannst se wiesen oder verbargen, indeem du se anklickst.

source: The window can be accessed by clicking on any flag you own.
target: Du kannst deeses Fenster vun elkeen vun dienen Fahnen opmaken.

source: To do so, click on any flag and choose ‘Configure economy’. In this menu window, you can decide how many wares of each type you wish to have in stock.
target: Daarto klickst du elkeen Fahn an un bruukst de Knoop »Wirtschafts-Instellungen«. In deesem Fenster kannst du fastleggen, wo völe Waren vun elkeen Aard du in Kraamhusen hebben willt.

source: You can select multiple animal types if you hold down Ctrl during selection. If you then click on the map, an instance of one of the selected animal types will be placed.
target: Du kannst mehr Aarden vun Deerten utkören, indeem du bi’m Utkören Strg drückst. Wenn du dann de Kaart anklickst, word eens vun de utköörten Deerten sett.

source: Use the priority buttons in building windows to adjust delivery of a specific ware. Pressing Ctrl while clicking will adjust all wares at once.
target: Bruuk de Wichtigkeids-Knopen in eenem Huus-Fenster, um de Versörgung mit eener wissen Waar fasttoleggen. Drück daarbi de Strg-Tast, um 't för all Waren up eenmaal fasttosetten.

source: If you like to live dangerously, pressing Ctrl while clicking the enhance, dismantle or destroy building buttons will skip the confirmation.
target: 't is gefahrelk, aver wenn de Strg-Tast drückt hollen, as du de Knopen för 't Utbauen, Plattrieten oder Ofbrannen vun eenem Huus bruukst, word de Sekerheids-Fraag weglaten.

source: Click on the map to increase, Shift + Click on the map to decrease terrain height
target: Klicke de Kaart tum Verhogen an; drücke daar de Umschalt-Tast bi tum lütter maken.

source: Ctrl + Click on the map to set terrain height
target: Klicke de Kaart an un drücke daar de Strg-Tast bi tum Fastsetten vun de Höcht.

source: Click on the map to increase, Shift + Click on the map to decrease the amount of the selected resource
target: Klicke de Kaart tum Verhogen, oder drücke daar de Umschalt-Tast bi tum lütter maken, vun de Mass vun de utköört Mineraal.

source: Ctrl + Click on the map to set the amount of the selected resource. This will replace already set resources.
target: Klicke de Kaart tum an un drücke daar de Strg-Tast bi tum Fastsetten vun de Mass vun de utköört Mineraal. Daar wesen Mineraale warrn utwesselt.

source: Press any key or click to continue…
target: Drück elkeen Tast oder klick tum Wiedermaken …

source:
--ai_training        Enables AI training mode. See
                      https://wl.widelands.org/wiki/Ai%20Training/
                      for a full description of the AI training logic.
target:
--ai_training        Dateien vun künstelken Spelers schrieven. Kiek bidde
                      https://wl.widelands.org/wiki/Ai%20Training/
                      an, um to sehen, wo dat gaht, de künstelken Spelers to verbetern.

source: Show idle ships
target: Lege Schippen wiesen

source: Show idle ships
target: Lege Schippen wiesen

source: Finally! We have just taken our first step towards victory! Last night, we landed on the forbidden island and defeated the few guards that were watching the north-western part of the island. I am quite sure that none of the other warlords has detected us so far, so we should keep quiet and build up our infrastructure. Soon we will be strong enough to raid their positions.
target: Uplest! Wi hebben jüüst de eersten Stapp tum Sieg daan! Leste Nacht sünd wi up de verbodenen Insel lannt un hebben de minnen Wachten im Noordwest vun de Insel manntjet. Ick bün mi seker, dat keen Kummandant uns al funnen hett, wi sallen nu also ruhig blieven un eene Wirtschaft upbauen. Bold sünd wi stark genoog, hör Stellungen intonehmen.

source: Wonderful! Our troops have finally defeated Lanissa and her soldiers. The ancient castle is ours!
target: Hunnert! Uns' Soldateree hett Laniss' un hör Soldaten ennelk manntjet. Dat steenolle Slött hört to uns!

source: Finally, we were set towards Fremil again. I couldn’t await the chance to clear my records of this big defeat by the Barbarians.
target: Ennelk fuhren wi weer na Freemilt. Ick kunn nich ofwachten, dat Rorüggdenken an miene grote Nederlaag tegen de Willen Lüü to dilgen.

source: Sire, finally we have defeated the Barbarians in this region. And furthermore, we have built a nice colony for our empire.
target: Mienheer, wi hebben uplest de Willen Lüü in deeser Gegend manntjet. Un daarto hebben wi een mojes Dörp för uns' Riek baut.

source: We have defeated all our enemies! Now no other tribe will ever dare settle here again. We are safe, and we can finally live our lives in peace.
target: Wi hebben all uns' Feinde manntjet! Nu kann keen anneres Volk 't jemaals wagen, sük hier daaltolaten. Wi sünd seker un könen uplest uns' Levens in Ruh un Free leven.

source: The enemy defeated your soldiers at the castle.
target: De Feinde hebben diene Soldaten in eenem Slött manntjet.

source: Your soldiers defeated the enemy at the castle.
target: Diene Soldaten hebben de Feinde in eenem Slött manntjet.

source: The enemy defeated your soldiers at the guardhall.
target: De Feinde hebben diene Soldaten in eenem Wahrders-Saal manntjet.

source: Your soldiers defeated the enemy at the guardhall.
target: Diene Soldaten hebben de Feinde in eenem Wahrders-Saal manntjet.

source: The enemy defeated your soldiers at the guardhouse.
target: De Feinde hebben diene Soldaten in een Wahrders-Stuuv manntjet.

source: Your soldiers defeated the enemy at the guardhouse.
target: Diene Soldaten hebben de Feinde in een Wahrders-Stuuv manntjet.

source: The enemy defeated your soldiers at the tower.
target: De Feinde hebben diene Soldaten in eenem Toorn manntjet.

source: Your soldiers defeated the enemy at the tower.
target: Diene Soldaten hebben de Feinde in eenem Toorn manntjet.

source: The enemy defeated your soldiers at the high tower.
target: De Feinde hebben diene Soldaten in eenem Groten Toorn manntjet.

source: Your soldiers defeated the enemy at the high tower.
target: Diene Soldaten hebben de Feinde in eenem Groten Toorn manntjet.

source: The enemy defeated your soldiers at the small tower.
target: De Feinde hebben diene Soldaten in een Toorntje manntjet.

source: Your soldiers defeated the enemy at the small tower.
target: Diene Soldaten hebben de Feinde in een Toorntje manntjet.

source: The enemy defeated your soldiers at the barrier.
target: De Feinde hebben diene Soldaten in een Uppass manntjet.

source: Your soldiers defeated the enemy at the barrier.
target: Diene Soldaten hebben de Feinde in een Uppass manntjet.

source: The enemy defeated your soldiers at the citadel.
target: De Feinde hebben diene Soldaten in eenem Kasteel manntjet.

source: Your soldiers defeated the enemy at the citadel.
target: Diene Soldaten hebben de Feinde in eenem Kasteel manntjet.

source: The enemy defeated your soldiers at the fortress.
target: De Feinde hebben diene Soldaten in eene Schanz manntjet.

source: Your soldiers defeated the enemy at the fortress.
target: Diene Soldaten hebben de Feinde in eene Schanz manntjet.

source: The enemy defeated your soldiers at the sentry.
target: De Feinde hebben diene Soldaten in een Wachters-Kamer manntjet.

source: Your soldiers defeated the enemy at the sentry.
target: Diene Soldaten hebben de Feinde in een Wachters-Kamer manntjet.

source: The enemy defeated your soldiers at the blockhouse.
target: De Feinde hebben diene Soldaten in eenem Wachters-Kamerke manntjet.

source: Your soldiers defeated the enemy at the blockhouse.
target: Diene Soldaten hebben de Feinde in eenem Wachters-Kamerke manntjet.

source: The enemy defeated your soldiers at the outpost.
target: De Feinde hebben diene Soldaten in eene Butenstee manntjet.

source: Your soldiers defeated the enemy at the outpost.
target: Diene Soldaten hebben de Feinde in eene Butenstee manntjet.

source: The enemy defeated your soldiers at the sentinel.
target: De Feinde hebben diene Soldaten in eenem Wachters-Postje manntjet.

source: Your soldiers defeated the enemy at the sentinel.
target: Diene Soldaten hebben de Feinde in eenem Wachters-Postje manntjet.

source: The enemy defeated your soldiers at the wooden tower.
target: De Feinde hebben diene Soldaten in eenem Holten Toorn manntjet.

source: Your soldiers defeated the enemy at the wooden tower.
target: Diene Soldaten hebben de Feinde in eenem Holten Toorn manntjet.

source: The enemy defeated your soldiers at the high wooden tower.
target: De Feinde hebben diene Soldaten in eenem Groten Holten Toorn manntjet.

source: Your soldiers defeated the enemy at the high wooden tower.
target: Diene Soldaten hebben de Feinde in eenem Groten Holten Toorn manntjet.

source: The player ‘%s’ was defeated and became a spectator.
target: De Speler »%s« wurr overwunnen un is nu een Tokieker.

source: The tribe or team that can defeat all others wins the game!
target: De Speler oder Klottje dat kriggt all annern unner siegt!

source: You lost your last warehouse and are therefore defeated. You may continue as spectator if you want.
target: Dien leste Kraamhuus is verneelt, also hest du dat Speel verlüst. Wenn du willt, kannst du as Tokieker biblieven.

source:
--auto_speed         In multiplayer games only, this will keep
                      adjusting the game speed automatically,
                      depending on FPS. Useful in conjunction with
                      --ai_training.
target:
--auto_speed         Sett de Gauheid vum Speel in Spelen över 't
                      Internett so, dat 't good tur FPS-Tahl passt.
                      Bruuk dat blot mit --ai_training.

source: After losing an important battle against the barbarians which lead to the loss of a big part of the Empire’s territory, Lutius leaves Fremil to start a new life. But his destiny takes his ship into a heavy storm, which nearly destroys it. Only with a lot of luck he manages to beach his damaged ship on an unknown desert strand and save his people. For now.
target: Nadeem he eene wichtige Slacht tegen de Willen Lüü un eenen groten Part vun de Land vun de Latiensken Riek verloren hett, verlett Lutjus Freemilt un begünnt een nejes Leven. Aver sien Schipp word vun de Slag in eenen Kohstörm föhrt un haast verneelt. Nix as Glück vergünnt hüm, mit de ramponeerten Schipp up eenen frömden Strand uptolopen un siene Lüü to redden. Vöreerst.

source: Boldreth, my loyal companion and friend is a source of peace and comfort to me in these dark times. He keeps my spirits high and those of my warriors awake, preventing greed or despair from destroying the bonds between us as well.
target: Boldreth, mien troer Kumpel un Fründ, is mi eene Quell vun Freden un Troost in deeser düüsteren Tied. He hollt mienen Mood up un de Kriegers flügge, un he hinnert Gier un Vertwiefeln, ok de Bannen tüsken uns to kappen.

source: Attack and completely destroy the Barbarian buildings as soon as you have enough soldiers.
target: Griep de Willen Husen an un verneel se kumpleet, sobald du genoog Soldaten hest.

source: Gather Wares as a Gift or Destroy the Empire’s Warehouse
target: Sammel Waren as Gaven oder verneel dat Rieks-Kraamhuus

source: The only way to put an end to the Empire’s desire to steal our liberty is to destroy this outpost once and for all. Conquer its entire land.
target: De eenzige Aard, wo wi dat Riek hinnern könen, uns' Freeiheid to stehlen, is, deese Butenstee een för all Maal to verneelen. Nehm sien kumpleetes Gewest in.

source: Chieftain Reebaud – the demands of this arrogant Empire Proconsul are just outrageous. He treats us like we are his servants. And we certainly cannot afford to spare that many wares to aid him. I propose that we destroy that ugly warehouse and let him fight his own battles.
target: Mienheer Reebaud – wat deeser heerske Rieks-Prokonsul dwingt, is tum rasend worden. He behannelt uns as siene Slaven. Un wi könen heel nich so völe Waren verkroppen, um hüm to helpen. Ick slaa vör, deeses malle Kraamhuus oftobrannen un hüm siene egenen Slachten fechten to laten.

source: Barbarians! You have refused my offer of friendship most ungraciously by destroying the beautiful building we presented you with!
target: Wille! Ji hebbt mien Angebood vun Fründskupp leep undankbaar torüggwesen, indeem ji dat wunnermoje Huus, wat wi ji geven hebben, verneelt hebbt!

source: You Destroyed the Construction Site!
target: Du hest de Baustee verneelt!

source: It seems like you destroyed a construction site for a quarry we wanted to build. Since we need the granite, I suggest you reload the game from a previous savegame. Luckily, these are created from time to time. To do so, you have to go back to the main menu and choose ‘Single Player’ → ‘Load Game’. And please be a bit more careful next time.
target: Du hest de Baustee för dat Flintslagerhuus, dat wi bauen wullen, openbaar verneelt. Wi bruuken de Flint, also slaa ick vör, dat du dat Speel vun eenem sekerten Speel laadst. Deese worden glückelkerwies unner de Tied automatisk maakt. Gah torügg tum Höövdmenü un köör »Een Speler« → »Speel laden«. Un pass de de anner Maal bidde en bietje beter up.

source: You received some messages. See how the button at the bottom of the screen has changed appearance? You can destroy the quarries now as they are no longer of any use and just blocking space. To do so, there are two possibilities:
target: Du hest een paar Narichten kregen. Hest du spitzkregen, wo sük de Knoop an de unnern Rand vum Bildschirm verännert hett? Du kannst de Flintslagerhusen nu ofrieten, denn se sünd nu unnütz un Stah-in-de-Wegen. 't gifft twee Aarden, dat to doon:

source: Since our quarries are useless now, you can destroy them and reuse the space later on.
target: Uns' Flintslagerhusen sünd nu unnütz, du kannst se ofrieten un de Rüümte naher weer bruuken.

source: However, destroying a military building is always linked with a risk: the land is still yours, but it is no longer protected. Any enemy that builds his own military sites can take over that land without a fight, causing your buildings to burst into flames. Furthermore, some parts of the land can now be hidden under the fog of war. You should therefore only dismantle military buildings deep inside your territory where you are safe from enemies.
target: Een Soldateree-Boo oftobrannen is immer riskant: Dat Land höört di noch, is aver nich mehr schütt. Een Feind, de sülvst een Soldateree-Boo baut, kann dat Land sünner Stried innehmen. Diene Husen brannen dann of. Butendeem sünd villicht Parten vun dienem Land dann unner de Kriegsnevel verstoken. Du sallst Soldateree-Boen daarher blot dann plattrieten, wenn se deep in dien Gewest sünd, waar keene Feinde henkomen.

source: Attack and conquer all military buildings of the enemy and destroy their headquarters.
target: Griep all Soldateree-Boen vum Feind an, nehm se in un brann sien Raadhuus of.

source: When a building is destroyed, its workers will start looking for a nearby flag from which they can move by road to a connected warehouse. If there are no such flags in the vicinity, they will keep wandering around and eventually die.
target: Wenn een Huus ofrieten word, söken de Arbeiders na eener Fahn, vun waar se över Straten to een Kraamhuus komen könen. Wenn keene sülke Fahn in de Naberskupp is, wannern se sünner Stüür rum bit se starven.

source: This coal mine’s main vein is exhausted. Expect strongly diminished returns on investment. You should consider enhancing, dismantling or destroying it.
target: De Ader vun deese Köhle-Bargwark is leeg. De Mine produzeert af nu veel dürer as normaal. Überlegg di, of du de Bargwark utbauen oder plattrieten willt.

source: This gold mine’s main vein is exhausted. Expect strongly diminished returns on investment. You should consider enhancing, dismantling or destroying it.
target: De Ader vun deese Gold-Bargwark is leeg. De Mine produzeert af nu veel dürer as normaal. Überlegg di, of du de Bargwark utbauen oder plattrieten willt.

source: This iron mine’s main vein is exhausted. Expect strongly diminished returns on investment. You should consider enhancing, dismantling or destroying it.
target: De Ader vun deese Iesen-Bargwark is leeg. De Mine produzeert af nu veel dürer as normaal. Überlegg di, of du de Bargwark utbauen oder plattrieten willt.

source: This coal mine’s main vein is exhausted. Expect strongly diminished returns on investment. You should consider enhancing, dismantling or destroying it.
target: De Ader vun deese Köhle-Bargwark is leeg. De Mine produzeert af nu veel dürer as normaal. Überlegg di, of du de Bargwark utbauen oder plattrieten willt.

source: This gold mine’s main vein is exhausted. Expect strongly diminished returns on investment. You should consider enhancing, dismantling or destroying it.
target: De Ader vun deese Gold-Bargwark is leeg. De Mine produzeert af nu veel dürer as normaal. Überlegg di, of du de Bargwark utbauen oder plattrieten willt.

source: This iron mine’s main vein is exhausted. Expect strongly diminished returns on investment. You should consider enhancing, dismantling or destroying it.
target: De Ader vun deese Iesen-Bargwark is leeg. De Mine produzeert af nu veel dürer as normaal. Überlegg di, of du de Bargwark utbauen oder plattrieten willt.

source: This marble mine’s main vein is exhausted. Expect strongly diminished returns on investment. You should consider enhancing, dismantling or destroying it.
target: De Ader vun deese Marmel-Bargwark is leeg. De Mine produzeert af nu veel dürer as normaal. Überlegg di, of du de Bargwark utbauen oder plattrieten willt.

source: This coal mine’s main vein is exhausted. Expect strongly diminished returns on investment. You should consider enhancing, dismantling or destroying it.
target: De Ader vun deese Köhle-Bargwark is leeg. De Mine produzeert af nu veel dürer as normaal. Überlegg di, of du de Bargwark utbauen oder plattrieten willt.

source: This gold mine’s main vein is exhausted. Expect strongly diminished returns on investment. You should consider enhancing, dismantling or destroying it.
target: De Ader vun deese Gold-Bargwark is leeg. De Mine produzeert af nu veel dürer as normaal. Überlegg di, of du de Bargwark utbauen oder plattrieten willt.

source: This iron mine’s main vein is exhausted. Expect strongly diminished returns on investment. You should consider enhancing, dismantling or destroying it.
target: De Ader vun deese Iesen-Bargwark is leeg. De Mine produzeert af nu veel dürer as normaal. Überlegg di, of du de Bargwark utbauen oder plattrieten willt.

source: This rock mine’s main vein is exhausted. Expect strongly diminished returns on investment. You should consider enhancing, dismantling or destroying it.
target: De Ader vun deese Stenen-Bargwark is leeg. De Mine produzeert af nu veel dürer as normaal. Überlegg di, of du de Bargwark utbauen oder plattrieten willt.

source: No frost, no heat; no rain, no draught; no rats, no locusts; naught can destroy my harvest.
target: Keen Fröst, keene Hitt; keen Regen, keene Dröögd; keene Rötten, keene Heemkes; nix kann miene Arnt vernelen.

source: Well done so far. We have produced enough wheat. Now dismantle the farm and build the next building in the production chain.
target: Hunnert bit hier. Wi hebben genoog Weit. Nu riet de Buurderee platt in bau dat anner Huus in de Produzeren-Kedde.

source: For example, it might be a good idea to produce a reasonable amount of a ware and afterwards dismantle the building to gain space for another building.
target: To 'n Bispööl is 't villicht eene gode Idee, eenen lepen Bült vun eener Waar to produzeren un dann dat Huus platt to rieten, um Rüümte för een anners Huus to kriegen.

source: A building is being dismantled at this dismantle site, returning some of the resources that were used during this building’s construction to your tribe’s stores.
target: Hier word een Huus plattreten, um eenige Waren torüggtokriegen, de tum Bauen verwendt wurren.

source: Iron ore, gold ore and coal are mined in the respective mines. The crystal mine will dig for quartz and diamonds – all of them are precious materials and very rarely found. It will produce a lot of granite while searching for them.
target: Iesenkluut, Goldkluut un Köhle worden in de daarna benöögten Bargwarken ofboot. Dat Edelflint-Bargwark söcht na Blinkerflint un Edelstenen – dat sünd dürable Baumaterialien, de leep selten funnen worden. 't produzeert een Bült Flint, as 't daarna söcht.

source: Like all other tribes, the Atlanteans are also able to train soldiers: the dungeon trains attack – the major attribute of the Atlanteans – and the labyrinth trains evasion, health and defense. The items produced by the industry are used to train better soldiers in the two training sites.
target: As all Völker könen de Atlantinger hör Soldaten utbilden: Gefahrelke Gangen lehren Angriff – daar sünd se baldadig in – un Dwaalwegen lehren Utwieken, Gesundheid un Verteidigung. De twee Övens-Boen bruken tum Lehren vun Soldaten de Waren, de vun de Metall-Wirtschaft produzeert worden.

source: Better buildings may also require other improved materials besides blackwood. One of these is grout, which is produced out of granite, water and coal by a lime-burner.
target: Grotere Husen bruuken noch annere gode Materialien as Haartholt. Eens daarvun is Mörtel, wat vun eenem Kalkbranner ut Flint, Water un Köhle produzeert word.

source: It’s up to you what you want to build. But remember – coal and iron mines need beer, marble and gold mines need wine and all mines need at least rations, which are produced out of bread OR meat OR fish.
target: Du entscheddst, wat du baust. Vergeet nich – Köhle- un Iesen-Bargwarken bruuken Beer, Marmel- un Gold-Bargwarken bruuken Wien. Alle Bargwarken bruuken tominnsten Happen, de ut Brood ODER Fleesk ODER Fiss produzeert worden.

source: Find and catch some fish. Afterwards, produce rations for your miners.
target: Finn un fang Fisse. Produzeer dann Happen för de Bargwarkskeerls.

source: Start producing bricks
target: Produzeer Backstenen

source: This equipment is produced in smithies out of coal, iron, and sometimes gold. You will learn more about this in the second scenario of the Barbarian campaign.
target: Deese Dingen worden in Smeden ut Köhle, Iesen un bi eenigen ok Gold smeedt. De tweede Wille-Lüü-Rutfödderung lehrt di mehr daaröver.

source: Ships are produced in a shipyard.
target: Schippen worden in eener Warft baut.

source: You need to stop your shipyard when you have enough ships. Otherwise, your shipwright will consume all your logs and spidercloth, producing dozens of ships.
target: Du mutt diene Warft anhollen, wenn du genoog Schippen hest. Anners verklüngelt de Schippebauer all diene Boomstammen un Spinnenstoff, um hunnert Schippen to bauen.

source: OK. In the list, you’ve seen that you have no more taverns or inns. That means that you’re not producing any rations. But let’s see what we still have in stock.
target: Hunnert. Du hest in de List sehn dat du keene Kneipen oder Weertskuppen mehr hest. Dat heet, dat du keene Happen produzeerst. Laat uns nakieken, wat du noch im Bestand hest.

source: When you click on the red dot (low priority), the corresponding ware gets delivered less frequently. Green means that as many wares as possible should be delivered to this building, maybe because it produces something important.
target: Wenn du de roden Knoop utköörst, word de Waar seltener levert. De gröne Knoop maakt, dat so völe Waren as mögelk to deese Huus transporteert worden sallen, to 'n Bispööl wiel 't wat wichtigs produzeert.

source: An example: the default value for scythes is 1. If you build a farm, a carrier will take a scythe and become a farmer. Then there will be no scythes left, but the target quantity is 1, therefore your toolsmith will start producing another one.
target: To 'n Bispööl is de End-Tahl för Sichten 1. Wenn du eene Buurderee baust, nimmt een Lastendrager eene Sichte un word een Buur. Dann sünd keene Sichten över, aver de End-Tahl is 1, also maakt diene Warktüügsmee eene neje.

source: Set the target quantity for marble columns to 20 and wait for your stonemason to produce them.
target: Sett de End-Tahl för Marmelpielers to 20 un wacht, bit dien Flintslager se produzeert hett.

source: Sometimes, you will need many wares at the same time quickly – faster than they can be produced. In this case, it is good to have enough on reserve.
target: Mennigmaal bruukst du mennig Waren fix tur glieken Tied – fixer as se produzeert worden könen. Dann is 't good, welke övertohebben.

source: To be prepared for additional fortifications, you should produce 20 marble columns.
target: Rüst di vör neje Befestigungen, indeem du 20 Marmelpieler produzeerst.

source: Your stonemason will not produce marble columns when they are not needed. You have to increase the target quantity.
target: Dien Flintslager produzeert keene Marmelpielers, wenn se nich bruukt worden. Du muttst de End-Tahl verhogen.

source: Normally, produced wares are brought to the closest warehouse if they are not needed elsewhere. In this case, this means our headquarters. But we would like to have them in the warehouse near our fortresses.
target: Produzeerte Waren worden egentlik tum token Kraamhuus brocht, wenn se nich enerwegens bruukt worden. Dat is hier uns' Raadhuus. Aver wi willen se lever in de Kraamhuus tegen de Schanzen hebben.

source: To achieve this, you will have to do two things. First, set a preference for marble columns in the desired warehouse. All marble columns produced in the future will be brought there if possible.
target: Daartu muttst du twee Dingen doon. Eerst muttst du in de Kraamhuus, waar se hen sallen, eenen Vörrang för Marmelpielers fastsetten. Vun nu of an worden all Marmelpielers, de produzeert worden, daarhen brocht, wenn dat gaht.

source: Saws logs to produce planks.
target: Saagt Planken ut Boomstammen.

source: If all needed wares are delivered in time, this building can produce each type of ax in about %s on average.
target: Wenn alle nödigen Waren to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Huus dör de Bank all %s elkeen Ext.

source: If all needed wares are delivered in time, this building can produce a pitta bread in %s on average.
target: Wenn alle nödigen Waren to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Huus dör de Bank all %s een Pitta-Brood.

source: If all needed wares are delivered in time, this building can produce an ox in %s on average.
target: Wenn alle nödigen Waren to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Huus dör de Bank all %s eenen Oss.

source: If the food supply is steady, this mine can produce coal in 32.5 seconds on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all 32,5 Sekünnen Köhle.

source: If the food supply is steady, this mine can produce coal in 19.5 seconds on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all 19,5 Sekünnen Köhle.

source: If the food supply is steady, this mine can produce coal in 14.4 seconds on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all 14,4 Sekünnen Köhle.

source: If the food supply is steady, this mine can produce gold ore in %s on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all %s Goldkluut.

source: If the food supply is steady, this mine can produce gold ore in 19.5 seconds on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all 19,5 Sekünnen Goldkluut.

source: If the food supply is steady, this mine can produce gold ore in 18.5 seconds on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all 18,5 Sekünnen Goldkluut.

source: If the food supply is steady, this mine can produce granite in %s on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all %s Flint.

source: If the food supply is steady, this mine can produce iron ore in %s on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all %s Iesenkluut.

source: If the food supply is steady, this mine can produce iron ore in 39.5 seconds on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all 39,5 Sekünnen Iesenkluut.

source: If the food supply is steady, this mine can produce iron ore in 17.6 seconds on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all 17,6 Sekünnen Iesenkluut.

source: If all needed wares are delivered in time, this building can produce grout in about %s on average.
target: Wenn alle nödigen Waren to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Huus dör de Bank all %s Mörtel.

source: If all needed wares are delivered in time, this building can produce each tool in about %s on average.
target: Wenn alle nödigen Waren to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Huus dör de Bank all %s elkeen Warktüüg.

source: If all needed wares are delivered in time, this building can produce beer in about %s on average.
target: Wenn alle nödigen Waren to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Huus dör de Bank all %s Beer.

source: A reed yard can produce a sheaf of thatch reed in about %s on average.
target: De Reitplanteree bruukt dör de Bank %s um een Bunsel Reit to saien un to arnten.

source: Grinds wheat to produce flour.
target: Mahlt Weit to Mehl.

source: The bakery needs %s on average to produce one loaf of bread.
target: De Backeree bruukt dör de Bank %s um een Brood to backen.

source: If the food supply is steady, the coal mine can produce two pieces of coal in %s on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all %s twee Köhlen.

source: If the food supply is steady, the deep coal mine can produce four pieces of coal in %s on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all %s veer Köhlen.

source: If the food supply is steady, the gold mine can produce one piece of gold ore in %s on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all %s Goldkluut.

source: If the food supply is steady, the deep gold mine can produce two pieces of gold ore in %s on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all %s twee Goldkluten.

source: If the food supply is steady, the iron mine can produce one piece of iron ore in %s on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert dat Iesen-Bargwark dör de Bank all %s Iesenkluut.

source: If the food supply is steady, the deep iron mine can produce two pieces of iron ore in %s on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert dat Deepe Iesen-Bargwark dör de Bank all %s twee Delen Iesenkluut.

source: Reed is the traditional material for roofing. It is also needed for producing buckets and fishing nets, and it is woven – together with reindeer fur – into the cloth used for ships’ sails.
target: All Dacken worden mit Reit beschickt. Man bruukt 't ok, um Emmers un Fiskernetten to maken, un daar weevt man – tosammen mit Sneeihirsken-Fell – de Stoff mit, de man för de Seils vun Schippen bruukt,

source: If the supply is steady, the reindeer farm produces one meat after producing three pieces of fur.
target: Wenn de Versörgung good is, produzeert de Sneeihirsktüchteree eenmaal Fleesk, nadeem se dree Stücken Fell produzeert hett,

source: If the food supply is steady, the rock mine can produce two blocks of granite in %s on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all %s twee Blocken Flint.

source: If the food supply is steady, the deep rock mine can produce three blocks of granite in %s on average.
target: Wenn de Spiesen to rechter Tied ankomen, produzeert deeses Bargwark dör de Bank all %s dree Blocken Flint.

source: The tavern can produce one ration in %s on average if the supply is steady; otherwise, it will take 50%% longer.
target: De Kneipe produzeert dör de Bank all %s een Happ wenn de Versörgung good is; anners bruukt se 50%% langer.

source: Basic armor for Empire soldiers. It is produced in the armor smithy and used in the training camp – together with food – to train soldiers from health level 1 to level 2.
target: De eenfachste Wapenrock för Rieks-Soldaten. 't word in de Panzersmee produzeert un im Övens-Lager – tosammen mit Spiesen – bruukt, um Soldaten vun Gesundheid-Stand 1 up Stand 2 uttobilden.

source: The chain armor is a medium armor for Empire soldiers. It is produced in an armor smithy and used in a training camp – together with food – to train soldiers from health level 2 to level 3.
target: De Stahl-Wapenrock is de middelste Wapenrock för Rieks-Soldaten. 't word in de Panzersmee produzeert un im Övens-Lager – tosammen mit Spiesen – bruukt, um Soldaten vun Gesundheid-Stand 2 up Stand 3 uttobilden.

source: The gilded armor is the strongest armor an Empire soldier can have. It is produced in the armor smithy and used in the training camp – together with food – to train soldiers from health level 3 to level 4.
target: De Goldene Wapenrock is de beste Wapenrock för Rieks-Soldaten. 't word in de Panzersmee produzeert un im Övens-Lager – tosammen mit Spiesen – bruukt, um Soldaten vun Gesundheid-Stand 3 up Stand 4 uttobilden.

source: The helmet is the basic defense of a warrior. It is produced in an armor smithy. In combination with a wooden spear, it is the equipment to fit out young soldiers. Helmets are also used in training camps – together with food – to train soldiers from health level 0 to level 1.
target: Een Helm is de eenfachste Verteidigung vun eenem Soldaten. 't word in de Panzersmee produzeert. Neje Soldaten worden daarmit un mit eener Holtpieke utstaffeert. Helms worden ok in Övens-Lagers – tosammen mit Spiesen – bruukt, um Soldaten vun Gesundheid-Stand 0 up Stand 1 uttobilden.

source: The broad ax is produced by the ax workshop and the war mill. It is used in the training camp – together with food – to train soldiers with a fundamental fighting knowledge from attack level 1 to attack level 2.
target: De Brede Ext word vun de Extensmede un de Oorlogs-Smee produzeert. 't word im Övens-Lager – tosammen mit Spiesen – bruukt, um Soldaten, de al een bietje wat över 't Fechten weten, vun Angriff-Stand 1 up Angriff-Stand 2 uttobilden.

source: The bronze ax is considered a weapon that is hard to handle. Only skilled soldiers can use it. It is produced at the war mill and used in the training camp – together with food – to train soldiers from attack level 2 to level 3.
target: De Koperext is eene Wapen, de nich elk un een bruken kann. Blot gode Soldaten bruken 't. 't word in de Oorlogs-Smee produzeert un im Övens-Lager – tosammen mit Spiesen – bruukt, um Soldaten vun Angriff-Stand 2 up Stand 3 to verbetern.

source: Young soldiers are proud to learn to fight with this powerful weapon. It is heavier and sharper than the ordinary ax. It is produced in ax workshops and war mills. In training camps, it is used – together with food – to train soldiers from attack level 0 to level 1.
target: Neje Soldaten sünd stolt, wenn se lehren, mit deeser machtigen Wapen to fechten. 't is swarer un scharper as de normaale Ext. 't word in de Extensmede un Oorlogs-Smee produzeert. 't word in Övens-Lagers – tosammen mit Spiesen – bruukt, um Soldaten vun Angriff-Stand 0 up Stand 1 uttobilden.

source: The warrior’s ax is the most dangerous of all Barbarian weapons. Only a few soldiers ever were able to handle this huge and powerful ax. It is produced in a war mill and used – together with food – in a training camp to train soldiers from attack level 4 to level 5.
target: De Ridderext is de machtigste Wapen vun allen, de de Willen Lüü hebben. Bedröövt minn Soldaten könen deese grote, baldadige Ext bruken. 't word in de Oorlogs-Smee produzeert un – tosammen mit Spiese – im Övens-Lager bruukt, um Soldaten vun Angriff-Stand 4 up Stand 5 to verbetern.

source: This basket is needed by the vine farmer for harvesting the grapes. It is produced by the toolsmith.
target: Deesen Körv bruukt de Wienplanter, um Druven to arnten. 't word vum Warktüügsmidd produzeert.

source: This beer is produced in a brewery out of wheat and water. It is consumed by miners in coal and iron mines.
target: Deeses Beer word in eener Broeree ut Weit un Water produzeert. 't word vun Bargwarkskeerls in Köhle- un Iesen-Bargwarken bruukt.

source: Blackroots are a special kind of root produced at blackroot farms and processed in mills. The Atlanteans like their strong taste and use their flour for making bread.
target: Swartwuddels sünd eene besünnere Aard vun Wuddels, de vun Swartwuddel-Buurdereen produzeert un in Möhlen verarbeidt worden. De Atlantinger mögen hör starken Smaak un bruken hör Mehl, um Brood to maken.

source: Blackroot Flour is produced in mills out of blackroots. It is used in bakeries to make a tasty bread.
target: Swartwuddel-Mehl word in Möhlen ut Swartwuddels maakt. 't word in Backereen bruukt, um godes Brood to backen.

source: This fire-hardened wood is as hard as iron and it is used for several buildings. It is produced out of logs in the wood hardener.
target: Deeses Holt is im Füür hardt worden. 't is so hard as Iesen un word för eenige Husen bruukt. 't word in de Holtharderee ut Boomstammen produzeert.

source: Bread paddles are produced by the toolsmith.
target: Broodschüppen worden vum Warktüügsmidd produzeert.

source: Bread paddles are produced in the metal workshop like all other tools (but cease to be produced by the building if it is enhanced to an ax workshop and war mill).
target: Broodschüppen worden as elkeen Warktüüg in de Metalldreihbank produzeert (aver nich mehr, wenn dat Huus to eener Extensmede oder Oorlogs-Smee utbaut word).

source: Bread paddles are produced by the blacksmithy.
target: Broodschüppen worden vun de Smede produzeert.

source: Bread paddles are produced by the toolsmith.
target: Broodschüppen worden vum Warktüügsmidd produzeert.

source: Big buckets for the fish breeder – produced by the toolsmith.
target: Grote Emmers för de Fisstüchter – vum Warktüügsmidd produzeert.

source: Cloth is needed for Barbarian ships. It is produced out of thatch reed.
target: Wille Schippen bruken Stoff. 't word ut Reit produzeert.

source: Cloth is needed for ships. It is produced out of reindeer fur and reed.
target: Schippen bruken Stoff. 't word ut Sneeihirsken-Fell un Reit produzeert.

source: Coal is mined in coal mines or produced out of logs by a charcoal kiln.
target: Köhle word in Köhle-Bargwarken ofboot oder in Holtköhl-Brannereen ut Boomstammen produzeert.

source: Cornmeal is produced in a mill out of corn and is one of three parts of the Atlantean bread produced in bakeries.
target: Maismehl word in Möhlen ut Mais produzeert un is eens vun de dree Dingen, de Backereen bruken, um Atlantiskes Brood to maken.

source: Felling axes are produced in the metal workshop (but cease to be produced by the building if it is enhanced to an ax workshop and war mill).
target: Boomslager-Exten worden in de Metalldreihbank produzeert (aver nich mehr, wenn dat Huus to eener Extensmede oder Oorlogs-Smee utbaut word).

source: Felling axes are produced by the blacksmithy.
target: Boomslager-Exten worden vun de Smede produzeert.

source: Felling axes are produced by the toolsmith.
target: Boomslager-Exten worden vum Warktüügsmidd produzeert.

source: They are produced by the toolsmith.
target: Se worden vum Warktüügsmidd produzeert.

source: They are produced by the blacksmithy.
target: Se worden vun de Smede produzeert.

source: Produced by the metal workshop (but they cease to be produced by the building if it is enhanced to an ax workshop and war mill).
target: In de Metalldreihbank produzeert (aver nich mehr, wenn dat Huus to eener Extensmede oder Oorlogs-Smee utbaut word).

source: They are produced by the toolsmith.
target: Se worden vum Warktüügsmidd produzeert.

source: The fishing net is used by the fisher and produced by the toolsmith.
target: De Fiskernett word vum Fisker bruukt un vum Warktüügsmidd produzeert.

source: They are one of the basic tools produced in a metal workshop (but cease to be produced by the building if it is enhanced to an ax workshop and war mill).
target: Se worden as elkeen Warktüüg in de Metalldreihbank produzeert (aver nich mehr, wenn dat Huus to eener Extensmede oder Oorlogs-Smee utbaut word).

source: They are produced by the toolsmith.
target: Se worden vum Warktüügsmidd produzeert.

source: Flour is produced by the mill out of wheat and is needed in the bakery to produce the tasty Empire bread.
target: Mehl word in Möhlen ut Weit maakt un word in Backereen bruukt, um dat gode Rieks-Brood to backen.

source: Gold ore is mined in a gold mine. Smelted in a smelting works, it turns into gold which is used as a precious building material and to produce weapons and armor.
target: Goldkluut word in Gold-Bargwarken ofboot un in Smeltwarken smelt. Dann word daarut Gold, wat een düres Baumaterial is un för Wapens un Wapenrocken bruukt word.

source: The Empire produces granite blocks in quarries and marble mines.
target: Dat Latienske Riek produzeert Blocken vun Flint in Flintslagerhusen un Marmel-Bargwarken.

source: Granite can be processed into grout which provides a solid, non burning building material. Grout is produced in a lime kiln.
target: Ut Flint kann man Mörtel maken, wat een stevigs Baumaterial is un nich brannt. Mörtel word in de Kalkbranneree produzeert.

source: Geologists, builders, weaponsmiths and armorsmiths all need a hammer. Make sure you’ve always got some in reserve! They are produced by the toolsmith.
target: Schattsökers, Baukeerls, Wapensmidds un Panzersmidds bruken all eenen Klöpper. Pass up, dat du alltied welke över hest! Se worden vum Warktüügsmidd produzeert.

source: Geologists, builders, blacksmiths and helmsmiths all need a hammer. Make sure you’ve always got some in reserve! They are one of the basic tools produced at the metal workshop (but cease to be produced by the building if it is enhanced to an ax workshop and war mill).
target: Schattsökers, Baukeerls, Wapensmidds un Panzersmidds bruken all eenen Klöpper. Pass up, dat du alltied welke över hest! Se worden as elkeen Warktüüg in de Metalldreihbank produzeert (aver nich mehr, wenn dat Huus to eener Extensmede oder Oorlogs-Smee utbaut word).

source: Geologists, builders, weaponsmiths and armorsmiths all need a hammer. Make sure you’ve always got some in reserve! They are produced by the toolsmith.
target: Schattsökers, Baukeerls, Wapensmidds un Panzersmidds bruken all eenen Klöpper. Pass up, dat du alltied welke över hest! Se worden vum Warktüügsmidd produzeert.

source: Geologists, builders and blacksmiths all need a hammer. Make sure you’ve always got some in reserve! They are produced by the blacksmithy.
target: Schattsökers, Baukeerls un Smidds bruken all eenen Klöpper. Pass up, dat du alltied welke över hest! Se worden vun de Smede produzeert.

source: A helmet is a basic tool to protect soldiers. It is produced in the helm smithy and used in the training camp – together with food – to train soldiers from health level 0 to level 1.
target: Een Helm is een eenfacher Schuur för Soldaten. 't word in de Helmsmee produzeert un im Övens-Lager – tosammen mit Spiesen – bruukt, um Soldaten vun Gesundheid-Stand 0 up Stand 1 uttobilden.

source: A helmet is a basic tool to protect soldiers. It is produced in the small armor smithy and used to train soldiers from health level 0 to level 1.
target: Een Helm is een eenfacher Schuur för Soldaten. 't word in de Lütten Wapensmee produzeert un bruukt, um Soldaten vun Gesundheid-Stand 0 up Stand 1 uttobilden.

source: A golden helmet protects soldiers. It is produced in the large armor smithy and used to train soldiers from health level 1 to level 2.
target: Een Goldener Helm schütt Soldaten. 't word in de Groten Wapensmee produzeert un bruukt, um Soldaten vun Gesundheid-Stand 1 up Stand 2 uttobilden.

source: This is the most enhanced Barbarian armor. It is produced in the helm smithy and used in the training camp – together with food – to train soldiers from health level 2 to level 3.
target: Dat is de beste Wille Helm. 't word in de Helmsmee produzeert un im Övens-Lager – tosammen mit Spiesen – bruukt, um Soldaten vun Gesundheid-Stand 2 up Stand 3 uttobilden.

source: A warhelm is an enhanced armor for Barbarian soldiers. It is produced in a helm smithy and used in a training camp – together with food – to train soldiers from health level 1 to level 2.
target: Een Kriegshelm is een goder Schuur för Wille Soldaten. 't word in de Helmsmee produzeert un im Övens-Lager – tosammen mit Spiesen – bruukt, um Soldaten vun Gesundheid-Stand 1 up Stand 2 uttobilden.

source: Honey is produced by bees belonging to a beekeeper. It is used to bake honey bread and brew mead.
target: Hönnig word vun Immen produzeert, de to eenem Imker hören. 't word bruukt, um Hönnigbrood to backen un Hönnigbeer to broen.

source: This bow is used by the Atlantean hunter. It is produced by the toolsmith.
target: De Atlantiske Jäger bruukt eenen Jaggtboog. 't word vum Warktüügsmidd produzeert.

source: Hunting spears are produced in the metal workshop (but cease to be produced by the building if it is enhanced to an ax workshop and war mill).
target: Jaggtsperen worden in de Metalldreihbank produzeert (aver nich mehr, wenn dat Huus to eener Extensmede oder Oorlogs-Smee utbaut word).

source: Hunting spears are produced by the blacksmithy
target: Jaggtsperen worden vun de Smede produzeert.

source: They are produced by the toolsmith.
target: Se worden vum Warktüügsmidd produzeert.

source: Kitchen tools are needed for preparing rations, snacks and meals. Be sure to have a metal workshop to produce this basic tool (but it ceases to be produced by the building if it is enhanced to an ax workshop and war mill).
target: Besteck is nödig, um Happen, Spiesen un Mahltieden torechttomaken. 't word in de Metalldreihbank produzeert (aver nich mehr, wenn dat Huus to eener Extensmede oder Oorlogs-Smee utbaut word).

source: Kitchen tools are needed for preparing rations and meals. They are produced in a toolsmithy and used in taverns and inns.
target: Besteck is nödig, um Happen un Mahltieden torechttomaken. 't word in de Warktüügsmee produzeert un in Kneipen un Weertskuppen bruukt.

source: Logs are an important basic building material. They are produced by felling trees.
target: Boomstammen sünd een wichtigs Baumaterial. Se worden produzeert, indeem man Bomen ofkappt.

source: Marble is the beautiful stone which is cut out of the mountains or produced in a quarry. Marble is used as a building material and gets chiseled into marble columns in the stonemason’s house.
target: Marmel is de moje Steen, wat ut Bargen sneden oder in eenem Flintslagerhuus produzeert word. Marmel is een Baumateriaal un word vum Steenbickerhuus in Marmelpielers sniddjet.

source: Marble columns represent the high culture of the Empire, so they are needed for nearly every larger building. They are produced out of marble at a stonemason’s house.
target: Marmelpielers wiesen de hoge Kultuur un Wüürd vum Latiensken Riek un worden daarum för haast elkeen grotes Huus bruukt. Se worden in eenem Steenbickerhuus ut Marmel maakt.

source: Mead is produced by mead breweries and used in drinking halls for producing meals. Soldiers drink mead during advanced training.
target: Hönnigbeer word vun Brauhusen produzeert un vun Soldaten bi'm Öven drunken.

source: Milking tongs are used by the spider breeder to milk the spiders. They are produced by the toolsmith.
target: Spinnentüchters bruken Melktangen, um de Spinnen to melken. Se worden vum Warktüügsmidd produzeert.

source: Picks are used by stonecutters and miners. They are produced by the toolsmith.
target: Flinthauers un Bargwarkskeerls bruken Pickhacken. Se worden vum Warktüügsmidd produzeert.

source: Picks are used by stonemasons and miners. They are produced in the metal workshop (but cease to be produced by the building if it is enhanced to an ax workshop and war mill).
target: Flintslagers un Bargwarkskeerls bruken Pickhacken. Se worden in de Metalldreihbank produzeert (aver nich mehr, wenn dat Huus to eener Extensmede oder Oorlogs-Smee utbaut word).

source: Picks are used by stonemasons and miners. They are produced by the toolsmith.
target: Flintslagers un Bargwarkskeerls bruken Pickhacken. Se worden vum Warktüügsmidd produzeert.

source: They are produced out of logs by the sawmill.
target: Se worden in de Saagmöhlen ut Boomstammen produzeert.

source: They are produced out of logs by the sawmill.
target: Se worden in de Saagmöhlen ut Boomstammen produzeert.

source: These transparent quartz gems are used to build some exclusive buildings. They are produced in a crystal mine.
target: Deeser schienende Blinkerflint word för eenige besünners gode Husen bruukt. 't word in eenem Edelflint-Bargwark ofboot.

source: Rations are produced in a tavern, an inn or a big inn out of fish or meat or pitta bread.
target: Happen worden in eener Kneipe, eenem Kroog oder eenem Weertshuus ut Fiss oder Fleesk oder Pitta-Brood produzeert.

source: Rations are produced in a tavern out of fish or meat or bread.
target: Happen worden in eener Kneipe ut Fiss oder Fleesk oder Brood produzeert.

source: Rations are produced in taverns and drinking halls out of something to eat: Fruit, bread or smoked meat or fish.
target: Happen worden in Kneipen un Weertskuppen ut Früchten, Brood, Rökelfleesk oder Rökelfiss produzeert.

source: The saw is needed by the sawyer, the woodcutter and the toolsmith. It is produced by the toolsmith.
target: De Saager, de Boomslager un de Warktüügsmidd bruken eene Saag. 't word vum Warktüügsmidd produzeert.

source: This saw is needed by the carpenter. It is produced by the toolsmith.
target: De Diskler bruukt deese Saag. 't word vum Warktüügsmidd produzeert.

source: Scythes are produced by the toolsmith.
target: Sichten worden vum Warktüügsmidd produzeert.

source: Scythes are produced by the blacksmithy.
target: Sichten worden vun de Smede produzeert.

source: Scythes are produced by the metal workshop (but cease to be produced by the building if it is enhanced to an ax workshop and war mill).
target: Sichten worden in de Metalldreihbank produzeert (aver nich mehr, wenn dat Huus to eener Extensmede oder Oorlogs-Smee utbaut word).

source: Scythes are produced by the toolsmith.
target: Sichten worden vum Warktüügsmidd produzeert.

source: These advanced shields are used by the best soldiers of the Atlanteans. They are produced in the armor smithy and used in the labyrinth – together with food – to train soldiers from defense level 1 to level 2.
target: De besten Atlantisken Soldaten bruken deese goden Schilden. Se worden in de Panzersmee produzeert un in Dwaalwegen – tosammen mit Spiesen – bruukt, um Soldaten vun Verteidigung-Stand 1 up Stand 2 uttobilden.

source: This steel shield is produced in the armor smithy and used in the labyrinth – together with food – to train soldiers from defense level 0 to level 1.
target: Deeser Stahlschild word in de Panzersmee produzeert un in Dwaalwegen – tosammen mit Spiesen – bruukt, um Soldaten vun Verteidigung-Stand 0 up Stand 1 uttobilden.

source: Therefore the forester and the blackroot farmer use them. They are produced by the toolsmith.
target: De Förster un de Swartwuddel-Buur bruken se also. Se worden vum Warktüügsmidd produzeert.

source: Therefore the gardener and the ranger use them. Produced at the metal workshop (but cease to be produced by the building if it is enhanced to an ax workshop and war mill).
target: De Gaardner un de Boomplanter bruken se also.  Se worden in de Metalldreihbank produzeert (aver nich mehr, wenn dat Huus to eener Extensmede oder Oorlogs-Smee utbaut word).

source: Therefore the forester and the vine farmer use them. They are produced by the toolsmith.
target: De Förster un de Wienplanter bruken se also. Se worden vum Warktüügsmidd produzeert.

source: A bigger morsel than the ration to provide miners in deep mines. It is produced in an inn or a big inn out of fish/meat, pitta bread and beer.
target: Wat beters as een Happ, um Bargwarkskeerls in Deepen Bargwarken to versörgen. 't word in eenem Kroog oder Weertshuus ut Fiss/Fleesk, Pitta-Brood un Beer produzeert.

source: This spear has an iron spike. It is produced in a weapon smithy and used in a training camp – together with food – to train soldiers from attack level 0 to attack level 1.
target: Deese Pieke hett eene Tipp vun Iesen. 't word in de Wapensmee produzeert un im Övens-Lager – tosammen mit Spiesen – bruukt, um Soldaten vun Angriff-Stand 0 up Stand 1 uttobilden.

source: This is an advanced spear with a steel tip. It is produced in a weapon smithy and used in a training camp – together with food – to train soldiers from attack level 1 to level 2.
target: Deese gode Pieke hett eene Tipp vun Stahl. 't word in de Wapensmee produzeert un im Övens-Lager – tosammen mit Spiesen – bruukt, um Soldaten vun Angriff-Stand 1 up Stand 2 uttobilden.

source: This is a strong spear with a steel-tip and a little blade. It is produced in the weapon smithy and used in the training camp – together with food – train soldiers from attack level 2 to level 3.
target: Deese starke Pieke hett eene Tipp vun Stahl un eene lütte Lemp. 't word in de Wapensmee produzeert un im Övens-Lager – tosammen mit Spiesen – bruukt, um Soldaten vun Angriff-Stand 2 up Stand 3 uttobilden.

source: This wooden spear is the basic weapon in the Empire military system. It is produced in the weapon smithy. In combination with a helmet, it is the equipment to fit out young soldiers.
target: Deese Holtpieke is de eenfachste Wapen in de Rieks-Soldateree. Se word in de Wapensmee produzeert. Tosammen mit eenem Helm is se de Utrüstung för neje Soldaten.

source: Spider silk is produced by spiders, which are bred by spider farms. It is processed into spidercloth in a weaving mill.
target: Spinnensied word vun Spinnen produzeert, de in Spinnentüchtereen tücht worden. 't word in Spinnweelmöhlen to Spinnenstoff verarbeidt.

source: This is the basic weapon of the Frisian soldiers. Together with a fur garment, it makes up the equipment of young soldiers. Short swords are produced by the small armor smithy.
target: Dat is de eenfachste Wapen för Freeske Soldaten. Tosammen mit eener Fellkluft is se de Utrüstung för neje Soldaten. Lütte Sweerten worden in de Lütte Wapensmee produzeert.

source: A tabard and a light trident are the basic equipment for young soldiers. Tabards are produced in the weaving mill.
target: Eene Kluft un een Lütter Dreespitz sünd de Utrüstung för neje Soldaten. Kluften worden in Spinnweelmöhlen produzeert.

source: Golden tabards are produced in Atlantean weaving mills out of gold thread. They are used in the labyrinth – together with food – to train soldiers from health level 0 to level 1.
target: Goldene Kluften worden in Atlantisken Spinnweelmöhlen ut Goldwulle produzeert. Se worden in Dwaalwegen – tosammen mit Spiesen – bruukt, um Soldaten vun Gesundheid-Stand 0 up Stand 1 uttobilden.

source: Thatch reed is produced in a reed yard and used to make the roofs of buildings waterproof.
target: Reit word in eener Reitplanteree produzeert un deent daarto, de Dacken vun Husen waterdicht to maken.

source: The double trident is one of the best tridents produced by the Atlantean weapon smithy. It is used in a dungeon – together with food – to train soldiers from attack level 2 to level 3.
target: De Dubbelte Dreespitz is eener vun de besten Dreespitzen, de de Atlantiske Wapensmee produzert. 't word in Gefahrelken Gangen – tosammen mit Spiesen – bruukt, um Soldaten vun Angriff-Stand 2 up Stand 3 uttobilden.

source: This is the most dangerous weapon of the Atlantean military. Only the best of the best soldiers may use it. It is produced in the weapon smithy and used in the dungeon – together with food – to train soldiers from attack level 3 to level 4.
target: Dat is de gefahrelkste Wapen, de de Atlantiske Soldateree hett. Blot de besten Soldaten bruken 't. 't word in de Wapensmee produzeert un in Gefahrelken Gangen – tosammen mit Spiesen – bruukt, um Soldaten vun Angriff-Stand 3 up Stand 4 uttobilden.

source: This is the basic weapon of the Atlantean soldiers. Together with a tabard, it makes up the equipment of young soldiers. Light tridents are produced in the weapon smithy as are all other tridents.
target: Dat is de eenfachste Wapen för Atlantiske Soldaten. Tosammen mit eener Kluft is se de Utrüstung för neje Soldaten. Lütte Dreespitzen worden as all Dreespitzen in de Wapensmee produzeert.

source: The long trident is the first trident in the training of soldiers. It is produced in the weapon smithy and used in the dungeon – together with food – to train soldiers from attack level 0 to level 1.
target: De Lange Dreespitz is de eerste Wapen, de Soldaten bi'm Öven kriegen. 't word in de Wapensmee produzeert un in Gefahrelken Gangen – tosammen mit Spiesen – bruukt, um Soldaten vun Angriff-Stand 0 up Stand 1 uttobilden.

source: This is the medium trident. It is produced in the weapon smithy and used by advanced soldiers in the dungeon – together with food – to train from attack level 1 to level 2.
target: Dat is de middelste Dreespitz. 't word in de Wapensmee produzeert un in Gefahrelken Gangen – tosammen mit Spiesen – bruukt, um Soldaten vun Angriff-Stand 1 up Stand 2 uttobilden.

source: Wheat is produced by farms and consumed by bakeries, micro breweries and breweries. Cattle farms also need to be supplied with wheat.
target: Weit word vun Buurdereen produzeert un vun Backereen, Lütten Broereen un Broereen bruukt. Ossentüchtereen bruken 't ok.

source: Wheat is produced by farms and used by mills and breweries. Donkey farms, sheep farms and piggeries also need to be supplied with wheat.
target: Weit word vun Buurdereen produzeert un vun Möhlen un Broereen bruukt. Langohrtüchtereen, Schaaptüchtereen un Swientjentüchtereen bruken 't ok.

source: This tasty wine is drunk by the miners working the marble and gold mines. It is produced in a winery.
target: Deeser Wien word vun Bargwarkskeerls in Marmel- un Gold-Bargwarken drunken. 't word in eener Wienmakeree produzeert.

source: Saws logs to produce planks.
target: Saagt Planken ut Boomstammen.

source: Grinds wheat to produce flour.
target: Mahlt Weit to Mehl.

source: Burns logs and clay to produce coal.
target: Brannt Holtköhle ut Boomstammen un Lehm.

source: Finally, the ‘Immovables’ tab shows information about the specific immovables that your tribe’s workers can place on the map.
target: Un de Listenwessler »Sekere Dingen« wiest Informationen över de sekere Dingen, de diene Arbeiders up de Kaart setten könen.

source: Just like with animals, you can also select multiple immovables or ground textures with Ctrl + mouse click.
target: As mit Deerten kannst du ok mehr Aarden vun sekeren Dingen oder Landskuppen mit Strg bi’m Klicken utkören.

source: Show immovables (on/off)
target: Wies sekere Dinge an (an/ut)

source: These immovables are used by the win condition “Artifacts”.
target: Deese sekeren Dingen worden vun de Upgaav tum Winnen “Künstelk Schatten” bruukt.

source: After losing an important battle against the barbarians which lead to the loss of a big part of the Empire’s territory, Lutius leaves Fremil to start a new life. But his destiny takes his ship into a heavy storm, which nearly destroys it. Only with a lot of luck he manages to beach his damaged ship on an unknown desert strand and save his people. For now.
target: Nadeem he eene wichtige Slacht tegen de Willen Lüü un eenen groten Part vun de Land vun de Latiensken Riek verloren hett, verlett Lutjus Freemilt un begünnt een nejes Leven. Aver sien Schipp word vun de Slag in eenen Kohstörm föhrt un haast verneelt. Nix as Glück vergünnt hüm, mit de ramponeerten Schipp up eenen frömden Strand uptolopen un siene Lüü to redden. Vöreerst.

source: Lower the demand for marble columns in the economy settings to four. This will help to save some marble for buildings.
target: Minner de Nafraag för Marmelpielers in de Wirtschafts-Instellungen to veer. Dann blievt uns mehr Marmel för Husen över.

source: Oh great Neptune, safeguard our journey! Oh great Neptune, let the winds be friendly to our course! Oh great Neptune, save us from the creatures of the sea! Oh great Neptune, …
target: Och groter Neptun, behüüd uns up uns' Fahrt! Och groter Neptun, laat uns de Winden gnädig sien! Och groter Neptun, behüüd uns vör de Beesten vun de See! Och groter Neptun, …

source: Of course I also prefer to keep our soldiers alive, but we can’t save every life. Soldiers die in battle, that’s just the way things are. You may decide how long to wait until attacking, but don’t take too long, or the enemies will exploit our weakness.
target: Ick mag uns' Soldaten ok lever levend, aver wi könen se nich all behöden. Soldaten starven im Krieg, dat is man so. Du magst entscheden, wo lang wi wachten, bit wi angriepen, aver wacht nich to lange, anners nützen de Feinde uns' Swackheid ut.

source: By changing the target quantity, you can therefore decide which wares/tools your resources (in this case: iron) should be turned into or whether you would like to save your iron and wait until you know what you will need it for.
target: Indeem du de Ent-Tahl ännerst kannst du fastleggen, to wat för Waren oder Warktüüg diene Mineraale (im Bispööl Iesen) verarbeidt worden sallen oder of du se lever behollst, bit du weetst, för wat du se bruukst.

source: If you have a save game or replay demonstrating the issue (for instance crashes where it can be hard to tell exactly what is triggering it), please include that too. For more information, see the section on Replays below.
target: Wenn du een sekertes Speel oder Upteken hest, wat de Probleem verklaart (to 'n Bispööl Störten waar man nich sücht, wat de Oorsaak is), kliev dat bidde ok an. Mehr Informationen finnst du unnern in de Deel över Uptekens.
