source: Replays are a very useful tool to find bugs in the game logic, so they can be useful as attachments to bug reports. The replay files are saved in the %s directory on Linux and Mac OS X. On Windows, they are in the ‘replays’ subdirectory of your Widelands installation.
target: Uptekens sünd bannig nüttelk, um Fehlers in de Logik vum Speel to finnen, daarum sünd se as Anhang för Fehler-Berichten good. De Upteken-Dateien worden unner Linux un Mac OS X in de List »%s« sekert. Unner Windows sünd se in de List »replays« unner de List, waar Widelands sekert is.

source: If the game should crash, don't worry! The game will be saved automatically so that you can reload it afterwards.
target: Wenn dat Speel maal daalknallt, koom nich in Nood! Dat Speel word automatisk sekert un du naher wiederspölen.

source: The map has not been saved, do you really want to quit?
target: De Kaart is nich sekert worden. Willt du würrelk ofbreken?

source: This game was saved using an older version of Widelands and cannot be loaded anymore, or it's a new version that can't be handled yet.
target: Deeses Speel is mit eener ollen Versioon vun Widelands sekert worden un kann nich mehr laden, oder dat is eene neje Versioon, wat Widelands noch nich mit klaarword.

source: The game is a saved game – the win condition was set before.
target: Dat is een sekert Speel – de Upgaav tum Winnen is also al fastleggt.

source: Select a saved game
target: Sekertes Speel utkören

source: Change map or saved game
target: Annere Kaart oder sekerts Speel

source: The host has not yet selected a map or saved game.
target: De Weert hett noch keene Kaart un keen sekerts Speel utköört.

source: Choose a saved game
target: Sekerts Speel utkören

source: A player disconnected from the game. An automatic save game has been created. Do you want to continue playing?
target: Een Speler is nich mehr mit de Speel verbunnen. Dat Speel is automatisk sekert worden. Willt du widerspölen?

source: The filename that the game was saved under followed by the map’s name, or the map’s name followed by the last objective achieved.
target: De Datei-Naam vun de sekert Speel un dann de Naam vun de Kaart, oder de Naam vun de Kaart un dann de tolest schafft Upgaav

source: WARNING: Password will be shown and saved readable!
target: WAHRSCHAU: De Kennwoord kann vun elkeen lesen worden!

source: --autosave=[...]     Automatically save each n minutes
target: --autosave=[...]     Speel word automatisk all n Menüten sekert

source: The other two important food wares are smoked fish and smoked meat. Raw meat is delivered from a hunter. A fisher gets the fish out of the sea while a fish breeder makes sure that a school of fish does not go extinct by breeding more. Make sure that there are always fish left, otherwise the fish breeder won’t be able to breed new ones. The smoking happens in a smokery, you will need at least two of those.
target: De annern twee wichtigen Spiesen sünd Rökelfiss un Rökelfleesk. Een Jäger levert rauhes Fleesk. Een Fisker hollt Fisse ut de See un een Fisstüchter kümmert sük daarum, dat de Fisse nich all fiskt worden, indeem he welke tücht. Pass up, dat immer een paar Fisse övrig sünd, anners kann de Fisstüchter keene mehr tüchten. Fiss un Fleesk worden in eener Rökelkamer rökelt, bau daar tominnst twee vun.

source: First, we need to find some more resources to back up our growing economy. I have spotted an island with some mountains in the south. Perhaps we can find some valuable resources like iron there.
target: Toeerst mutten wi mehr Mineraale finnen, um uns' Wirtschaft to versörgen, as se wasst. Ick hebb im Süden eene Insel mit een paar Bargen to sehn kregen. Villicht könen wi daar dürabele Mineraale as Iesen finnen.

source: Well done. Now you know how to draw back your soldiers from the places where you don’t need them. It is time to tell you how to reinforce your front line.
target: Hunnert. Nu weetst du, wo dat gaht, diene Soldaten vun Steden wegtokriegen, waar du se nich bruukst. Nu lehr ick di, wo dat gaht, diene Swette starker to maken.

source: The stonemason pauses %s before going back to work again.
target: De Flintslager wacht %s ehr he weer arbeidt.

source: The encyclopedia has five tabs:
target: De Hülp im Speel hett fiev Listenwesslers:

source: Now use the encyclopedia to find out how to create new soldiers.
target: Nu slaa na, wo du neje Soldaten kriggst.

source: Enhance the coal mine or the iron mine to a deep mine, and enhance the tavern to an inn.
target: Bau dat Köhle-Bargwark oder dat Iesen-Bargwark to eenem Deepen Bargwark ut un bau de Kneipe to eenem Kroog ut.

source: Workers gain experience by successful work. With enough experience, they become more advanced workers, who are necessary to operate the enhanced buildings. Do not enhance a building before you have enough advanced workers to operate the advanced building!
target: Arbeiders sammeln Erfahrung, wenn se good arbeiden. Wenn se genoog Erfahrung hebben, worden se betere Arbeiders, de för utbaute Husen nödig sünd. Bau een Huus nich ut, wenn du noch nich genoog künnige Arbeiders hest, um daar to arbeiden!

source: Build a training camp and enhance the arena
target: Bau een Övens-Lager un bau de Ring ut.

source: Build a training camp and enhance your arena to a colosseum.
target: Bau een Övens-Lager un bau dienen Ring to eenem Groten Ring ut.

source: The bakery and brewery should be enhanced as soon as the workers have enough experience. They can then produce mead, and bread sweetened with honey. Build a beekeeper’s house next to the berry farm to produce some honey, which we can store until we need it.
target: De Backeree un Broeree sallen utbaut worden sobald de Arbeiders genoog Erfahrung hebben. Se könen dann Hönnigbeer un mit Hönnig sööt Brood produzeren. Bau eene Imkeree tegen de Buskenplanteree, um Hönnig to produzeren. Wi könen de Hönnig upbewahren, bit wi 't bruken.

source: Most enhanced buildings need experienced workers. Do not enhance a building unless you have the necessary workers available.
target: De meesten utbauten Husen bruken Arbeiders mit Erfahrung. Bau de Husen eerst dann ut, wenn du de nödigen Arbeiders hest.

source: This coal mine’s main vein is exhausted. Expect strongly diminished returns on investment. This mine can’t be enhanced any further, so you should consider dismantling or destroying it.
target: De Ader vun deese Köhle-Bargwark is leeg. De Mine produzeert af nu veel dürer as normaal. De Bargwark kann nich utbaut werden, also überlegg di, of du de Mine ofbrannen oder plattrieten willt.

source: This gold mine’s main vein is exhausted. Expect strongly diminished returns on investment. This mine can’t be enhanced any further, so you should consider dismantling or destroying it.
target: De Ader vun deese Gold-Bargwark is leeg. De Mine produzeert af nu veel dürer as normaal. De Bargwark kann nich utbaut werden, also überlegg di, of du de Mine ofbrannen oder plattrieten willt.

source: This granite mine’s main vein is exhausted. Expect strongly diminished returns on investment. This mine can’t be enhanced any further, so you should consider dismantling or destroying it.
target: De Ader vun deese Flint-Bargwark is leeg. De Mine produzeert af nu veel dürer as normaal. De Bargwark kann nich utbaut werden, also überlegg di, of du de Mine ofbrannen oder plattrieten willt.

source: This iron mine’s main vein is exhausted. Expect strongly diminished returns on investment. This mine can’t be enhanced any further, so you should consider dismantling or destroying it.
target: De Ader vun deese Iesen-Bargwark is leeg. De Mine produzeert af nu veel dürer as normaal. De Bargwark kann nich utbaut werden, also überlegg di, of du de Mine ofbrannen oder plattrieten willt.

source: This coal mine’s main vein is exhausted. Expect strongly diminished returns on investment. This mine can’t be enhanced any further, so you should consider dismantling or destroying it.
target: De Ader vun deese Köhle-Bargwark is leeg. De Mine produzeert af nu veel dürer as normaal. De Bargwark kann nich utbaut werden, also überlegg di, of du de Mine ofbrannen oder plattrieten willt.

source: This gold mine’s main vein is exhausted. Expect strongly diminished returns on investment. This mine can’t be enhanced any further, so you should consider dismantling or destroying it.
target: De Ader vun deese Gold-Bargwark is leeg. De Mine produzeert af nu veel dürer as normaal. De Bargwark kann nich utbaut werden, also überlegg di, of du de Mine ofbrannen oder plattrieten willt.

source: This iron mine’s main vein is exhausted. Expect strongly diminished returns on investment. This mine can’t be enhanced any further, so you should consider dismantling or destroying it.
target: De Ader vun deese Iesen-Bargwark is leeg. De Mine produzeert af nu veel dürer as normaal. De Bargwark kann nich utbaut werden, also überlegg di, of du de Mine ofbrannen oder plattrieten willt.

source: This marble mine’s main vein is exhausted. Expect strongly diminished returns on investment. This mine can’t be enhanced any further, so you should consider dismantling or destroying it.
target: De Ader vun deese Marmel-Bargwark is leeg. De Mine produzeert af nu veel dürer as normaal. De Bargwark kann nich utbaut werden, also überlegg di, of du de Mine ofbrannen oder plattrieten willt.

source: This coal mine’s main vein is exhausted. Expect strongly diminished returns on investment. This mine can’t be enhanced any further, so you should consider dismantling or destroying it.
target: De Ader vun deese Köhle-Bargwark is leeg. De Mine produzeert af nu veel dürer as normaal. De Bargwark kann nich utbaut werden, also überlegg di, of du de Mine ofbrannen oder plattrieten willt.

source: This gold mine’s main vein is exhausted. Expect strongly diminished returns on investment. This mine can’t be enhanced any further, so you should consider dismantling or destroying it.
target: De Ader vun deese Gold-Bargwark is leeg. De Mine produzeert af nu veel dürer as normaal. De Bargwark kann nich utbaut werden, also überlegg di, of du de Mine ofbrannen oder plattrieten willt.

source: This iron mine’s main vein is exhausted. Expect strongly diminished returns on investment. This mine can’t be enhanced any further, so you should consider dismantling or destroying it.
target: De Ader vun deese Iesen-Bargwark is leeg. De Mine produzeert af nu veel dürer as normaal. De Bargwark kann nich utbaut werden, also überlegg di, of du de Mine ofbrannen oder plattrieten willt.

source: This rock mine’s main vein is exhausted. Expect strongly diminished returns on investment. This mine can’t be enhanced any further, so you should consider dismantling or destroying it.
target: De Ader vun deese Stenen-Bargwark is leeg. De Mine produzeert af nu veel dürer as normaal. De Bargwark kann nich utbaut werden, also überlegg di, of du de Mine ofbrannen oder plattrieten willt.

source: The Barbarian ax workshop is the intermediate production site in a series of three buildings. It is enhanced from the metal workshop but doesn’t require additional qualification for the worker.
target: De Wille Extensmede is dat middelste Huus vun eener Riege vun dree Husen. Eene Metalldreihbank word daarto utbaut, aver de Arbeider bruukt daar keene Erfahrung för.

source: This building can either be built directly or obtained by enhancing another building.
target: Deeses Huus kann stuuv baut oder vun eenem annern Huus utbaut worden.

source: Or enhanced from:
target: Oder utbaut vun:

source: If enhanced, dismantle yields:
target: Wenn utbaut, gifft dat Plattrieten torügg:

source: Can be enhanced to:
target: Kann utbaut worden to:

source: Bread paddles are produced in the metal workshop like all other tools (but cease to be produced by the building if it is enhanced to an ax workshop and war mill).
target: Broodschüppen worden as elkeen Warktüüg in de Metalldreihbank produzeert (aver nich mehr, wenn dat Huus to eener Extensmede oder Oorlogs-Smee utbaut word).

source: Felling axes are produced in the metal workshop (but cease to be produced by the building if it is enhanced to an ax workshop and war mill).
target: Boomslager-Exten worden in de Metalldreihbank produzeert (aver nich mehr, wenn dat Huus to eener Extensmede oder Oorlogs-Smee utbaut word).

source: Produced by the metal workshop (but they cease to be produced by the building if it is enhanced to an ax workshop and war mill).
target: In de Metalldreihbank produzeert (aver nich mehr, wenn dat Huus to eener Extensmede oder Oorlogs-Smee utbaut word).

source: They are one of the basic tools produced in a metal workshop (but cease to be produced by the building if it is enhanced to an ax workshop and war mill).
target: Se worden as elkeen Warktüüg in de Metalldreihbank produzeert (aver nich mehr, wenn dat Huus to eener Extensmede oder Oorlogs-Smee utbaut word).

source: Geologists, builders, blacksmiths and helmsmiths all need a hammer. Make sure you’ve always got some in reserve! They are one of the basic tools produced at the metal workshop (but cease to be produced by the building if it is enhanced to an ax workshop and war mill).
target: Schattsökers, Baukeerls, Wapensmidds un Panzersmidds bruken all eenen Klöpper. Pass up, dat du alltied welke över hest! Se worden as elkeen Warktüüg in de Metalldreihbank produzeert (aver nich mehr, wenn dat Huus to eener Extensmede oder Oorlogs-Smee utbaut word).

source: This is the most enhanced Barbarian armor. It is produced in the helm smithy and used in the training camp – together with food – to train soldiers from health level 2 to level 3.
target: Dat is de beste Wille Helm. 't word in de Helmsmee produzeert un im Övens-Lager – tosammen mit Spiesen – bruukt, um Soldaten vun Gesundheid-Stand 2 up Stand 3 uttobilden.

source: A warhelm is an enhanced armor for Barbarian soldiers. It is produced in a helm smithy and used in a training camp – together with food – to train soldiers from health level 1 to level 2.
target: Een Kriegshelm is een goder Schuur för Wille Soldaten. 't word in de Helmsmee produzeert un im Övens-Lager – tosammen mit Spiesen – bruukt, um Soldaten vun Gesundheid-Stand 1 up Stand 2 uttobilden.

source: Hunting spears are produced in the metal workshop (but cease to be produced by the building if it is enhanced to an ax workshop and war mill).
target: Jaggtsperen worden in de Metalldreihbank produzeert (aver nich mehr, wenn dat Huus to eener Extensmede oder Oorlogs-Smee utbaut word).

source: Kitchen tools are needed for preparing rations, snacks and meals. Be sure to have a metal workshop to produce this basic tool (but it ceases to be produced by the building if it is enhanced to an ax workshop and war mill).
target: Besteck is nödig, um Happen, Spiesen un Mahltieden torechttomaken. 't word in de Metalldreihbank produzeert (aver nich mehr, wenn dat Huus to eener Extensmede oder Oorlogs-Smee utbaut word).

source: Picks are used by stonemasons and miners. They are produced in the metal workshop (but cease to be produced by the building if it is enhanced to an ax workshop and war mill).
target: Flintslagers un Bargwarkskeerls bruken Pickhacken. Se worden in de Metalldreihbank produzeert (aver nich mehr, wenn dat Huus to eener Extensmede oder Oorlogs-Smee utbaut word).

source: Scythes are produced by the metal workshop (but cease to be produced by the building if it is enhanced to an ax workshop and war mill).
target: Sichten worden in de Metalldreihbank produzeert (aver nich mehr, wenn dat Huus to eener Extensmede oder Oorlogs-Smee utbaut word).

source: Therefore the gardener and the ranger use them. Produced at the metal workshop (but cease to be produced by the building if it is enhanced to an ax workshop and war mill).
target: De Gaardner un de Boomplanter bruken se also.  Se worden in de Metalldreihbank produzeert (aver nich mehr, wenn dat Huus to eener Extensmede oder Oorlogs-Smee utbaut word).

source: The island is huge and as long as we are not sure that we are alone here, we cannot relax. Explore and conquer it, this is the only way to protect us from threats on the island and from Atlantis.
target: De Insel is baldadig un solang wi nich weten, dat wi hier alleen sünd, düren wi nich entspannen. Försk se ut un nehm se in, blot so könen wi uns vör Gefahren up de Insel un vun Atlantis schütten.

source: In order to call a geologist to search for water, click on a flag in the area that you want him to search and then on the button labeled ‘Send geologist to explore site’.
target: Daarmit een Schattsöker Water söcht, klick eene Fahn an, de in de Kuntrei staht, waar he söken sall, un klick dann de Knoop »Een Schattsöker sall deese Stee unnersöken« an.

source: Sire, we do not know anything about the island. And I believe we are not safe either. It would probably be reasonable to build a tower to explore the island and add some military strength.
target: Mienheer, wi weten absolut nix över deese Insel. Un ick gloov, wi sünd hier ok nich seker. 't is wull beter, eenen Toorn to bauen, um de Insel uttoförsken un wat Soldateree-Fors to hebben.

source: Fortunately, I spotted a mountain which looks very promising and seems to have some mining resources. Perhaps we should send some geologists to explore the hidden resources.
target: Tum Glück hebb ick eenen Barg to sehn kregen, wat so utsücht, as of 't daar Mineraale to ofboen gifft. Villicht sallen wi een paar Schattsökers schicken, um de verburgen Mineraale uttoförsken.

source: Expand Your Territory to Explore the South
target: Vergroter dien Gewest, um de Süden uttoförsken

source: In this game, you start out on a small piece of land with just a few resources. Using these, you’ll create an empire with many thousands of inhabitants. On your way towards this goal, you will have to establish an economic infrastructure, explore the land around you and face rivaling tribes.
target: In deesem Speel fangst du mit eenem lütten Deel Land an, waar du leep minn Materialien un Mineraale hest. Daarmit baust du een Riek mit dusenden Inwohners up. Up dienem Weg daarhen baust du eene starke Wirtschaft up, förskst dat Land um di rum ut un kämpst tegen tegenstriedige Völker.

source: Send geologist to explore site
target: Een Schattsöker sall deese Stee unnersöken

source: Once you have archived a message, another message will be selected automatically from the list.
target: Wenn du eene Naricht wegdeist, word een anner Naricht automatisk ut de Liste utköört.

source: On MacOS, you can find the file called COPYING in the archive you downloaded from the website.
target: Up Linux finnst du de Datei mit de Naam »COPYING« in de Paket, dat du vun de Internett-Sied runnerladen hest.

source: Manage your messages more efficiently: press ‘N’ for News to access the messages window, then use ‘G’ for Go To, and the Delete key to archive messages.
target: Kümmer di fixer um diene Narichten: Drück »N« as »Naricht«, um de Narichten-Fenster opentokregen, bruuk dann »G«, um daarhen to gahn, un de Entf-Tast, um de Naricht wegtodoon.

source: Manage your messages more efficiently: press ‘N’ for News to access the messages window, then use ‘G’ for Go To, and the Delete key to archive messages.
target: Kümmer di fixer um diene Narichten: Drück »N« as »Naricht«, um de Narichten-Fenster opentokregen, bruuk dann »G«, um daarhen to gahn, un de Entf-Tast, um de Naricht wegtodoon.

source: In this tutorial, you will learn how to navigate in Widelands and how to build buildings and roads.
target: In deese Inföhren lehrst du, wo dat Torechtfinnen in Widelands gaht un wo man Husen un Straten baut.

source: In this tutorial, you will be taught the secrets of warfare: how to create soldiers, how to train them and how to lead them in battle.
target: In deese Inföhren lehrst du alls över Slachten: Wo dat Anhüren un Utbilden vun Soldaten gaht un wo man se in de Krieg föhrt.

source: In this tutorial, you will get to know seafaring, which is how to handle ships and ports.
target: In deese Inföhren lehrst du alls över Seefahrt, also wo du Schippen un Muden bruukst.

source: And we don’t have any iron left. We must find a way to get some metal for forging new picks. Unfortunately, I have no idea how to do this.
target: Un wi hebben keen Iesen över. Wi mutten eets wat Iesen kriegen, um neje Pickhacken to maken. Aver ick hebb leidergotts keene Idee, wo wi dat doon könen.

source: I wanted to teach you how to build new flags, but it seems you have already found out on your own. Well done!
target: Ick wull di lehren, wo dat Upstellen vun nejen Fahnen gaht, aver du hest dat openbaar sülvst utfunnen. Hunnert!

source: You have two messages at the moment. This one, which you are currently reading, and the one that informed you that a new headquarters was added to your economy. Let’s learn how to archive messages: first, select the message that you wish to archive by clicking on it in the list. Then, click the
target: Du hest even twee Narichten. Deese hier, wat du upstünds leest, un eene, wat di över een nejes Raadhuus in diener Wirtschaft informeert. Laat mi di lehren, wo dat Wegdoon vun Narichten gaht: Toeerst köörst du de Naricht, wat du wegdoon willt, ut, indeem du se in de Liste anklickst. Dann klick de

source: Excellent. Do you remember how to close windows? You simply have to right-click on them. This will work with all windows except for story message windows like this one. Go ahead and try it.
target: Hunnert. Weetst du noch, wo dat Sluten vun Fensters gaht? Du mutt se blot mit de rechte Muustast anklicken. Dat gaht för all Fensters buten Vertellsel-Fensters as deeses hier. Versöök 't.

source: However, since you now know how to control Widelands, you can also start a game (or continue this one) and discover more by yourself.
target: Wiel du nu weetst, wo dat Stüren vun Widelands gaht, kannst du ok een echtes Speel starten (oder deeses hier wiederspölen) un sülvst mehr utfinnen.

source: Now use the encyclopedia to find out how to create new soldiers.
target: Nu slaa na, wo du neje Soldaten kriggst.

source: Just be quiet, listen carefully, and do try not to stab yourself until I’ve explained to you how to hold a broadsword.
target: Wees eenfach still, höör good to, un versöök bidde, di nich doodtostecken ehr ick di verklaart hebb, wo du een Bredes Sweert hollen sallst.

source: The wiki also includes a short tutorial on how to build a map.
target: De Wiki hett eene lütte Inföhren, wo dat Kaarten-Maken gaht.

source: Now that weapons are being forged, new soldiers can be recruited. For this, we need to deliver light tridents and tabards to the barracks. Recruits will arrive from the warehouse and receive one of each and some basic training to become a soldier.
target: Nu dat wi Wapen smeden könen, könen wi neje Soldaten anhüren. Daarto mutten wi Lütte Dreespitzen un Kluften to de Kasern levern. Lehrwichter komen vun eenem Kraamhuus un kriegen eens vun jede un eene Inföhren tum Fechten, un so worden se Soldaten.

source: Build a barracks to start training soldiers.
target: Bau eene Kasern, um Soldaten uttorüsten.

source: Sire, we have all buildings available for training our soldiers, but we should increase our efforts to train them to the highest level and to train more of them.
target: Mienheer, wie hebben all Husen paraat, de wi bruken, um uns' Soldaten uttobilden, aver wi mutten uns' Anstrengens verhogen, um mehr vun hör un uttobilden un up de hoogsten Stand.

source: Increase your military strength by training your soldiers
target: Verhoog diene Soldateree-Fors, indeem du diene Soldaten utbildst

source: Chieftain Reebaud, I have more bad news. There are almost no fish in the waters nearby. While we can prepare rations using only fruit or bread, soldier training requires lots of smoked meat or fish. The scraps of meat a reindeer farm drops out as a by-product when making fur aren’t enough.
target: Mienheer Reebaud, ick hebb noch mehr slimme Narichten. 't gifft haast keene Fisse im Water. Wi könen Happen blot mit Früchten un Brood maken, aver um Soldaten uttobilden, bruken wi bannig  vööl Rökelfleesk un Rökelfiss. Dat bietje Fleesk, wat eene Sneeihirsktüchteree daarto produzeert, wenn se Fell maakt, is nich genoog.

source: I’d like to say we should attack him right now, but I fear we aren’t strong enough yet to hold our own against him in battle. We should hurry our soldier training while pretending to be gathering his so-called gift. That would buy us some time.
target: Am Leevsten will ick seggen, dat wi hüm gliek stracks angriepen, aver ick bün bange, dat wi noch nich stark genoog sünd, um hüm in eener Slacht to begegen. Wi sallen uns' Soldaten fixer utbilden as wi so doon, as of wi siene sobenöömte Gaav sammeln. Dat gifft uns wat Tied.

source: In this scenario, I’m going to tell you about soldiers, their training and their profession: warfare. Although Widelands is about building up, not burning down, there is an enemy you sometimes have to defeat. Yet warfare is mainly focused on economics, not on military strategies, and its mechanics deserve explanation.
target: In deese Inföhren verklaar ick di Soldaten, hör Utbildung un hör Beruf: Krieg. In Widelands gaht 't um Upbauen, nich Ofbrannen, aver of un an mutt du eenen Feind manntjen. Bi’m Krieg gaht 't in 't Geheel um de Wirtschaft, nich taktiske Dingen, aver Slachten mutten doch verklaart worden.

source: New soldiers are created differently from normal workers: recruits will walk from a warehouse (or your headquarters) to the barracks where they will receive some basic training and become soldiers. Basic Barbarian soldiers do not use armor, they only need an ax.
target: Neje Soldaten worden nich as annere Arbeiders anhüürt: Lehrwichter gahn vun eenem Kraamhuus (oder dienem Raadhuus) to eener Kasern, waar se de Grundlagen büffeln un Soldaten worden. Neje Soldaten vun de Willen Lüü bruuken keenen Wapenrock, blot eene Ext.

source: You should also keep in mind that each of the three tribes in Widelands has its own way of training, so the buildings and wares are different. Also, the ability levels cannot be compared: an Imperial soldier has a base attack of %1% at level 0, while a Barbarian soldier at the same level only has a base attack of %2%.
target: Vergeet nich, dat alle Völker in Widelands anners öven un annere Boen un Waren hebben. De Egenskuppen-Standen könen nich vergleken worden: Een Rieks-Soldat hett een Angriff vun %1% bei Stand 0, een Willer Soldat mit de sülvigen Stand blot %2%.

source: While our soldiers are training, let me tell you what we can do with them.
target: As uns' Soldaten öven, laat mi verklaaren, wat wi mit hör doon könen.

source: A trainer training a soldier
target: Een Mester lehrt eenen Soldaten

source: No soldier found for this training level!
target: Keen Soldat för deese Lehre is funden worden!

source:
--ai_training        Enables AI training mode. See
                      https://wl.widelands.org/wiki/Ai%20Training/
                      for a full description of the AI training logic.
target:
--ai_training        Dateien vun künstelken Spelers schrieven. Kiek bidde
                      https://wl.widelands.org/wiki/Ai%20Training/
                      an, um to sehen, wo dat gaht, de künstelken Spelers to verbetern.

source: Build training sites for soldiers
target: Bau Övens-Boen för Soldaten

source: One of these training sites is the battle arena. It is a big and expensive building, and it trains soldiers in evade. Since soldiers get very hungry during their workout, this building needs a lot of food and strong beer. In a real game, you should have a good infrastructure before you build it.
target: Eens vun deeses Övens-Boen is de Slachtenring. 't is een grotes und düres Huus, wat Soldaten dat Utwieken lehrt. Soldaten worden daar düchtig smachtig bi, daarum bruukt deeses Huus mennig Spiesen un Deftigs Beer. In eenem echten Speel bruukst du eene gode Wirtschaft, bevör du Övens-Boen baust.

source: Recycles old armor and weapon parts that have been discarded by training sites into fur, iron and gold.
target: Verweert olle Wapen un Wapenrocken, de vun Övens-Boen wegsmeten worden sünd, um Fell, Iesen un Gold torüggtokriegen.

source: This tasty bread is made in bakeries out of cornmeal, blackroot flour and water. It is appreciated as basic food by miners, scouts and soldiers in training sites (labyrinth and dungeon).
target: Deeses leckere Brood word in Backereen ut Maismehl, Swartwuddel-Mehl un Water maakt. 't is eene gode Spies för Bargwarkskeerls, Bespejers un Soldaten in Övens-Boen (Dwaalwegen un Gefahrelke Gangen).

source: The Barbarian bakers are best in making this flat and tasty pitta bread. It is made out of wheat and water following a secret recipe. Pitta bread is used in the taverns, inns and big inns to prepare rations, snacks and meals. It is also consumed at training sites (training camp and battle arena).
target: Nüms kann deeses platte, leckere Pitta-Brood beter maken as de Willen Backers. 't word na eenem gehemen Rezept ut Weit un Water maakt. Pitta-Brood word in Kneipen, Kröög un Weertshusen bruukt, um Happen, Spiesen un Mahltieden torecttomaken. 't word ok vun Övens-Boen (Övens-Lager un Slachtenring) verbruukt.

source: The bakers of the Empire make really tasty bread out of flour and water. It is used in taverns and inns to prepare rations and meals. Bread is also consumed at the training sites (arena, colosseum, training camp).
target: De Rieks-Backers maken bannig leckeres Brood ut Mehl un Water. 't word in Kneipen un Weertskuppen bruukt, um Happen un Mahltieden torechttomaken. Brood word ok vun Övens-Boen (Ring, Groter Ring, Övens-Lager) verbruukt.

source: Fish is one of the biggest food resources of the Atlanteans. It has to be smoked in a smokery before being delivered to mines, training sites and scouts.
target: Fiss is eene vun de wichtigsten Spiesen för de Atlantinger. 't mutt in eener Rökelkamer rökelt worden, ehr 't vun Bargwarken, Övens-Boen un Bespejers bruukt worden kann.

source: Besides pitta bread and meat, fish is also a foodstuff for the Barbarians. It is used in the taverns, inns and big inns and at the training sites (training camp and battle arena).
target: Tegen Pitta-Brood un Fleesk is ok Fiss eene Spies för de Willen Lüü. 't word in Kneipen, Kröög, Weertshusen un Övens-Boen (Övens-Lager un Slachtenring) bruukt.

source: Besides bread and meat, fish is also a foodstuff for the Empire. Fish are used in taverns, inns and training sites (arena, colosseum, training camp).
target: Tegen Brood un Fleesk is ok Fiss eene Spies för dat Latienske Riek. Fisse worden in Kneipen, Weertskuppen un Övens-Boen (Ring, Groter Ring, Övens-Lager) bruukt.

source: Meat has to be smoked in a smokery before being delivered to mines and training sites (dungeon and labyrinth).
target: Fleesk mutt in eener Rökelkamer rökelt worden, ehr 't good genoog för de Bargwarken un Övens-Boen (Gefahrelke Gangen un Dwaalwegen) is.

source: Meat is used in the taverns, inns and big inns to prepare rations, snacks and meals for the miners. It is also consumed at the training sites (training camp and battle arena).
target: Fleesk word in Kneipen, Kröög un Weertshusen bruukt, um Happen, Spiesen un Mahltieden för de Bargwarkskeerls torechttomaken. 't word ok vun Övens-Boen (Övens-Lager un Slachtenring) bruukt.

source: Meat can also be obtained as pork from piggeries. It is used in the inns and taverns to prepare lunch for the miners and is consumed at the training sites (arena, colosseum, training camp).
target: Fleesk kann ok vun Swienen in Swientjentüchtereen maakt worden. 't word in Kneipen un Weertskuppen bruukt, um Spiesen för de Bargwarkskeerls torecttomaken. Ok Övens-Boen (Ring, Groter Ring, Övens-Lager) bruken Fleesk.

source: Smoked meat is made out of meat in a smokery. It is delivered to the mines and training sites (labyrinth and dungeon) where the miners and soldiers prepare a nutritious lunch for themselves.
target: Rökelfleesk word in eener Rökelkamer ut Fleesk maakt. 't word to de Bargwarken un Övens-Boen (Dwaalwegen un Gefahrelke Gangen) brocht, waar de Bargwarkskeerls un Soldaten 't eten.
